revision.text:
==Music List== {{MusicRoom |category =Title Screen theme |title =盛开在净土的莲花 |titleEN =Lotus Blooming in the Pure Land |composer =11 |comment =标题画面的主题曲。
舒缓得不像样的标题曲。
想要给人一种听着曲子就感受到“天气真冷”的感觉。
今天的东方标题曲主旋律，也是面目全非尸骨无存了呢（误）。 |translation =Title Screen Theme
An uncharacteristically relaxed title theme.
I wanted to give people a feeling of "It's really cold" as soon as they hear this.
Nothing remains of the main Touhou theme of today (w). }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 1 theme |title =Icy Blossom, Icy Dream |titleEN =Icy Blossom, Icy Dream |composer =11 |comment =第一面的主题曲。
心目中的冰封的感觉。
乐器选取上，加入了一点类似冰晶和水晶叮咚碰撞的音色。
又用回音钢琴增强了一下空灵感。
果然提到冰和雪也就只能想到这些东西而已啊…… |translation =Stage 1 Theme
Has the feeling of a freeze.
On top of the selected instruments, I added tinkling sounds that are kind of like ice crystals and crystals.
And I also used an echo piano to strengthen the feeling of expansiveness and magic.
Of course, these were the only things I could think of when ice and snow were mentioned... }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 1 Boss - [[Abyss Soul Lotus/Characters#Shekle|Shekle]]'s theme |title =冰与雪的灵动 |titleEN =Cleverness of Ice and Snow |composer =11 |comment =雪珂的主题曲。
活泼，灵动，又有点蠢的雪妖精，大概和琪露诺比较像吧？
但是曲风完全不像嘛。（扶额）
给一面Boss这种杂鱼曲就用上了电吉他Solo的话，待遇会不会有点太优厚了啊哈哈哈。 |translation =Shekle's Theme
An ice fairy that's lively, clever, but a bit dumb, kind of like Cirno?
But the theme is completely different. *thinking*
Is it a bit too nice to give a Stage 1 Boss's small fry theme an electric guitar solo? lol }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 2 theme |title =悔恨凝结之路 |titleEN = The Road Where Remorse Condenses |composer =11 |comment =第二面的主题曲。
用吉他作为了宁静的开场。以后可就没机会这么安静了啊。
二面也是与主线有关的一面呢。
悔恨的话是不是应该拿小提琴渲染一下悲伤感啊，这么想着。
我终于会用小提琴了啊啊啊！（老泪纵横）（倒地） |translation =Stage 2 Theme
I used guitar to have a calm and quiet introduction, after this I won't have a chance to be calm and quiet anymore.
Stage 2 is a stage relevant to the plot.
Speaking of remorse, shouldn't a bit of violin be used to colour in a sense of sorrow?
I finally can use violins now hahaha! (*tears streak down face*) (*falls down*) }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 2 Boss - [[Abyss Soul Lotus/Characters#Miyaka Yamika|Miyaka Yamika]]'s theme |title =暗之花，吹来夜之香 |titleEN =The Flower of Shadow Brings the Fragrance of Night <ref>This is a reference to the boss's name, Miyaka (美夜香, "beautiful night fragrance") Yamika (暗华, "shadow flower")</ref> |composer =11 |comment =暗华 美夜香的主题曲。
于激烈的战斗感中点缀着华丽和冷艳的曲子。
掺进了交响乐队的铙钹，好像还是蛮有意思的。
毕竟是来自地狱的使者，曲子也应该有点地狱的感觉了。 |translation =Miyaka Yamika's Theme
Within a feeling of intense battle is woven a beautiful, icy, and elegant song.
Adding some symphonic cymbals seems to be quite appropriate.
Since she is an emissary from Hell, the song should have a feeling of Hell as well. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 3 theme |title =开不尽的雪莲华 |titleEN = Endlessly Blooming Snow Lotus Flowers<ref>This is a parallel to [[Shining Shooting Star/Music#Stage_3_theme|Shining Shooting Star]]'s stage 3 theme, The Kodama's Summer Night Festival. In both cases, the title of the track ends with the Chinese name of the game: "Summer Night Festival" and "Snow Lotus Flower".</ref> |composer =11 |comment =第三面的主题曲。
随心所欲地写了几段高速钢琴和跳音和弦，一下子就把曲风变得活泼起来了。活泼过后，也有高潮部分的旷阔与华丽。
顺便一提，高潮旋律的前两句和姜夔的《鬲溪梅令》可以完美契合，就像谱曲一样的契合度呢。 |translation =Stage 3 Theme
Since I did as I pleased and wrote several sections of fast piano and jumping chords, the mood of the track suddenly became lively. After the liveliness, there's also the vastness and beauty of the climax.
As an aside, the two phrases before the climax melody matches perfectly with Jiang Kui's "Gexi Meiling", as if it was composed to be like that. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 3 Boss - [[Abyss Soul Lotus/Characters#Lepus Timidys Snowy|Lepus Timidys Snowy]]'s theme |title =雪兔的踪迹 ～ Nowhere but Everywhere |titleEN =Tracks of the Snow Hare ~ Nowhere but Everywhere |composer =11 |comment =莉帕斯·缇米蒂丝·白雪的主题曲。
活泼又狡黠，让人难以捉摸的雪兔贼。
——贼什么贼，幻想乡的事，能叫贼吗？
不过话说回来，请雪兔小姐马上来偷我家的东西吧。
那样就可以顺便抓回家养起来了！（不是） |translation =Lepus Timidys Snowy's Theme
Lively yet cunning, a hard to grasp snow hare thief.
--thief? what thief? Considering Gensokyo, can she even be called a thief?
Anyways, Miss Snow Hare, please come steal my house's stuff right away.
So I can conveniently catch you and raise you as a pet! (jk) }}
==Notes== {{smallrefs}}
{{Navbox ASL}} [[Category:Music by Game]]

revision.comment: /* Music List */ Come on now, I don't even fluently speak Japanese but you can very much tell that sentence was wrong.
Remove footnote for old stage 4 theme iykyk
revision.text:
==Music Room== {{TranslateTable/Header}} {{TranslateTable|h1 | ja =前言 | en =Foreword<ref>Shown when first entering the Music Room, before selecting a track.</ref> }} {{TranslateTable | ja =大家好，我是灵猫子（右边的美国短毛猫），是东方祈华梦制作组的曲师。
我和H2SO4、豆奶合作完成了东方栖霞园的音乐创作。
这次的曲子仍然以东方原作风格的曲子为主，不过加入了许多我自己的风格。
如果喜欢，请继续关注我们的后续作品哦 | en =Hi everyone~this is Reibyouko (the American shorthair cat you see on the right), the composer for Team Elegant Impermanence of Sakura.
I collaborated with H2SO4 and 豆奶 on the tracks for ''Blue Devil in the Belvedere''.
This time, tracks still mainly revolve around the style of the original Touhou games, but with more of my own style added.
If you like it, be sure to follow our future works! }} {{TranslateTable/Footer}}
{{MusicRoom |category =Title screen |title =Abendrot ~ 栖息于霞间 |titleEN =Abendrot<ref>Meaning the red clouds of sunset</ref> ~ Perching Amongst the Red Clouds |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =标题画面的主题曲。
栖霞园第一首曲子，发挥的很好，哪怕放在现在听都是十分满意的。
不过缺点是它听起来不怎么东方风，除了一直以来都有的东方主旋律以外，完全不东方呢，
毕竟是这样的和声和配器，而且作为标题画面的曲子貌似也缺少了一些气势。
不过非常贴合游戏的主题，而且我也喜欢这样悠闲的曲子。
2020年5月作曲 |translation =Title Theme.
The first track for ''Blue Devil in the Belvedere''. I think I did a pretty good job. Even listening to it now, I'm very satisfied with it.
One flaw is that it doesn't sound very Touhou-like. Besides the same-as-always Touhou main melody, it's not like Touhou at all, because of the harmony and instrumentation.
And as a title theme, it might lack a bit of grandiosity.
But it fits the game's theme very well, so I like this carefree-sounding track.
Composed May 2020. |source1 =Demo Version |comment1 =标题画面的主题曲。
这次的主题是中世纪，所以尝试了古典感的曲子
然而其实我的和声学一塌糊涂，所以可能只是“听起来有点古典的感觉的曲子”
除了一直以来都有的东方主旋律以外，不太东方风呢
不过真的有人能听出东方主旋律吗。 |translation1 =Title Screen Theme.
This is theme is "medieval", so I tried a more classical sounding track.
But my harmony theory is all over the place, so you can really only count this as "a track that sounds kinda classical".
Besides the same main Touhou theme as always, doesn't seem very Touhou.
But can anyone hear the main Touhou theme in this anyway? }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Stage 1 Theme |title =雾之湖的芒种 |titleEN =Mangzhong<ref>One of the 24 solar terms (sub-seasons) of the year, usually in June. Near midsummer, and the last chance for sowing crops.</ref> of the Misty Lake |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =第一面的主题曲。
本意是模仿辉针城和天空璋的1面道中曲，几经修改才有了现在的版本。
开篇的旋律似乎的确是欢快过头了，甚至好像都不是小调了，所以才把琪露诺设定为道中boss。
不过我感觉开头可能还是需要一些稳扎稳打的旋律镇住场子。
另外，中间那一段听起来和天空璋真的很像。
2020年6月作曲 |translation =Stage 1 Theme.
My original intent was to imitate ''Double Dealing Character'' and ''Hidden Star in Four Seasons''' stage 1 themes. This version here is the result of several rounds of revision.
The intro melody is indeed a bit too happy, it's almost like it isn't a minor key. So that's why we made Cirno the midboss.
I still feel like the beginning needs a bit of a more stable melody to hold down the fort.
Also, the middle really sounds like ''Hidden Star in Four Seasons''.
Composed June 2020. |source1 =Demo Version |comment1 =第一面的主题曲。
非常悠扬轻快的曲子，制造了夏日，蓝天，烈日，波光粼粼的湖水的感觉
并且因为有琪露诺登场，所以也安排了充满智慧感的旋律
后面的部分则是比较悠扬的感觉，抬头就会看见夕阳了呢
要入夜了。 |translation1 =Stage 1 theme.
A very leisurely and light track, creating the feeling of summer, blue skies, scorching sun, and the lake's rippling waters.
And since Cirno makes an appearance, I employed a very "smart" sounding melody.
The part near the end, in contrast, is more leisurely. If you look up, you're sure to see a setting sun.
Night is falling. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Stage 1 Boss - [[Remilia Scarlet]]'s Theme |title =Der scharlachrote Teufel |titleEN =Der scharlachrote Teufel<ref>German for "The Scarlet Devil"</ref> |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =蕾米利亚·斯卡蕾特的主题曲。
原曲：亡き王女の為のセプテット
不是“这就是最后了！”的感觉的曲子，虽然旋律有重合的部分，
一开始想写爵士乐的感觉，不过我发现爵士乐真的很难写，几经修改后就改成了爵士摇滚。
虽然这样，听起来好像也不怎么爵士摇滚，和弦用得都太简单了，节奏也非常规整。
这一首是几乎没有用东方风的乐器了啊，但是听起来很有夕阳的感觉，很合适。
2020年6月作曲，2021年4月重编曲 |translation =Remilia Scarlet's Theme.
Original Track: Septette for the Dead Princess
Not a track that says "this is it!", even though the melody matches the original.
I wanted to have a jazzy feeling, but I found out that jazz is really hard to compose, so after several rounds of revision it became jazz-rock.
Although, it still doesn't really sound like jazz-rock. The chords are too simple, and the rhythm is too regular.
This track uses almost no Touhou-style instruments, but it gives a feeling of sunset when you listen to it. Fitting.
Composed June 2020, rearranged April 2021 |source1 =Demo Version |comment1 =蕾米利亚·斯卡蕾特的主题曲。
原曲：亡き王女の為のセプテット
不是“这就是最后了！”的感觉的曲子，虽然旋律有重合的部分
我想要营造1面Boss轻松的氛围，实际上的确给人非常轻松的听感
改编后了的旋律甚至还有点滑稽感和缠绵，就像蕾米莉亚又在向咲夜撒娇了一样
平淡如水的日常，红魔馆真好啊。 |translation1 =Original Track: Septette for the Dead Princess
Not a track that says "this is it!", even though the melody matches the original.
I wanted to create the atmosphere of relaxation that comes with a stage 1 boss, and indeed it is quite relaxing to listen to.
The remixed melody even has a bit of a comedic and melodious feeling in it, like Remilia is throwing a tantrum to Sakuya again.
A daily life that is as plain as water, how relaxing the Scarlet Devil Mansion must be. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Stage 2 Theme |title =日暮之下，恶魔的舞会 |titleEN =Devil's Ball At Dusk |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =第二面的主题曲。
本意是模仿天空璋的1面和2面道中曲，这么标志性的配器应该不难听出来。
这一曲的重点是营造氛围，夕阳和夜晚的氛围。
2020年8月作曲 |translation =Stage 2 Theme.
My intention was to imitate the Stage 1 and 2 themes from ''Hidden Star in Four Seasons''. It shouldn't be hard to tell given such distinctive accompaniment.
The point of this theme is to create atmosphere, one of dusk and night.
Composed August 2020. |source1 =Demo Version |comment1 =第二面的主题曲。
给人夕阳和入夜感的曲子。整体上来讲，本曲是比较注重营造氛围的
背景的夕阳给人一种无尽的感觉，让人焦虑，不过幸好很快就入夜了
随后就是夜中的星星点点，地上是发光的蘑菇，天上则是星光朦胧
但其实夜晚的森林，更加危机四伏。 |translation1 =Stage 2 Theme.
Gives one a feeling of "sunset" and "nightfall". As a whole, this track focuses more on creating atmosphere.
The setting sun in the background gives one an anxious feeling of endlessness, but luckily night will fall soon.
After that will be the starlight of night, the ground glowing with mushrooms, the skies blurred with starlight. But dangers abound in the forests of night. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Stage 2 Boss - Artemina Lune's Theme |title =Dasos-Poliouchos |titleEN =Dasos-Poliouchos<ref>Transliteration of the Greek phrase Δάσος Πολιούχος (Lit. "patron saint of the forest").</ref> |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =阿尔特米娜·露妮的主题曲。
很满意的一首曲子，分为两个部分，
开头的钢琴独奏部分，是现在流行的舞曲的风格，美丽而优雅的感觉。
主旋律的两次变调也是一次全新的尝试。
而到了中段，则是模仿了风见幽香的主题曲，从旋律到配器都有模仿。
那首曲子的年代感我非常喜欢，同时也觉得用在这里和这个人物身上是很合适的。
2020年8月作曲 |translation=Artemina Lune's Theme
Very satisfied with this track. There's two parts: The piano solo at the beginning is in the style of dance music that's popular nowadays, and has a feeling of beauty of elegance.
Changing the key of the main melody twice was also a totally new experiment.
Now in the middle section, I imitated Yuuka Kazami's theme, both in melody and instrumentation.
I really liked that theme's vibe, and also thought it fitting to use with this character.
Composed August 2020. |source1 =Demo Version |comment1 =阿尔特米娜 • 露妮的主题曲。
听起来优雅但又有些悲伤感的曲子，和人设很搭，毕竟是保护动物的神明
这首曲子的旋律我很满意，编配起来也感到有些许吃力
中间的一段则是花映冢后期的曲子常见的写法，再配合主旋律，
写的时候就会觉得“会不会激烈过头而像后面的曲子”了
毕竟都是已经存在了千年以上的人物，所以曲子也要有类似的见证沧海桑田的感觉。 |translation1 =Artemina Lune's Theme
A theme that is both elegant yet sorrowful. Fitting for her character setting, since she's a god that protects animals.
I'm quite satisfied with this track's melody, but arranging it took a bit of effort.
One of the sections in the middle uses technique common in Phantasmagoria of Flower View's lategame tracks.
Combined with the main melody, I thought while composing "Will this be too energetic and sound like a lategame track?"
Since she's existed for over a millenia, her track should also have a similar feeling of "I've witnessed all the skies and seas". }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Stage 3 Theme |title =中世纪的晚霞 |titleEN =Red Glow of a Medieval Evening |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =第三面的主题曲。
经历过一次大改的曲子，因为一开始并不知道3面道中还有一个穿越结界的场景，
所以整个曲子的前41秒几乎全部都重做了，为了配合背景而做出很大的修改。
前41秒是穿越大结界，所以用笙做出了很寂静的感觉，配合幻想乡寂静的夜晚。
进入隧道后曲子也随之展开，穿越结界后就是西欧的田野和夕阳，
整首曲子的配器和旋律也是根据这个印象来进行的。
2020年7月作曲，2021年2月重编曲 |translation =Stage 3 Theme.
A track that underwent a massive revision, because in the beginning we didn't know there would be a "crossing the border" scene at the beginning of stage 3.
The first 41 seconds of the track had to basically be completely redone to fit with the background.
The first 41 seconds are crossing the border, so I used a Sheng (笙) to create a feeling of peace, to go with the tranquil night of Gensokyo.
After entering the tunnel, the track also follows and unfolds. After crossing the barrier we come to Western Europe's crop fields and setting sun.
The whole track's instrumentation and melody were developed according to this vision.
Composed July 2020, rearranged February 2021. |source1 =Demo Version |comment1 =第三面的主题曲。
这首曲子可以说是听起来很不“东方”了，吉他扫弦配上排箫，完全给人一副欧洲田野的印象
事实上也的确是这样的场景
晚霞啊，确实很有晚霞的感觉，浪迹天涯的吟游诗人，望着远方，回头是故乡。 |translation1 =Stage 3 Theme.
This track is not very "Touhou" at all. Guitar strums paired with panpipes gives one the impression of a European countryside.
Though to be fair, that is the exact setting.
Ah, evening glow, it does have the feeling of evening glow.
Imagine a poet who wanders the lands and seas, looking ahead into the distance, and back at their homeland. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Stage 3 Boss - Eliphia Matthew's Theme |title =Histoiren de la magie |titleEN =Histoiren de la magie<ref>French for "History of Magic"</ref> |composer =百灵猫neko & H2SO4 |comment =伊莉菲亚·玛修的主题曲。
体验版的最终战，这一作的第一首合作曲，
从这里开始就是摇滚的曲子了，不过配器还是用了很多大键琴，小提琴之类的乐器，
制造优雅的感觉。
最后一段副歌，H2SO4修改的我的主旋律我非常满意。
2020年7月作曲 |translation =Eliphia Matthew's Theme.
The last theme in the demo, the first collab in the game.
Here it starts to become rock tracks. But in the instrumentation I still used a lot of harpsichord, violin, and similar instruments to create an elegant feeling.
I'm very happy with how H2SO4 adjusted my melody in the last chorus.
Composed July 2020. |source1 =Demo Version |comment1 =伊莉菲亚·玛修的主题曲。
非常给人欧式优雅感的曲子，毕竟双方都不是真刀真枪的战斗
虽然完全不差战斗的激烈感，不过曲子里，其实有一种思念感
管风琴一拉起来，就会让人觉得细水长流，说来话长
说不定，其实有很多故事呢，穿越时空的女巫。 |translation1 =Eliphia Matthew's Theme.
A track filled with European refinement, since both sides aren't fighting very seriously.
Although the track is not lacking in the excitement of battle, but there's a sort of longing feeling in it.
Once the pipe organ<ref>This appears to be a typo and likely refers to the violin instead.</ref> comes up, it gives one the feeling of "slow and steady" and "there's a long story".
In fact, she could have many stories, this time-traveling shrine maiden. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Stage 4 Theme |title =黄金之国，今夜无眠 |titleEN =The Country of Gold Rests Not Tonight |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =栖霞园的主题曲。
栖霞园正式版的序章，我认为4面道中曲作为正式版的第一首曲子，要有“打开新世界”，
“拉开序幕”的感觉。要让观众感觉到焕然一新，感到震撼。
抱着这样的想法，这一首曲子我选择了适合栖霞园背景的管弦风编曲，要做出雄伟壮丽，
富丽堂皇的感觉。特别是前奏，那短短的30秒我写了将近10个小时，就是要那将前3面的
低迷一口气全部爆发出来的感觉。后面的曲子也全部都是以庄严肃穆为基调进行。
2020年10月作曲 |translation =Abendrot's Theme.
The first chapter of the full version of Blue Devil in the Belvedere. My opinion is that as the first new track of a full game, stage 4 themes should have a feeling of "opening up a new world" or "pulling back the curtains".
It should spark a new sense awe in listeners.
With that in mind, I chose to use an orchestral style fitting Abendrot's setting, intending to create feelings of grandeur.
Of particular importance was the introduction. I spent nearly 10 hours on those short 30 seconds in order in order to release all the energy built up over the first three stages.
All the tracks after this one are also developed on a serious, solemn foundation.
Composed October 2020. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Stage 4 Boss - Marguerite Lechat's Theme |title =Golden Cinderella |titleEN =Golden Cinderella |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =玛格丽特·勒夏的主题曲。
这一首就是按照摇滚的感觉来写的，充满诡异和滑稽感的摇滚，这个人物也是这样的感觉。
我做的4面boss曲，基本都要有一些诡异，鬼畜的感觉，这次也不例外。
小号的写法是一次全新的尝试，这样的小号会给曲子很灵活的感觉，
倒不如说这样才是常用的写法。
副歌我选择了最为扎实的和声进行，是为了让这首曲子能镇住场子。
2020年9月作曲 |translation =Marguerite Lechat's Theme
A track composed with a feeling of rock and roll, a very strange and mischievous sort of rock and roll. This character also has the same sort of feeling.
All the stage 4 boss themes I've made have this sort of mischievous sensation, and this time is no exception.
The trumpets were composed in an entirely new way, in order to give the track more vibrancy and live.
Though I guess this is the way they should be used.
For chorus, I chose the most reliable chord progressions, so that this track can hold up the setting and scenario.
Composed September 2020. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Stage 5 Theme |title =满月星河图 |titleEN =Full Moon Constellation Chart |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =第五面的主题曲。
基本上原作的5面道中曲，大多数都是比较悲伤，缓慢的曲子。
按照这种影响，我也做了一首这样感觉的曲子，一开始是想作凯尔特风的曲子的，
不过发现那种风格的曲子还是不适合作为STG的配乐，所以最后还是用了舞曲鼓增强节奏感。
不过总体还是希望是一首感人的曲子。
2020年11月作曲 |translation =Stage 5 Theme.
Most stage 5 themes in the mainline games are more melancholic and contemplative.
Following this influence, I also composed a similar track with the intention of making a Celtic-style track.
But then I discovered that that style of track doesn't really fit with an STG, so I went back to using dance music drums to bolster the rhythm.
But overall, I still hope it's a rather moving track.
Composed November 2020. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Stage 5 Boss - Lycaropia Hearn's Theme |title =今夜的芒上月<ref>More exactly, 芒上月 refers to the 20-point August-suit Hanafuda card, which depicts a rising full moon</ref> ～ Underworld Loup-garo！ |titleEN =Tonight's Full Moon ~ Underworld Loup-garo!<ref>Loup-garo: A werewolf-like creature from French folklore</ref> |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =莱卡洛普娅·赫恩的主题曲。
充满跳跃感的活泼的曲子。这首曲子的副歌旋律可能是我写过最好听，最抓耳的旋律了，
我非常满意。这样的和声就很容易写出有幸福感和思念感的旋律，很适合这个人物。
这样的旋律，也非常有终局感，适合放在5面boss的位置。
小号的写法和4面boss一样，副歌还参考了祈华梦6面boss的写法。
这个地方是6面最终之战前最后一个高潮。
2021年2月作曲 |translation =Lycaropia Hearn's Theme
A hopping, lively track. The chorus melody of this track is probably the best-sounding and most ear-gripping melody I've written.
I'm very happy with it. This kind of accompaniment makes it very easy to compose a melody with a feeling of happiness and reminiscence, and is fitting for this character.
This kind of melody also has a feeling of a conclusion, and works well in the stage 5 boss position.
The trumpet composition method is the same as the stage 4 boss, and the chorus also references the stage 6 boss theme from Elegant Impermanence of Sakura.
This place is the last climax before the final battle in stage 6.
Composed February 2021. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Stage 6 Theme |title =永恒王权契约 |titleEN =Eternal Kingship Contract |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =最终面的主题曲。
有预备，有冲刺，有上升，有星空的曲子。摇滚风格的曲子，要的就是帅。
最终战前过渡的曲子，这里的视听配合我和其他制作组成员花了不少功夫去设计。
东方主旋律在最后提醒各位这是一个东方游戏。
2020年11月作曲 |translation =Final Stage Theme.
A track with a sense of preparation, a sense of pursuit, a sense of rising, and a starry sky. Rock and roll tracks are so cool.
As a transitional track to the final battle, I and the other members of the team spent quite a bit of time making the visuals and music accompany each other well.
The Touhou main theme at the end is to remind everyone that this is a Touhou game.
Composed November 2020. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Stage 6 Boss - Sonia von Auersperg's Theme |title =耸立山巅的长明灯 ～ the End of History |titleEN =Eternal Flame Towering Atop the Mountain Peak ~ the End of History |composer =百灵猫neko & H2SO4 |comment =索妮亚·冯·奥尔斯佩的主题曲。
毫无疑问，从开头像是高喊最终的战斗宣言一般爆发，赌上七年左右的人生积攒的中二力量写的曲子。 大概是“这就是终焉的决战了！”的感觉，仿佛能够脑补出像是诸神黄昏一般的史诗感，
虽然诸神黄昏似乎串戏了（笑）最后实在是忍不住写了很长很长的曲子，这种史诗感也非常令人满意。
编曲方面，有参考辉针城和星莲船的最终boss战曲，还有参考街机游戏雷电5的最终boss战曲。
另外，曲子里喊的词的大意是“伟大的索尼娅女王，带领栖霞园走向无上的荣光。”
2021年2月作曲 |translation =Sonia von Auersperg's Theme
From the very start, this is an explosive declaration of a final battle, a track composed by using all of the chuuni energy accumulated over seven years. It's a feeling of "this is the final battle!", you can almost fill in an epic impression of Ragnarok in your head, although that's the wrong series (lol).
In the end, I couldn't hold back and composed a really, really long track, with quite satisfying epicness.
In terms of composition, I drew inspiration from the final boss themes of Double Dealing Character and Undefined Fantastic Object, and also the final boss theme from the arcade game Raiden 5.
Also, the chanting in the track means approximately "Oh, Great Queen Sonia, guide Abendrot towards unrivaled glory!"
Composed February 2021. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Extra Stage Theme |title =尼德霍格所做之梦 |titleEN =Nidhogg's Dream |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =Extra面的主题曲。
应该不难听出开头是模仿辉针城的ex面道中曲。要的就是雷云那种强大的威圧感。
到了中段，则是模仿妖妖梦的ex面道中曲，要的就是快速的大键琴疾驰的感觉。
中间的钢琴独奏和最后的小号协奏，很明显是参考地灵殿的ex面道中曲，
要的就是那种最终展开的感觉，最终战前的抒情。
整体而言，我把原作的曲子中的感觉，拿到了这里来和这一关的ex道中演出相配合。
2021年1月作曲 |translation =Extra Stage Theme.
It shouldn't be hard to tell that the beginning imitates Double Dealing Character's extra stage theme, aiming to capture the majesty of those thunderclouds.
While in the middle, I emulated Perfect Cherry Blossom's extra stage theme, aiming to capture the rushing sensation of rapid harpsichord.
The piano solo in the middle and the trumpet accompaniment at the end are obviously inspired by the extra stage theme of Subterranean Animism, aiming to capture the way the stage finally unfolds and the lyricism before the final fight.
Altogether, I took various feelings from the original games' tracks, and matched them here to this extra stage's presentation.
Composed January 2021. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Extra Stage Boss - Kleine Gluttony's Theme |title =Den Vals af Ragnarok |titleEN =Den Vals af Ragnarok<ref>Danish for "The Waltz of Ragnarok"</ref> |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =可莱娜·古拉托尼的主题曲。
改编自一首拉丁名曲，不过和那首曲子没任何关联。
而且曲子也并不是真正的华尔兹。只有那种气氛而已（汗）。
不过，这首曲子是真的放飞自我了，配器方面采用了拉丁乐的配器，没有使用原作的配器。
听起来很优雅，这也是优雅的猫猫需要的喵。
2021年3月作曲 |translation =Kleine Gluttony's Theme.
Arranged from a famous Latin song, but has nothing to do with that song.
And the track isn't really a real waltz either, it just has that sort of atmosphere (sweats).
But I really went all out on this track, using only Latin instruments and no instruments from the original works.
It sounds very high-class and elegant, fitting for an elegant kitty nya?
Composed March 2021. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Ending Theme |title =破晓之时 |titleEN =The Moment of Daybreak |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =结局画面的主题曲。
这个游戏唯一一首使用了风神录风格乐器的曲子。一开始并没有想到会用在游戏里。
其实这种悠闲，宁静感觉的曲子我也很擅长。
2020年8月作曲 |translation =Ending Theme.
The only track in this game to use ''Mountain of Faith'' style instruments. I didn't intend to use them in this game at all.
To be honest, I'm quite good at these relaxed, peaceful tracks.
Composed August 2020. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Staff Roll Theme |title =布巴斯提斯神祭 |titleEN =Bubastis<ref>An ancient Egyptian city known for its worship of Bastet, the Egyptian cat goddess.</ref> Divine Ritual |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =原曲：U.N.オーエンは彼女なのか?
东方栖霞园的片尾曲，是热闹的宴会和吟游诗人感的曲子。
参考了许多凯尔特风格曲子的写法，也非常感谢猫步聚聚的指导。
可能有人听不出来哪里有原曲的旋律，不过我写非东方风的曲子一向比较“原曲粉碎机”，
…所以，请见谅。
2021年5月作曲 |translation =Original Track: U.N. Owen was Her?
''Blue Devil in the Belvedere'''s Credits theme. A track with the feelings of a bustling feast and of wandering poets.
I looked to many Celtic pieces for inspiration in the composition. Thanks 貓步 for his guidance as well.
Some people might not be able to hear the original track's melody, but the Touhou-style tracks I write have always been sort of a "grind up the original track" kind of deal
...so, please forgive me.
Composed May 2021. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =Player's Score Theme |title =Player's Score |titleEN =Player's Score |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =满身疮痍时的主题曲。
原曲：プレイヤーズスコア
这回没时间做新的疮痍曲了，就这样吧。
2021年4月作曲 |translation =Game Over Theme.
Original Track: Player's Score
This time around I had no time to make an original game over theme, so it'll just be this.
Composed April 2021. |source1 =Demo Version |comment1 =满身疮痍时的主题曲，可以说是最不想听到的曲子了。
和原作使用了一样的配器，但是部分换成了自己的旋律。
时间上要长一点，不过只有前几秒能发挥作用……大概。 |translation1 = }}
==PV Tracks== {{MusicRoom |category =PV 1 Background Music |title =栖霞童话 |titleEN =Abendrot Fairy Tale |composer =百灵猫neko |comment =宣传PV1的主题曲。
这是为一个宏大，又令人叹息的故事所作的配乐。
充满故事感和历史感，娓娓道来的感觉。
东方主旋律贯穿了整首曲子，最后给人一种令人期待的未来的感觉。
2021年1月作曲 |translation =PV1 Theme.
This is music to accompany a grand, yet melancholic story.
It has the sensation of a long story, and of history.
The main Touhou melody runs throughout the entire track, and gives one a feeling of excitement for the future.
Composed January 2021. }}
{{MusicRoom |category =PV 2 Background Music |title =绯红帝国 |titleEN =Scarlet Empire |composer =H2SO4 |comment =宣传PV2的主题曲。 原曲：亡き王女の為のセプテット，U.N.オーエンは彼女なのか?
Bonus Track！自从2015年开始写曲不久就一直想给蕾米写首威严帅气的曲子！
但一直没能写出来就挺遗憾的。然后在今年除夕脑子一热就全开了450%左右的火力去写了。
最后的效果都在预料之中地满意，和脑子里想的简直一模一样。
词作、混音和Vocal也是相当给力啊，相当完美DAZE！
2021年2月作曲 |translation =PV2 Theme.
Original Track: Septette for the Dead Princess, U.N. Owen was Her?
Bonus Track! Not long after I started composing in 2015, I've always wanted to compose a awe-inspiring and cool track for Remi!
It's a disappointment I wasn't able to compose one for so long, but during Chinese New Year's Eve this year I had a spark in my brain and composed it all, using around 450% power.
The final result made me very happy, and essentially matched completely what I had in mind.
The lyrics, mixing, and vocals were also had a lot of effort put in and came out pretty well DAZE!
Composed February 2021. }}
==Notes== {{reflist}}
{{Navbox BDitB}} [[Category:Music by Game]] [[Category:Translations]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom |category =Title screen |title =幻想一夜物語 ～ Asterhyshm Line |roma =Gensō ichiya monogatari |titleEN =Fantastic Tale of One Night ~ Asterhyshm Line |composer =Mace |comment =タイトル画面のテーマです。 星空と雨を意識しつつ、割といつもの感じに落ち着いたかなと。出撃準備って雰囲気です。ええ。雨の音ってなんだか落ち着きません？人によるのかしら。 |translation =This is the title screen theme. While keeping starry skies and rain in mind, I feel like it settled down to [[Theme of Eastern Story|a pretty familiar feeling]]. It's got a 'making preparations to move out' atmosphere. Yes. Doesn't the sound of rain calm you down? Maybe it varies between people. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 1 theme |title =フラワリングパッセージ |roma =Furawaringupassēji |titleEN =Flowering Passage |composer =Shower |comment =1面のテーマです。 初っぱならしく、これから何が始まるのかな？という期待交えた妖しげな雰囲気と開花の悦びを表現しました。サビで一気にヒラけるかんじ、とても好きです。花ビラだけに。 |translation =This is the stage 1 theme. This song represents the initial expectation of "what's going to happen?" mixed with a suspicious atmosphere and the joy of flowers in bloom. I really like the 'wide spreading' feel of the main melody. Although it's just petals that are spreading. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 1 Boss - [[Book of Star Mythology/Characters#Fabritis and Iphonea|Fabritis and Iphonea]]'s theme |title =妖花乱麻 ～ Warning Glory! |roma =Yōka ranma |titleEN =A Tangle of Mystic Flowers ~ Warning Glory! |composer =Nana Yakayama and Ouka Shinomura |comment =ファブリティス&イフォーニアのテーマです。 仲良く共闘する様子をサビの追いかけで表現してみました。元気な妖精っていいですよね。なんというか……いいよね！姉妹丼ではなく他人丼とはこれいかに。 |translation =This is Fabritis and Iphonea's theme. We tried representing a friendly joint struggle with the main melody's follow-up. Energetic fairies sure are great. They're just so, y'know... great! How's that for a sibling sandwich-- or rather, a stranger sandwich. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 2 theme |title =夕焼けトンビを追って |roma =Yūyake tonbi o otte |titleEN =Chase Black Kites Over the Sunset |composer =Yoiyami |comment =2面のテーマです。 タイトル通り、宵闇時の節操感そのものをイメージしつつ、単純ですがトンビの鳴き声を演出として入れてみました。関係ないですが僕は最近カラスに糞を落とされました。頭に。 |translation =This is the stage 2 theme. In keeping with the title, I envisioned the principled feeling of twilight; also, while it's rather simple, I added the cry of a kite to fit the gameplay. This is unrelated, but recently I was pooped on by a crow. On my head. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 2 Boss - [[Book of Star Mythology/Characters#Tobiko Takatou|Tobiko Takatou]]'s theme |title =風雷の鳶加藤 |roma =Kaze kaminari no tobikatō |titleEN =The Tobi Katou{{nihongo|[[wikipedia:Katō Danzō|Katou Danzou]]|加藤 段蔵, Danzō Katō}} was a famed 16th century ninja master during the Sengoku Period who was also known as {{nihongo|"Tobi Katō"|飛び加藤, flying Katou}}, due to his alleged ability to fly. According to legend, he was a practitioner of sorcery and preformed amazing feats such as swallowng a bull whole in front of a crowd of 20 people, which is rather fitting if you consider Tobiko's personality and backstory. of Wind and Thunder |composer =Ryuuou |comment =鷹藤 鳶子のテーマです。 それは残像だッ！一見強敵なんですが、その誇り高き性格からか逆にこらしめたくなるザコ役のニオイがプンプンしてきます。スピーディでミステリック。まあでも、所詮2面止まりな曲。 |translation =This is Tobiko Takatou's theme. T'was merely an afterimage! She seems strong at first glance, but perhaps because of her aloof personality, she reeks of a small-fry character that you'd want to beat up. Very speedy and mysterious. But, well, it's only a Stage 2 theme in the end. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 3 theme |title =天下分け目の星結界 |roma =Tenkawakeme no hoshi kekkai |titleEN =Star Barrier of the Decisive Moment Under Heaven |composer =HAMRIKU |comment =3面のテーマです。 広大な星空は、想像よりも騒々しく...。物語はまだ中盤ですが、曲の方は思い切り盛り上げてみました。ここがターニングポイント。まさに天下分け目なのです。 |translation =This is the stage 3 theme. The vast starry sky, far more boisterous than imagined... we're only halfway through the story, but I tried to enliven the music as much as I could. This is the turning point. Truly a 'decisive moment under heaven'. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 3 Boss - [[Book of Star Mythology/Characters#Shelia Lyrac|Shelia Lyrac]]'s theme |title =レインティアケージ |roma =Reintiakēji |titleEN =Rain Tear Cage |composer =Minatsuki |comment =シェリア・リュラックのテーマです。 なんだかとっても怪しげな曲ですね。雨に光が当たるときらきらします。星みたいです。そんなきらきら感を意識しつつ作りました。 |translation =This is Shelia Lyrac's theme. This track really does sound somehow suspicious. The rain shines brightly when light hits it. Almost like stars. I composed this with that shining feeling in mind. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 4 theme |title =輝く夜を侵す者 |roma =Kagayakuyoru o okasu mono |titleEN =Those Who Raid the Glimmering Night |composer =Monday |comment =4面のテーマです。 迷いの竹林を突っ切っていくイメージで作りました。迷いつつも、ただただ前に進んでいく、…そんな感じです。少し原作曲のオマージュ的な要素も入れてみましたがどうでしょうか。 |translation =This is the stage 4 theme. I made this while imagining a swift crossing through the Bamboo Forest. Though lost, one gradually proceeds forward... that sort of feeling. I also added some small homages to music from the official series; what do you think? }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 4 Boss - [[Book of Star Mythology/Characters#Ichiyou Mochizuki|Ichiyou Mochizuki]]'s theme |title =九曜天照 ～ Sunlight Reburst |roma =Kuyō Amaterasu |titleEN =Amaterasu of the Nine Luminaries ~ Sunlight Reburst |composer =Francium |comment =望月 一曜のテーマです。 色んな術を使う派手派手しい忍者です。忍者のクセにそれって忍んでないんじゃ、って感じですがそれが今のトレンドなんです。曲も、そこそこの和風感とそこそこの威圧感を出してみたつもりです。 |translation =This is Ichiyou Mochizuki's theme. She's a super-flashy ninja who uses various jutsu. She has sort of a "why aren't you hiding more if you're a ninja?" feel, but that's the trend nowadays. My intention with this track was to give somewhat of a classical Japanese feeling and somewhat of an intimidating feeling. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 5 theme |title =進撃の相州喇叭 |roma =Shingeki no Soushuu Rappa |titleEN =Attack on Soushuu Rappa Likely a play on the manga Attack on Titan (進撃の巨人). 'Soushuu Rappa' (相州乱破) was one of Fuuma Kotarou's titles. 'Soushuu' was another name for Fuuma's birthplace of Sagami province, and 'Rappa' was another term for ninja. The Japanese word for 'trumpet' is also 'rappa', spelled either with katakana (ラッパ) or with the kanji 喇叭 as in the song title. |composer =KAI |comment =５面のテーマです。 一歩ずつ歩み出し、次第に増してゆく軽快さと少しばかりの恐怖。そんなイメージを曲に込めました。進撃と喇叭がテーマの力強い曲調の中に、どこか闇夜のような美しさや妖しさが表現できていればなと。 |translation =This is the stage 5 theme. A jaunty feeling that gradually increases as you take one step after another, and just a little bit of terror. That's the mental image I put into this track. It's got a powerful melody themed around trumpets and an advancing march, but I hope it somehow expresses the beauty and dubious allure of a dark night as well. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 5 Boss - [[Book of Star Mythology/Characters#Nezu Akitsu|Nezu Akitsu]]'s theme |title =イルネスイリュージョナー |roma =Irunesu iryūjonā |titleEN =Illness Illusioner |composer =Yoko Yasha |comment =明津　禰津のテーマです。 キャラの設定資料を見て和と妖を自分なりに表現してみました。キャラクターがとても素晴らしいのでそれにふさわしい曲になっているといいんですが、、（汗） |translation =This is Nezu Akitsu's theme. While viewing the character's backstory materials, I tried to express traditional Japan and youkai in my own way. She's a wonderful character, so it'd be great if the track lives up to that... *sweating* }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 6 theme |title =光と影の魔宝城 |roma =Hikatokage no mahōjō |titleEN =The Mahoujou of Light and Shadow |composer =Io-kun |comment =６面のテーマです。 忍びの世界とは奥深いものです。影の世界で暮らしているとやはり太陽の光には弱いのでしょうか。ボス曲に繋げやすいように短い構成にしています。聴きやすいといいなあ（＾＾； |translation =This is the stage 6 theme. The world of shinobi is certainly deep. If they live in a world of shadow, you'd think they'd be pretty weak to sunlight, right? I composed the track with a short structure so that it'd be easy to lead into the boss music. I hope it's easy to listen to (^^ ; ) }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 6 Boss - [[Book of Star Mythology/Characters#Fuma Mishandra|Fuma Mishandra]]'s theme |title =言ノ葉ノ大魔法　～　Starry Wisdom |roma =Kotonoha no dai mahō |titleEN =Great Magic of the Power of Words ~ Starry Wisdom |composer =Wanwan |comment =フーマ・ミシャンドラのテーマです。 言葉によって感情を表現したり相互理解を行うことは、ある意味で魔法のようなものなのかもしれませんね。曲の方は私らしいラスボス風でどこか古くさい感じにしました。 |translation =This is Fuma Mishandra's theme. Using words to express your emotions and understand each other might, in a way, be a sort of magic itself. As for the track, I composed it in my typical 'final boss' style, and made it somehow antiquated-sounding. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 6 Boss - [[Book of Star Mythology/Characters#Fuma Mishandra|Fuma Mishandra]]'s Last Spell theme |title =風な恨みそ花の春　～　Eternal Wind |roma =Kazena urami-so hana no haru |titleEN =Hate not the Wind, Spring Blossoms ~ Eternal Wind Taken from the final line of Houjou Ujimasa's death poem: 吹きとふく '''風な恨みそ 花の春''' 紅葉も残る 秋あらばこそ (Hate not the blowing wind, spring blossoms, for neither is there an autumn where the red leaves last). |composer =古山智之(khirio) |comment =？？？のテーマです。 原曲のラスボス感に、さらに宇宙っぽさを足りしてみました。静かに灯った光がだんだん大きくなっていくような、そんな感じ・・・かな？精神とはこころの中の宇宙である、なんてね。 |translation =This is ???'s theme. I took the feeling of the official series' final boss music, and added even more of a space-ish feel to it. It's like a small, tranquil light gradually getting bigger and bigger... I suppose? One's mind is a universe inside one's heart, or something. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Extra Stage theme |title =アケローン彼岸旅行 |roma =Akerōn higan ryokō |titleEN =[[wikipedia:Acheron|Acheron]] [[Higan]] Voyage |composer =Prism |comment =エキストラステージのテーマです。
おまけ(EX)感を出来るだけ目指したつもりです。
ちょっとダークな雰囲気が漂っています。三途の川だからもう少し
朗らかな感じが良いのかも、とも思いましたが…
まあ冥界に近いしね、という事で。 |translation =This is the Extra Stage theme.
I tried to shoot for as much of an 'extra story' feeling as I could.
It's got a slightly dark atmosphere drifting about. Since it's the Sanzu River, I thought that maybe a lighter feeling could be good... but, well, it's close to the Netherworld nonetheless, so. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Extra Stage Boss - [[Book of Star Mythology/Characters#Sengo Sanada|Sengo Sanada]]'s theme |title =堕ちた英雄の剣　～　Legend of Sanada |roma =Ochita eiyū no ken |titleEN =Sword of the Fallen Hero ~ Legend of Sanada |composer =Misora |comment =真田 千子のテーマです。
なんか似たような曲を以前に作った気がしますが気のせいですね、
気のせいなんです！
どんな感じに作るか悩みましたが、結局いつも通りな私らしい感じに
仕上がっていると思います。かっこよく作れてるといいなぁ。 |translation =This is Sengo Sanada's theme.
I kind of get the feeling that I made [[White_Names_Spoiled_Past/Music#Extra_Stage_boss_-_Azuma_Himefuji's_theme|a similar song]] some time before, but... nah, it's your imagination. It's your imagination!
I was somewhat puzzled as to what feeling to compose it with, but I think it turned out pretty me-ish like always. Here's hoping it sounds cool! }} {{MusicRoom |category =Ending theme |title =琴の音と言の葉 |roma =Koto no ne to koto no e |titleEN =The Sound of a Harp and the Sound of Words |composer =Koshian |comment =エンディングのテーマです。 言葉は発することで意味を持ちます。わいわいがやがや・・・言葉と音が重なる感じに。 なんだか縁日っぽい・・・？気のせいです。とりあえず収束、そして終息。一旦ね・・・？ |translation =This is the ending theme. Words take on meaning when they're said out loud. "Blah blah, yadda yadda"... like, the feeling of when the words and sounds overlap. You say the track has kind of a festival feeling...? That's your imagination talking. Let's just finish up work for now, and then take a rest. Just a short one, okay...? }} {{MusicRoom |category =Staff Roll theme |title =天下統一ヒストリー　～　New Age Dream |roma =Tenka tōitsu hisutorī |titleEN =History of Uniting All Under Heaven ~ New Age Dream |composer =ido |comment =スタッフロールのテーマです。 古臭さと新時代を感じさせる、さっぱりとした曲です。作品の掉尾を飾るということでかなり難儀しました。暗い曲では・・・ないよね？ |translation =This is the staff roll theme. A refreshing track that gives a feeling of both antiquity and a new era. I was really hard-pressed with this one, since it crowns the finale of the game. It's not a gloomy song... right? }} {{MusicRoom |category =Score theme |title =プレイヤーズスコア |roma =Pureiyāzusukoa |titleEN =Player's Score |composer =Shower |comment = |translation = }} ==Notes== {{reflist}} {{Navbox BoSM}} [[Category: Book of Star Mythology]] [[Category:Music by Game]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title Screen | title =瑠璃色の空を超えて | roma =Ruri-iro no sora o koete | titleEN =Beyond the Azure Skies | composer =こをり (Kori) | comment =タイトル画面のテーマです。 倒壊した神社から目を逸らしつつ空へ往く。
そんな感じのイメージによる選曲です。 弾幕に疲れた貴方の心をきっと癒してくれるでしょう
体力制STGだから、そこまで疲れないかもしれませんが | translation =(Comment by Gore.) This is the title screen theme.

"Heading towards the sky, while averting your eyes from the collapsed shrine."
That's the sort of mental image I had when choosing this song.

It'll surely heal your heart when you're exhausted from all the danmaku.
Although it's a shooting game with a health meter, so you might not be all that exhausted. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Theme | title =ミスティフライト | roma =Misuti furaito | titleEN =Misty Flight | composer =ハルカ (Haruka) | comment =１面のテーマです。 春の湊に、のような底抜けに明るく爽やかな雰囲気もいいですが、
夜明け頃や、雲や霧が晴れる時のような解放感もまた粋ですね。 上記の曲のフレーズをお借りしながら、そんな雰囲気の曲に仕上げ
てみましたが、如何でしょう？ | translation =This is the Stage 1 theme.

While it's nice to have an inexhaustibly bright and breezy atmosphere like ''"At the End of Spring"'',
the sense of freedom you get at dawn, or when clouds or fog clear away, is also pretty chic.

I tried to make a song with that kind of atmosphere, while also borrowing phrases from the above-mentioned song.
What do you think? | note =*A partial arrangement of [[At the End of Spring]] from {{UFO}}. (Stage 1) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Boss - [[Nazrin]]'s Theme | title =小さな小さな賢将 | titleEN =A Tiny, Tiny, Clever Commander | roma =Chiisana chiisana kenshou | composer =NED | comment =ナズーリンのテーマです。 出来るだけ星蓮船版を尊重しつつ
門殊銭ならではの要素を入れてみました 寒くなるとたまに我が家にネズミが遊びに来るので、相応の準備を
して出迎えるのですが、最近見かけなくてしょんぼりしています。 | translation =This is Nazrin's theme.

I wanted to add some unique elements for the Bubbling Imaginary Treasures version,
while also respecting the [[Undefined Fantastic Object]] version as much as possible.

When it gets cold, mice will sometimes come over to my house and play, so I prepare accordingly and welcome them inside.
I haven't been seeing them recently, so I'm a bit depressed about it. | note =*An arrangement of [[A Tiny, Tiny, Clever Commander]] from {{UFO}}. (Stage 1 Boss; Nazrin) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Theme | title =スカイルーイン | roma =Sukai rūin | titleEN =Sky Ruin | composer =よいやみ (Yoiyami) | comment =２面のテーマです。 最近っぽく、ピコピコ多めに爽快で
スっと聴けるようなアレンジにしました。 直訳すると「空の遺跡」ですが、楽しい部分とミステリアスな部分が
うまく共存していて素敵な曲ですよね。海行きたい。 | translation =This is the Stage 2 theme. I arranged this one in a way similar to the recent games: lots of beeps and boops, while feeling refreshing and smooth to listen to. The title's literal translation is "ruins in the sky". I think it's a wonderful song, with fun parts
and mysterious parts that both coexist well together. I wanna visit the ocean. | note =*An arrangement of [[Sky Ruin]] from {{UFO}}. (Stage 3 Theme) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Boss - [[Shou Toramaru]]'s Theme | title =虎柄の毘沙門天 | roma =Toragara no bishamonten | titleEN =The Tiger-Patterned Bishamonten | composer =よいやみ (Yoiyami) | comment =寅丸　星のテーマです。 キャラは「寅丸」なのに曲名は「虎柄」。ややこしいですよね。
全体的に音色は最近っぽく、２面ボスなので
重すぎないようなシンセリード。なのに重厚感を出す為に
あえて少し前の東方の幻想的なスネアを鳴らしています。
う〜ん、一番偉い人の付き人なのでやっぱりそこは譲れない。 | translation =This is Shou Toramaru's theme. The "tiger" in her name is the kanji "寅", but the one in the song title is "虎". Kind of confusing.
I went for a "recent games" tone altogether, with a synth lead to keep things from feeling too heavy, since she's the Stage 2 boss.
But in spite of that, I deliberately used those fantastic-sounding snares from a slightly earlier era to give it a sense of profundity.
Mmm, well, she's the attendant to the temple's head honcho, so you can't really compromise on that part. | note =*An arrangement of [[The Tiger-Patterned Vaisravana]] from {{UFO}}. (Stage 5 Boss; Shou Toramaru) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Theme | title =輝く天空の向こう側へ | roma =Kagayaku tenkuu no mukou-gawa e | titleEN =Toward the Other Side of the Glittering Skies | composer =NED | comment =３面のテーマです。 疾走感はあるけれども、どこか余裕のある
主人公達をイメージしました。ブラス（金管楽器）を色々活躍
させられて満足しています。小町のフレーズは作者から
リクエストがあったのでねじ込みました。
空の果て、霊夢達と共にまだ見ぬ世界を体験してくださいな。 | translation =This is the Stage 3 theme. I pictured the protagonists for this one-- that is, with a sense of speed, but also somewhat relaxed.
I'm satisfied with this one, since I got to use brass instruments for a variety of things.
I also crammed the phrase from Komachi's theme in there, as per developer request.
I hope you have fun with Reimu and friends, experiencing an unknown world beyond the sky. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss - [[Joon Yorigami]] and [[Shion Yorigami]]'s Theme | title =今宵は飄逸なエゴイスト　～ Egoistic Flowers | titleEN =Tonight Stars an Easygoing Egoist ~ Egoistic Flowers | roma =Koyoi wa hyouitsu na egoisuto | composer =こをり (Kori) | comment =依神女苑＆紫苑のテーマです。 ３面を黄昏キャラ枠にするつもりはなかったんですが
前作が前作でしたので、いやまぁその流れで…。 憑依華ver1.10の後に制作してるので
色々とインスパイアを受けています（事前言い訳） | translation =(Comment by Gore.)
This is Joon and Shion Yorigami's theme.

I wasn't planning on putting Tasogare characters in Stage 3,
but since Stage 3 in the last game was what it was... well, y'know, I just sort of went with it.

I'm making this game after AoCF ver1.10 came out, so I'm taking inspiration from it in various ways. (<-- making excuse in advance) | note =*An arrangement of [[Tonight Stars an Easygoing Egoist (Live ver.) ~ Egoistic Flowers.]] from {{AoCF}}. (Final boss; Joon and Shion Yorigami) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 Theme | title =メタルバレットヘル | titleEN =Metal Bullet Hell | roma =Metaru baretto heru | composer =DO | comment =4面のテーマです。

鬼形獣リスペクトで疾走感のあるステージにしたかったのと
ここから敵も堅くなっていくので、この選曲になりました

やたら弾幕が激しいのはセンターの防衛システムという設定です
お空一人で十分な気もしてきますけど、まぁそこは気にしない | translation =(Comment by Gore.)
This is the stage 4 theme. I wanted to make a stage with a sense of speed in homage to [[Wily Beast and Weakest Creature|WBaWC]],
and the enemies get sturdier from here on out, so I chose this song.

Worldbuilding-wise, the super-harsh danmaku is coming from the Center's security system.
Feels like Okuu could probably handle the whole thing herself, but, eh, don't sweat that part too much. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 Boss - [[Satori Komeiji]]'s Theme | title =少女さとり　～ 3rd eye | titleEN =Satori Maiden ~ 3rd Eye | roma =Shoujo Satori | composer =NED | comment =古明地さとりのテーマ。

心を読まれる事を嫌がる人は多いですが、逆に言えばあれこれ
口に出さなくても通じるということなので楽でもあったり。

ファンシーな動物を可愛がる彼女ですが、もし自分の娘が
いたりしたら同じように可愛がるんでしょうか。多分ベタ目。 | translation =This is Satori Komeiji's theme.

Lots of people would hate having their mind read, but conversely,
it might also be nice to be able to express yourself without saying things out loud.

She adores fancy animals, but I wonder whether she'd adore her own daughter
in the same way if she had one. Would probably give her a blank stare. | note =*An arrangement of [[Satori Maiden ~ 3rd eye]] from {{SA}}. (Stage 4 boss; Satori Komeiji) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 Theme | title =砂漠に佇む伽藍堂 | titleEN =A Garan Temple Standing in the Desert | roma =Sabaku ni tadazumu garandou | composer =NED | comment =5面のテーマ。

゙砂塗れの世界です。
最近では黄砂の話もメッキリ巻に出てこなくなりましたね。
風が強い日だと旋風に乗って砂埃が舞いますが、
あの中を横切るのは相当苦行。運動部系女子にはちと辛かったです | translation =This is the Stage 5 theme.

A world entirely painted in sand.
It feels like there's been barely any talk about yellow dust storms lately, huh?
Dust clouds tend to kick up in whirlwinds on windy days.
It's really hard to have to cut through them. Was a bit tough for athletic-type girls, too. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 Boss - Kinkaku Umon and Ginkaku Samon's Theme | title =モンジュドウキーパーズ | titleEN =Monjudou Keepers | roma =Monjudou kīpāzu | composer =NED | comment =右門金閣&左門銀閣のテーマです。

゙野蛮に描かれたり醜く描かれたりとにかくビジュアルが
色々酷いお二人ですが、今作ではキュートに登場です。

仙人が悪さするというより、幼稚園児がダダをこねて
いるのを想像して聞いてもらえると良いかもしれません。 | translation =This is Kinkaku Umon and Ginkaku Samon's theme.

These two tend to get the short end of the stick, visually-- being drawn as barbarians, or drawn really ugly-- but their debut in this game is a cute one.

It might be better to picture a couple of kindergarteners throwing a fit
as you listen to this one, rather than a couple of hermits doing evil. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Theme | title =地底の奥深く | titleEN =In the Innermost Depths of the Earth | roma =Chitei no oku fukaku | composer =イガグリ (Igaguri) | comment =6面のテーマです。(原曲:業火マントル)

゙溶岩の上に建つ堂閣のイメージでアレンジ曲をお借りしました。
前半面は星蓮船、後半面は地霊殿リスペクトなのでこの曲に。

ラストダンジョンと言えば、何といっても溶岩の城ですよね。
居住区は排熱対策で塔の上層部の様です。それでも暑そうですけど | translation =(Comment by Gore.)
This is the stage 6 theme.

I borrowed this arrangement while picturing a tall temple built atop magma.
The game's first half is a homage to [[Undefined Fantastic Object|UFO]], and the latter half is [[Subterranean Animism|SA]], so this is the song of choice.

When you hear the words "final dungeon", the number-one pick has gotta be a magma castle.
The residential section is on top of the tower and heat-proofed. Still seems pretty hot, though. | note =*An arrangement of [[Hellfire Mantle]] from {{SA}}. (Stage 6 theme) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Boss - Zenzai Monjuin's Theme | title =善財童子の讃嘆 ～ Bubbling Imaginary Treasures | titleEN =Extolment of Shancai Tongzi ~ Bubbling Imaginary Treasures | roma =Zenzai-douji no santan | composer =NED | comment =文殊院　善罪のテーマです。

゙荘厳と爽やかがなるべく半々くらいになるようにしてみました。

根はきっと生真面目な子ですので、おそらく気苦労が
絶えないんでしょう。人生、程々に注意しつつが一番。
でもST6では全力で弾幕を避けましょう。 | translation =This is Zenzai Monjuin's theme.

I tried to strike as much of an equal balance as possible between "majestic" and "refreshing".

She's sure to be a really straight-laced girl at heart, so she probably has to deal with an
endless stream of anxiety. Caution in moderation is the best way to go through life.
But this is Stage 6, so make sure to put all your effort into dodging the danmaku. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage Theme | title =ラストリモート | titleEN =Last Remote | roma =Rasuto rimōto | composer =こをり (Kori) | comment =エキストラのテーマです。

゙地霊殿の交信強度システムをゲームに再現した時から、
「エキストラのテーマはこれにしよう!」と決めてました。

リモートと言えば、昨今だとリモートワークの印象ですね
元から遠隔で連絡取ってる私には一切関係ありませんが…。 | translation =(Comment by Gore.)
This is the Extra Stage theme.

Ever since I recreated SA's signal strength system in-game,
I'd decided that "I've gotta make this the Extra Stage theme!".

"Remote" brings "remote work" to mind pretty strongly as of late, huh?
Not that it makes much difference to me, since I already communicate long-distance... | note =*An arrangement of [[Last Remote]] from {{SA}}. (Extra stage theme) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage Boss - Geppai Son's Theme | title =ガンダーラのユートピア | titleEN =Gandhara's Utopia | roma =Gandāra no yūtopia | composer =NED | comment =孫　月字のテーマです。

月字の名前のとおり、普通に東方っぽい曲を作ったら
出来そうにない、最も遠くにありそうなパートを作ってみました。

というかプリキュアっぽいのを目指して書いだらそうなるんです。
まあ最近の東方は全体的にそんな感じだし。 | translation =This is Geppai Son's theme.

As Geppai's name indicates, I tried to make something that sounded as far away from
normal Touhou as possible; something you'd never get with a regular TH-style song.

Or rather, I tried to write something Precure-ish, and ended up with this.
Well, recent Touhou is all like that anyway, so. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending Theme | title =茜色の空に包まれて | titleEN =Surrounded by Crimson Skies | roma =Akane-iro no sora ni tsutsumarete | composer =NED | comment =エンディングのテーマです。

タイトル曲のアレンジです。

優しく、キラキラしたイメージで作りました。 | translation =This is the ending theme.

It's an arrangement of the title theme.

I composed this one with a gentle, sparkling image in mind. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll Theme | title =地獄からの帰還 | titleEN =Returning Home from Hell | roma =Jigoku kara no kikan | composer =DO | comment =スタッフロールのテーマです。

4面のテーマを専用にアレンジしてもらいました。
疲労感と達成感による弾幕燃え尽き症候群が昧わえるでしょう

間欠泉地下センター経由での帰還なので、
背景も4面の逆再生になってます。 | translation =(Comment by Gore.)
This is the staff roll theme.

I specifically requested an arrangement of the Stage 4 theme for this game.
It'll probably give you a taste of danmaku burnout symptoms, from the sense of exhaustion and accomplishment.

Since the player returns home via the Underground Geyser Center,
the background is also the Stage 4 background played in reverse. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Name Register Theme | title =プレイヤーズスコア | roma =Pureiyāzu sukoa | titleEN =Player's Score | composer =NED | comment =ネームレジストのテーマです。 かるーい感じやフワフワした感じにしてみました。
やっぱり最後の曲は可愛くなちゃね。 屋根を吹き飛ばすくらいカワイくしたかったのですが、
曲の特性上どうしても暗さが残ります。 | translation =This is the name registration theme. I tried to give a light and airy feeling.
The last song has to be cute, after all. I wanted to make it cute enough to blow the roof off of a house,
but due to the characteristics of the song, the darkness remains no matter what. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Congratulations Screen Theme | title =コンプリート・アチーブメント | titleEN =Complete Achievement | roma =Konpurīto achībumento | composer =NED | comment =コングラッチュレーション画面のテーマです。

実績を全て解除した人が聞ける特別な曲です。

また遊んでね! | translation =This is the theme of the congratulation screen.

It's a special song that people who unlocked every achievement get to hear.

Have fun playing again some time! | note = }} {{Navbox BIT}} [[Category:Bubbling Imaginary Treasures]] [[Category: Music by Game]]

revision.comment: Naudiz moved page [[Violet Detector EX: Comatose Chaos/Music]] to [[Comatose Chaos/Music]]: Title change.
revision.text:
==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title and Menu Theme | title =悪夢日記　～ Comatose Mix | titleEN =Nightmare Journal ~ Comatose Mix | comment =N/A | composer =Spectral Nexus (original: ZUN) | translation =This is the title theme.
Arranged from [[Violet Detector|Secret Sealing Nightmare Diary ~ Violet Detector]]. }} {{MusicRoom | category =First Week Theme | title =テレパシックドリーマー | titleEN =Telepathic Dreamer | comment =N/A | composer =Aka Kyuketsuki | translation =This is the First Week's theme.
In contrast to "Lucid Dreamer" which is mysterious and eerie, I went for a more
melancholic and emotional approach with this theme as we follow the real Sumireko Usami here.
In order to survive and stay sane in this oneiric world, one must keep in touch with a
fragment of reality of their own and never let go. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Story Theme 1 | title =見た事も無い悪夢の世界 | titleEN =A World of Nightmares Never Seen Before | comment =N/A | composer =Spectral Nexus (original: ZUN) | translation =This is the first story theme.
Arranged from [[Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom|Eastern Ultramarine Orb Tale ~ Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom]]. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Story Theme 2 | title =シュレディンガーの化猫 | titleEN =Schrödinger's Bakeneko | comment =N/A | composer =Spectral Nexus (original: ZUN) | translation =This is the second story theme.
Arranged from [[Dr. Latency's Freak Report|Swallowstone Natural History ~ Dr. Latency's Freak Report]]. }} {{Navbox VDEX}} [[Category:Music by Game]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title Screen | title =夢終劇 ～ 夢と現の境界 | roma =Mutsuigeki ~ Yume to utsutsu no kyoukai | titleEN =Dream End Drama ~ Border between Dream and Reality | composer =Mc | comment =最終的にBGMはみょん氏バージョンに統一
しようと決めたのですが、唯ーこの曲だけは
夢終劇の顔となるもので残させてもらいました。 | translation =In the end, I decided to go with Myon's version of musics for all BGM, but only this song was left since it is reminiscent of the game's title screen. | note =This theme is arranged from: *{{lang|ja|夢と現の境界}} (Border Between Dream and Reality) from {{CoSD}} (Track 09) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1A Theme | title =上海紅茶館 ～ Chinese Tea | roma =Shanhai kouchakan | titleEN =Shanghai Scarlet Teahouse ~ Chinese Tea | composer =みょん | comment =ちょっとはっちゃけちゃったんです
ごめんなさい。 | translation =This is just me playing around to my heart's content. Sorry. | note =This theme is arranged from: *{{lang|ja|上海紅茶館　～}} Chinese Tea (Shanghai Scarlet Teahouse ~ Chinese Tea) from {{EoSD}} (Stage 3 theme) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1A Boss - [[Hong Meiling]]'s Theme | title =明治十七年の上海アリス | roma =Meiji juunana nen no shanhai arisu | titleEN =Shanghai Alice of Meiji 17 | composer =みょん | comment =クラシカルな進行にチェンバロは良いものだと
思います。あとブレビ最高だとかそんな感じ。 | translation =I thought a [[Wikipedia:Harpsichord|cembalo]] from the classical era would be good,
and thinking that pause between beats is the best. | note = A small pause between words spoken, shown by symbol {{lang|ja|っ}} in Japanese text. This theme is arranged from: *{{lang|ja|明治十七年の上海アリス}} (Shanghai Alice of Meiji 17) from {{EoSD}} (Stage 3 Boss; [[Hong Meiling]]) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2A Theme | title =メイドと血の懐中時計 | roma =Meido to chi no kaichuu dokei | titleEN =The Maid and the Pocket Watch of Blood | composer =みょん | comment =2面だしスピード出さないと、という根拠の無い
信念により、スピード感を重視めのアレンジです。
Bメロが好きなんです。 | translation =Since it's the second level I was thinking about turning up the speed.
Because I like the bridge section personally,
it's an arrangement that heavily focuses on the feeling of speed. | note =This theme is arranged from: *{{lang|ja|メイドと血の懐中時計}} (The Maid and the Pocket Watch of Blood) from {{EoSD}} (Stage 5 theme) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2A Boss - [[Remilia Scarlet]]'s Theme | title =U.N.オーエンは彼女なのか？ | roma =Yū enu ōen wa kanojo nano ka? | titleEN =U.N. Owen was Her? | composer =みょん | comment =なんでセプテットじゃないんだコラとか言われそう
ですか、　ちょっとクラシカル目な曲のほうが
なんかそれっぽいなぁだとかそんな理由です。 | translation =I feel I'll be told that "Why the heck isn't it a septet!?"
But then I thought a classical approach to this gives off the same feel. And that's that. | note =This theme is arranged from: *U.N.{{lang|ja|オーエンは彼女なのか？}} (U.N. Owen was Her?) from {{EoSD}} (Extra Stage Boss; [[Flandre Scarlet]]) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3A Theme | title =ヴワル魔法図書館 | roma =Vuwaru mahou toshokan | titleEN =Voile, the Magic Library | composer =みょん | comment =チェンパロ！チェンパロ！
