Let's see, how to say, how to say. Ummm (^^; Oh well, I really do like a lot of the songs in this game. What do you all think? Well, let's overlook how it doesn't match the character for now (^^; | note = "Dim" is short for "Dimensional". | source1 =th3_04pmd.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/pmd.html here] | comment1 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方夢時空より【 Dim. Dream 】オリジナル版です。 凄く、妙(^^;
さらっと流れていくけど、メロディと言うか副旋律が自己主張が激しくなった感じで
なんとも、お茶目な(^^; キャラもあれだし（ぉ ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ | translation1 = }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Ellen]]'s theme | title ={{lang|en|Tabula rasa}}　～ 空白少女 | roma =Kuuhaku shoujo | titleEN =Tabula rasa ~ The Empty Girl | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =う～ん。作者、かわいい曲は苦手なんです。なんか、あんまりかわいい曲ではないですよね。 （エレンの元の漫画知ってる人、いたらごめんよ。あんまりキャラに合ってなくて） それはともかく、この曲、実はずうっと昔にＭＩＤＩを練習するために作った曲を、ＦＭで作り直したものなのです。 お気に入りのオリジナル曲の一つだったんですが、元の曲は完全に東洋風だったんですが・・・（この曲もそうな気が・・） なんで、外国の少女のテーマなのかしらん。 | translation =Yeees. The composer is not too good at cute songs. This song doesn't seem very cute, does it? (If anyone knows the comic Ellen came from... sorry, it doesn't match her very well, does it?) Well, anyway, this song is actually a song I wrote a loooooong time ago to practice MIDI; I rewrote it all in FM. It was one of my favorite original songs, but it was completely Oriental-style, and... (I think this song is, too ...) I don't know how it ended up being a foreign girl's theme. | source1 =th3_06.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/music_old.html 東方幻想的音楽] | comment1 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 　東方Priject{{sic}}第３弾　東方夢時空より【 Tabula rasa ～ 空白少女 】です。 　本当に久しぶりに、明るめな曲を作りました。（明るいよね） 　雑多な音の洪水な感じですが、本人は楽しく音符を置きまくりました（笑） 　今回は、少女らしさを強調してみました、のか？ 　ストリングやピアノを多用して西洋ファンタジー風にしてるように見せかけてるけど 　メロディがどうしても、和風だよな～。 　この曲は、東方Project を作り始めるよりも前、まだ純粋だった頃に(笑）Midi の練習 　として適当に作ったものを、FM に作りなおして、またMIDIにアレンジしたものです。 　ですので、かなり歴史のある曲です(^^;; 　メロディを聴くとなつかしさがこみ上げてきます。（昔はよかったな～(笑)) 　ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ | translation1 =Thank you for downloading this song. This is "Tabula rasa ~ The Empty Girl" from Phanatasmagoria of Dim. Dream. For the first time in a long time, I made a song that is really bright. It has a feeling of flood and miscellaneous sounds (bright, indeed), I eanestly composed by inserting notes happily (laughs) This time, I tried to emphasize the girlhood, or is it? I just pretend that melody feels like a western fantasy with intensive piano and strings, yet it's Japanese~ This song is one before making Touhou Project, when I was still pure (laugh), brought an excercise of MIDI, remade it in FM, then arranged it back to MIDI again. So it is quite a historic song (^ ^; When I listen to the melody, a great nostalgia comes to me swelling up (It was great back then~ (laugh) Well then, let us meet again in the next song, shall we? ZUN | source2 =th3_06pmd.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/pmd.html here] | comment2 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方夢時空より【 Tabula rasa　～ 空白少女 】オリジナル版です。 なぜか、東方チックな曲です。
ＳＴＧっぽくも無いです（笑） ある意味すごい曲だと（^^;; 神社っぽさがにじみ出ています、よね。 夢時空を展示した鳩祭（大学の学園祭）のときは、徹夜の朝方に模造紙にでかでかと
エレンを書いて、教室入り口に張りました。どういうサークルと思われたんでしょう（笑） ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ |translation2= }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Kotohime]]'s theme | title =Maniacal Princess | titleEN =Maniacal Princess | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =変なキャラです。変な曲です。はい。 なんていうんでしょうかねぇ。う～ん。 まぁ、この高速なもっきんみたいな音がこの曲のメインなのかしらねぇ。 とにかく、旋律が変だもん。皆さんもそう思うかな？やっぱり。 | translation =She's a strange character. It's a strange song. Yes. What to say, what to say .... yeah. Well, I guess the high-speed xylophone-like sound is the main attraction for this song. Anyway, the melody's pretty weird. Do you all think so too? I knew it. }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Kana Anaberal]]'s theme | title =夢消失　～ {{lang|en|Lost Dream}} | roma =Yume shoushitsu | titleEN =Vanishing Dream ~ Lost Dream | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =この娘も人間じゃないのよねぇ・・・ 自分はキャラを作るときに、いつも紙にいろんなキャラを書いて、その中から選ぶんですが。このキャラかなりロリっとした感じのキャラだったんだけど・・・ 曲の方は、妙にかっこいいですよね。 さっきも書いたけど、かわいい曲って苦手なのです。この曲もそうですよね・・・。 このキャラだったらもっとかわいい系でもよかったですよねぇ・・・。

あああ、どの曲もなんだか中途半端～ （かっこいいけど、少女っぽい感じ（音色が）もするし）まぁ、いいんですけど。 自分はそれが気に入ってるみたいだし。 | translation =She isn't human, either... When I'm making up characters, I'll write down a bunch on paper, and just choose some. This character has a pretty loli feel about her, but... The song is unusually cool. I said this before, but I'm not that good at making cute songs. This song turned out the same way... A cuter song would have been nice for this character...

Aahhhh, all the songs feel kind of half-assed~ (It's cool, but it's got kind of girly instrumentation in it... ) Oh, well, it's okay. I guess I like this kind of song, after all. | source1 =th3_08.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/music_old.html 東方幻想的音楽] | comment1 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方夢時空より【 夢消失　～ Lost Dream 】です。 かなり少女幻想チックの曲です。 この曲は、もっとも自分らしさがでている曲の一つだと思っています。 アレンジもかなり幻想チックにしたつもりです。 夢時空の曲は他のシリーズに比べ比較的長いので、アレンジ大変(^^;; なんでこんなに複雑なコードの曲を作ったんだろう（いつもはちょー単純なのに（ぉ） この曲は実をいうと、夢美用に創った曲です。カナを作り始める前に夢美は出来て いたのでそれように作り始めたのですが、あまりにもラストっぽく無かったのでボツ にしました。そのおこぼれをいただいたのがカナです（哀れ(;_; というか、曲に合うようなキャラを創って生まれたのが... （かわいそーだね(;_; そんなこんなで激しいのに、何故かこんなにも切ないメロディに聞こえるのは私だけ でしょうか(^^; みなさんにも切ない曲に聞こえていただければいいなぁ。 ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ | translation1 =Thank you for downloading this song. This is "Vanishing Dream ~ Lost Dream" from Phantasmagoria of Dim. Dream. It is a fantastic song with a feel of phantasmic little girl. This song, I think is one of the songs that reflects myself the best. I'm going to say it was quite a fantastic arrangement. Because the songs in PoDD are relatively long compared to other series, the arrangement is also very long (^ ^ ; why did I make such a complex chord (even though the key is very simple.. As a matter of fact, this song is a song that was created for Yumemi. Before I made Kana, Yumemi was already designed so I started making this for her, but it just did not feel too much like a last boss song, I decided to ship it out to somewhere else. And the one who received the shipment was Kana. Poor little ;_; (or rather, she was a character created to fit the song (how cute (; _; It should be very intense feeling, but why does the melody sounds painful, is it just me that I hear this (^ ^; I hope you'll also hear it as a sad song for you. Well then, let us meet again in the next song, shall we? ZUN | source2 =th3_08pmd.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/pmd.html here] | comment2 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方夢時空より【 夢消失　～ Lost Dream 】オリジナル版です。 完全に、東方ってことを無視した曲です（笑）
この曲からかなり吹っ切れたみたいで、以降ふぁんたすてぃかな曲調が増えたような
気がする(^^;; カナのイメージイラストは（キャラを創る前にいつも書いていた(^^;;）、
「道路標識を破壊して後ろ手にもっている、西洋少女」だったりしました。 ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ |translation2=This is the original version of "Vanishing Dream ~ Lost Dream" from Phantasmagoria of Dim. Dream. It's a song that completely ignores the fact that it's a Touhou song (lol).


The concept for Kana's image (which I would always write down before designing the character ^^;;) was "a Western-style girl holding a damaged road sign behind her back".
Well then, let us meet again in the next song, shall we? -ZUN }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Rikako Asakura]]'s theme | title =夢幻遊戯　～ {{lang|en|Dream War}} | roma =Mugen yuugi | titleEN =Visionary Game ~ Dream War | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =この曲、かなり気に入ってるんだけど、気に入ってるんですけど。めちゃくちゃ、キャラにあってないですよね(^^; まぁその。この曲かなりループまで長いですけど、繰り返し、多いですね。 え～と、でも、ボスキャラを除く７人の中では一番かっこい　いんじゃないかな？ （とくにさびとか、イントロとかも） | translation =I like this song quite a bit, I really do, but it doesn't really fit the character at all, does it (^^; Oh well. This song's loop is pretty long, but it's pretty repetitive. Let's see, but, aside from the bosses, isn't it the coolest of the seven characters' themes? (Especially the main part, and even the intro) | source1 =th3_09pmd.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/pmd.html here] | comment1 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方夢時空より【 夢幻遊戯　～ Dream War 】オリジナル版です。 この曲も、東方の中でもかなりお気に入りの部類に入ります。
実は１ループ約５分（東方最長）とものすごく長い曲です。
おそらく、ループ前のメロディはほとんどの方が聴いていない可能性が・・・
普通にＣＰＵ戦やるとサビまでもいかないし（笑） サビはかなり好きなんだけどな～(^^;; ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ | translation1 = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Round 7 CPU Battle theme | title =魔法決戦！ ～ {{lang|en|Fight it out!}} | roma =Mahou kessen | titleEN =Decisive Magic Battle! ~ Fight it out! | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =この曲は対戦では流れません。７人目は使用キャラによって固定されてますが、どのキャラが出てきてもこの曲になります。よって、エレンとかが最後に来る場合とかだと、めちゃくちゃ合いません。（^^; 曲は、ラストっぽくないボスっぽいのを目指したのですが・・・ メインのメロディは東方妖恋談とほぼ同じになってます。 さびもかっこはいいです・・・よね。まぁ、変・・・かな？ | translation =This song doesn't play in VS mode. Who the 7th is depends on which character you picked, but this song plays no matter who that was. So, if it's someone like Ellen, then this song will be totally out of place (^^; I was going for a boss feel, not a last boss feel, but... The main melody is almost the same as Reimu's theme. The main part is pretty cool... ...right? Well... maybe it's kind of odd? | source1 =th3_10pmd.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/pmd.html here] | comment1 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方夢時空より【 魔法決戦！　～ Fight it out!! 】オリジナル版です。 この曲は、ＣＰＵ７人目の時に流れる曲です。
設定上、初期状態で使用可能キャラ７人による戦いだから、最後だけ曲を変えて
特別扱いにしました。だから、最後に来るキャラはキャラ別に固定になっています。
ここで、急に難しくなるんだよね(^^; この曲って、結構珍しいと思ってるけど... ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ | translation1 = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Midboss Demo theme | title =非統一魔法世界論 | roma =Hitouitsu mahou sekai ron | titleEN =Disunified Field Theory of Magic | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =ちょっと、デモが長すぎよねぇ。 まともにみると、この曲短いから何ループもしちゃうのですよね。 まぁ、このゲームの曲、全体的に、妙なかっこよさがあるような気が・・・ ちなみに中間デモはＥＳＣキーを押すと早送りできます・２回目からは、とばしていいよ。かなり意味の無いデモだから。 | translation =The demo is a little too long, isn't it? Honestly, since this song is so short, it has to loop a few times. Well, it seems like all the songs in this game are strangely cool ... By the way, if you press ESC during the demo, you can speed through it. If you press it twice, you can skip through it. Since it's a pretty pointless scene. }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Chiyuri Kitashirakawa]]'s theme | title =Sailor of Time | titleEN =Sailor of Time | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =なんの為にいるのかわからん中ボスの曲です。（^^; これも、ラストっぽくないボスっぽい曲にしたつもり、なんだけど。え～と。 この曲のみ、ゲーム中に最初のステージ ８　ＳＴＡＲＴ　っていう表示とシンクロしてます。気がつきました？ まぁその、一応本物のセーラー服です。って、あ、あら～。 | translation =This is the theme for the mid-boss who I don't know why she's there (^^; I was also going for a boss theme, not a last boss theme, but. Ummm. This is the only song in the game that's sycned up with the STAGE 8 START display. Did you notice? Well, anyway, that's a real sailor uniform. Er, ahh~ |source1=th3_11pmd.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/pmd.html here] |comment1=このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方夢時空より【 Sailor of Time 】オリジナル版です。 セーラー・オブ・タイムですよ（ぉ
なかなか、セイラー服なんて描くことないからなぁ(^^;
結局、あれが最後。今度描いてみるか(^^;; 不思議な魅力のある曲なんですけどねぇ。
セイラァではないやな(^^; ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ |translation1= }} {{MusicRoom | category =Yumemi Demo theme | title =魔法鐘愛 | roma =Mahou shouai | titleEN =Adoration of Magic | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =これは短いです。 ただ、かっこつけてみただけです。 まぁ、なんだ、それだけ。 | translation =This is pretty short. Still, I tried to give it that certain feeling. Well, that's about it. }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Yumemi Okazaki]]'s theme | title =Strawberry Crisis!! | titleEN =Strawberry Crisis!! | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =一応、ラスボスのテーマです。 かなり、難産なんですけどねぇ。まぁ、なんとか形になったからよしとしましょう。 他のキャラの曲にかっこいいものが多いので、苦労したんですよ。私にしては珍しくギターっぽい音を使ってます。 また、さび？のメロディは高級感溢れる様なのを目指したんだけどなぁ。ちょっと違うかなぁ？ | translation =Well, I guess this is the last boss theme. I had a hard time with this one. Well, it turned out, so I guess it went well in the end. Since all the other characters' songs were pretty cool, I worked hard at this one. I ended up using a guitar-like sound, which I don't do often. And, the main part(?)'s melody was supposed to be really high-class, but. Maybe it's not? | source1 =th3_12pmd.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/pmd.html here] | comment1 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方夢時空より【 Strawberry Crisis 】オリジナル版です。 全然ラスボスっぽくない名前のラスボスです。もちろん、狙ってます。
ラスボスは、普通の名前の制服着た娘にしようと(^^;;
中ボスはセーラー服（ただし、海軍の奴でスカートではないやつ）。
ラスボスはブレザーで（ぉ 曲は、ものすごく苦労しました。その間３曲生まれてようやくこの形に落ち着きました。 ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ | translation1 = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Common Ending theme | title =久遠の夢 | roma =Kuuon no yume | titleEN =Dream of Eternity | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =エンディングっぽい曲だけど、場面に場面に合ってるのかしら？ まぁ、短いし。 | translation =It's very ending-ish, but does it really match the ending scenes? 　Well, it's short. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Daytime Ending theme | title =東方の青い空 | roma =Touhou no aoi sora | titleEN =Eastern Blue Sky | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =昼間のエンディングで流れる曲。 わりと、神社を意識してます。実は、一番巫女さんっぽいんじゃないかと。 ほら、よくエロゲーで出てくる神社とか巫女さんとかってこういう曲じゃん（笑） | translation =The song that plays during daytime endings. It definitely makes me think of shrines. Actually, this is the most shrine-maiden-ish song here, isn't it? See, doesn't this kind of song always play for shrines and shrine maidens in eroge? *g* }} {{MusicRoom | category =Nighttime Ending theme | title =永遠の満月 | roma =Eien no mangetsu | titleEN =Eternal Full Moon | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =夜のエンディングで流れる曲。どうやら エンディングの曲はどれも、東方っぽくなったようです。 よかったよかった。 | translation =The song that plays during night-time endings. All the endings have a particular oriental feel to them. Hooray! | source1 =th3_17.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/music_old.html 東方幻想的音楽] | comment1 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方Priject第３弾　東方夢時空より【 永遠の満月 】です。 少しでも神社のイメージがふくらむといいな、と願いつつ今回のアレンジを書きました。 メロディももともと和風だったし、ああ、巫女さん～、って曲になりました（笑） 本人は、久々に優しく切ないの曲が出来たと思ってますが、どんな感じに聞こえるんでしょうか。 エンディング曲は他の曲と一線を画しているので、ひさびさに書くとなかなか苦戦するわ～。 でも、ほとんどピアノメロディ曲でかわいい和風になったと信じたい。 ちなみにこの曲自体は、魅魔とカナの二人だけのエンディングテーマだったので、割と 使用頻度が低くてがっくし(^^; 永遠の満月、元ネタはもちろん帝都物語ですぞ。魅魔のエンディングの「月と地球の距離が、 今より三倍遠ければ・・・」のくだりもそうなんだけど、わかった人はいたのだろうか(^^;;; はぁ、和風だぁ。神社幻想。 ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ | translation1 =Thank you for downloading this song. This is "Eternal Full Moon" from Phantasmagoria of Dim. Dream. I wrote this arrangement with a hope of bringing about the image of the shrine being a little puffy. It was also originally Japanese melody, and to sound like "~oh, it's Miko" (laughs) I think I am glad that I was able to bring a gentle yet emotional song for the first time in many years, but I would not know what you would feel. Since the ending song is set apart from other songs, I struggled quite on how to go about writing it for many days. But I want to believe that the song became a Japanese-tically cute little piano melody. This song itself, because it was the ending theme of only two people "Kana" and "Mima", it has comparatively low frequency of use (^ ^ i. The Eternal full moon is a story of a certain "Imperial City", reflecting the Mima's ending of "distance of the Earth and the moon, ... if three times farther than now," and such and such, I wonder if the person who got the reference (^ ^;; Haa, it's so Japanese. Shrine Fantasy. Well then, let us meet again in the next song, shall we? ZUN | source2 =th3_17pmd.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/pmd.html here] | comment2 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方夢時空より【 永遠の満月 】オリジナル版です。 夜のエンディングって、ちょっとしかつかわれていませんが(^^;
そういえば、私にとってエンディング曲って、実は珍しい曲の宝庫だったりします。
この曲は、結構激しい方だけど...(^^; ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ | translation2 = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll | title =Maple Dream... | titleEN =Maple Dream... | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =なんか、またまたゲームにあってませんね・・・思いっきり。 でも、この曲はスタッフロールには合っていると思います。 かっこいいですよね。たとえスタッフが私一人だけでも（笑） なんか、妙なところでかっこつけすぎ～ | translation =Somehow it doesn't seem to fit the game at all either ... oh well. Still, I think this song works well as a staff roll song. It's cool, isn't it? Even if I'm the only member of the staff *g* Maybe I put in too many weird parts~ | source1 =th3_18pmd.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/pmd.html here] | comment1 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方夢時空より【 Maple Dream... 】オリジナル版です。 こういう曲も創っています。えぇ。
この曲は、東方シリーズの中でかなり好きな部類にはいります。 冬コミ発表だったので、弾幕を雪に見立てたスタッフロールにしました（ぉ。
雪が降りしきるのをイメージした曲になっていると思います。 これ以来、自分の中ではスタッフロールといえばこういう曲になりました。 ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ | translation1 = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Name Registration | title =霊人の休日 | roma =Reijin no kyuujitsu | titleEN =Ghostly Person's Holiday | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =あっというまに制作しおわった記憶があります。 まぁ、単純な曲ですし。 | translation =I remember finishing making this in no time at all. Well, it ''is'' a simple melody. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Victorious Demo theme | title =勝利デモ | roma =Shouri demo | titleEN =Victory Demonstration | also ={{Akyu|4}} }} {{MusicRoom | category =Game Over | title =ゲームオーバー | roma =Gēmu ōbā | titleEN =Game Over | also ={{Akyu|4}} }} {{MusicRoom | category =Unused | title =時の風 | roma =Toki no kaze | titleEN =Winds of Time | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =キャラを作る前、システムを作ってるときに使用してました。 結局、この曲にあうキャラがいなかったのでボツになりました。 | translation =I used this as I was building the game system before I made any characters. There weren't any characters that really fit this song, so I tossed it. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Unused | title =スターボウドリーム | roma =Sutābou doriimu | titleEN =Starbow Dream | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =宇宙っぽい？曲。 自分の中ではかなり珍しい曲です。唯一、ＳＴＧに合いそうなのに（合いそうだから？）ボツになりました。 （この曲に合うキャラが居ないんだもん） | translation =A very spacey(?) song. I don't make many songs like this one. It's the only one that really seems like it's a STG song, but (because of that?) I tossed it. (Because there aren't any characters that fit this song!) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Unused | title =Phantasmagoria ～ はたらきもので日が暮れて | titletype =(Internal title)A reference to [[wikipedia:Izumi Takemoto|Izumi Takemoto]]'s ''Hatarakimono'', which was also the inspiration for [[Ellen]]. ZUN jokingly calls this theme "Ellen "Fluffyhead" Aureus' theme" in the PMD memo. | roma =Hatarakimono de higakurete | title2 =Phantasmagoria | titleEN =Phantasmagoria ~ Hardworking Day After Dark | titleEN2 =Phantasmagoria | also ={{Akyu|4}} | comment =なぜか、若干ピラミッドな匂いがするこの曲もボツになりました。 どんなキャラだったら合うんでしょうか？ | translation =For some reason, this song that actually has a pyramid feel to it got tossed. I wonder what kind of character would go with this song? }} == Also See == *[[List_by_Song/Phantasmagoria_of_Dim.Dream|Phantasmagoria of Dim.Dream arrangements listed by song]] == External links == *[https://www.shrinemaiden.org/forum/index.php/topic,18989.0.html ZUN's MIDI files played on a real SC-88Pro, including his Phantasmagoria of Dim.Dream arrangements.] {{Project Translations Notice}} {{Navbox PoDD}} [[Category:Phantasmagoria of Dim.Dream]] [[Category:Music by Game]] [[ru:Phantasmagoria of Dim.Dream/Музыка]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title Screen | title =閉ざされた扉の向こうへ | roma =Tozasareta tobira no mukou he | titleEN =Beyond the Sealed Door | composer =Wanwan | comment =タイトル画面のテーマです。

学校の屋上に続く階段は立入禁止になっていました。
そうやって意図的に封鎖されたりした場所には、
子ども心をくすぐるものがあります。入れなかったけど。 | translation =This is the title screen theme.

As a kid I wasn't allowed to go up the stairs to the rooftop at my school.
Deliberately sealed-off places like that get kids really interested.
Although I didn't go up there myself. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 theme | title =背水の楽園 | titleEN =Backwater Paradise | roma =Haisui no rakuen | composer =Wanwan | comment =1面のテーマです。

いつも通りの始まりましたって感じの曲です。
シリーズ物の主人公って何で自分から動こうと思えるのか。
しかしそうでもないと物語が始まりませんので仕方ない。 | translation =This is the first stage theme.

It's a song with a "the journey begins!" sort of feeling, as always.
I've always wondered why the heroines set out on a journey all of their own accord.
Well I guess the story would never begin otherwise, so there's no way around it. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Boss - Yuyuko Saigyouji's theme | title =六花繚乱 ～ Sakurachill Blossom | roma =Rikka ryouran | titleEN =Snowflakes Blooming in Profusion ~ Sakurachill Blossom "六花" literally means "six(-pointed) flower", but it's a word used to refer to snowflakes as well. | composer =Wanwan | comment =西行寺 幽々子のテーマです。

凄い黒幕っぽいですねーどうみても黒幕ですねー……。
というわけではなく、どうやら抜き打ちテストみたいです。
そういえば満点とったことなかった気がします。 | translation =This is the theme of Yuyuko Saigyouji.

She's really mastermind-like, isn't she? No matter how you look at it.
Actually, though, this time the battle's all just a test she's giving you.
Speaking of which, I feel like I haven't gotten full marks. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 theme | title =クリフォトの立て橋 | roma =Kurifoto no tate-bashi | titleEN =Qliphoth Bridge | composer =Wanwan | comment =2面のテーマです。

怪しくも不思議系のダンジョンっぽい曲になりました。
流木ならぬ浮遊木ですが、実はそれ女の子の身体なんですよ。
……今、何か良からぬことを考えませんでしたか？ | translation =This is the second stage theme.

It became a song that'd sound fitting for wandering into a mysterious dungeon.
That tree may seem like driftwood, but it's actually a girl's body, you know.
...You just thought of something indecent, didn't you? | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Boss - Hatsuna Magatsuji's theme | title =プリティーアプリコット | roma =Puritī apurikotto | titleEN =Pretty Apricot | composer =Wanwan | comment =曲辻 初名のテーマです。

少しだけ前作っぽく、若さ溢れる可愛い系を目指しました。
何か面白い話をと思い検索したら別名、唐桃と呼ぶらしいです。
我は杏にして杏に非ずとはこの事だったんですね（？） | translation =This is the theme of Hatsuna Magatsuji.

It's just a little bit like our previous work. I aimed to make it cute and overflowing with youth.
I Googled "apricot", wondering if there was anything interesting to read, and apparently they're also called ''karamomo'' (Tang peaches). Maybe this is what that "I am An, and Yet I am Not" thing meant?This refers to one of An's spell cards in the last game. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 theme | title =エーテル霧氷海 | roma =Ēteru muhyou umi | titleEN =Etheric Frosty Sea | composer =Wanwan | comment =3面のテーマです。

とても冷たそうな出来たて冷え冷えの道中曲です。
霧氷というのは樹木に氷が付着して真っ白になる現象です。
真っ白にならなくても霧氷です。むひょー！寒い！ | translation =This is the third stage theme.

It's a song depicting a journey through freezing cold, it seems.
"Hoarfrost" is a phenomenon where frost sticks to trees, making them look white.
They don't necessarily have to be pure white, though. So icy! So cold! | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss - Ruri's theme | title =深淵のソウルイーター | roma =Shin'en no souru ītā | titleEN =Soul Eater from the Abyss | composer =Wanwan | comment =瑠璃のテーマです。

実際には違うでしょうが、冷凍睡眠はなんとなく寒そうです。
それよりも炬燵に入ってアイスを食べる方が私には合ってます。
そんなだらしない生活へ誘う炬燵はまさにソウルイーター。 | translation =This is the theme of Ruri.

I'm sure I'm wrong, but doesn't it sound really cold to be preserved cryogenically?
I think I'd much rather go under a kotatsu and eat ice cream.
Kotatsu that lure you into that sort of careless lifestyle must themselves be soul eaters! | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 theme | title =銀の鍵の門を超えて | roma =Gin no kagi no mon o koete | titleEN =Through the Gates of the Silver Key | composer =Wanwan | comment =4面のテーマです。　
　
そういえばスウィング系の曲があまりないなと思ってたら、
まったりのんびりとした雰囲気の曲が出来上がりました。
このリズム、別名ピョンコ節とも言います。ケロケロ。 | translation =This is the stage 4 theme.

Now that I think about it, I was just thinking that I didn't make enough swing-style songs,
but I succeeded in giving this one a rich, easy-going atmosphere.
This rhythm is also called "pyonko-bushi". Ribbit ribbit."Pyonko-bushi" rhythm is named for the "pyonko-pyonko-pyon" rhythm in the nursery song ''"The Frogs' Night Patrol"'' (蛙の夜まはり). | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 boss - Suitenguu no Himemiko's theme | title =歴史から消された姫君 | roma =Rekishi kara kesareta himegimi | titleEN =The Princess who was Erased from History | composer =Wanwan | comment =水天宮 皇女のテーマです。　
　
海と早世といえばこの方が思い浮かぶ人も多いのでしょうか。
荘厳なものの幼い感じが曲の節々に聞こえる気がします。
例によってやっぱり琵琶の音源が無くてしょんぼりです。 | translation =This is the theme of Suitenguu no Himemiko.

There's probably a lot of people who'd think of Emperor Antoku first when it comes to the ocean and early deaths.
I feel like the rhythm of this song has a somber yet childish sound to it.
As usual, [[Double_Dealing_Character/Music#Stage_4_Boss_-_Benben_Tsukumo.27s_and_Yatsuhashi_Tsukumo.27s_theme|I didn't have a sample for a biwa, so that left me feeling a bit depressed.]] | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 theme | title =深海に浮かぶ桃源宮 | roma =Shinkai ni ukabu tougenkyuu | titleEN =The Shangri-La Palace Floating in the Deep Sea | composer =Wanwan | comment =5面のテーマです。　
　
曲名でなんとなく予想できそうですが、そういうことです。
空中に沈むのはどこか新しくて魅力的な言葉なんですが、
深海に浮かぶのはどこか普通ですよね……。そうでもない？ | translation =This is the stage 5 theme.

The title probably gives away what the song is like, but that's how it is.
"Sinking in the air"Referring to the stage 5 theme of ''[[Double Dealing Character]]'', ''[[Double_Dealing_Character/Music#Stage_5_theme|The Shining Needle Castle Sinking in the Air]]''. has a somehow new and attractive quality to it,
but "floating in the sea" sounds somehow ordinary... don't you think? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 boss - Takenouchi no Tarumi's theme | title =ワールドヤマタイザー | roma =Wārudo yamataizā | titleEN =World Yamataizer | composer =Wanwan | comment =武内 垂神のテーマです。　
　
軍神っぽい人なので軍神っぽい曲にしてみました（？）
合体ロボといえば幼い頃に見ていた戦隊物を思い出します。
当時と違って今は違う視点で見れるので別の面白さがあったり。 | translation =This is Takenouchi no Tarumi's theme.

She's pretty war god-like, so I made a war god-like song(?).
When I think of combining robots, I remember the sentai series I saw when I was little.
I can look at them from a different viewpoint than I used to, so they're interesting in a different way now. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 theme | title =死霊の都ルルイエ | roma =Shiryou no miyako ruruie | titleEN =R'lyeh, the Capital of the Dead | composer =Wanwan | comment =6面のテーマです。　
　
最後のステージはテンション急上昇な曲になってます。
都と言われると、京都よりも地中海近辺の情景が浮かんできます。
この曲もそういったイメージが多少含まれているのかもしれません。 | translation =This is the stage 6 theme.

For the final stage, I made a song that'll raise the excitement some more.
When I think of capital cities, I picture the Mediterranean more than I picture Kyoto.
That mental image may have ended up in the song to an extent, too. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 boss - Yamatoyo no Momohime's theme | title =幻想国家黎明　～　Prayer Player | roma =Gensou kokka reimei | titleEN =Fantasy Nation Daybreak ~ Prayer Player | composer =ido, Wanwan | comment =邪馬台与 桃姫のテーマです。　
　
最後のボスですがあまり重くせずに楽しめそうな曲にしました。
ピラミッドパワーの他にも世間では不思議な力が多々ありますが、
中学生の頃は自分の存在が不思議で仕方がなかったです……。 | translation =This is Yamatoyo no Momohime's theme.

Though she's the final boss, her song turned out less heavy and more fun-sounding.
There's plenty of bewildering powers out there in the world besides pyramid power,
but when I was in middle school, I was pretty bewildering myself... | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending theme | title =兵どもが夢の跡 | roma =Tsuwamono domoga yume no ato | titleEN =All that Remains of Warriors' DreamsQuote from a poem by [[wikipedia:Matsuo Bashō|Matsuo Bashō]]. | composer =Wanwan | comment =スタッフロールのテーマです。　
　
位の高い方が居ますので、曲もちょっとだけ高尚な感じで。
雅楽の要素を少し取り入れるだけでぐっと曲が引き締まります。
でも琵琶だけでなく笙の音源も持ってなくて、笙んぼりです……。 | translation =This is the staff roll theme. ''[sic]''

Since the cast members are pretty high-class, I made the music a little classy too.
Just by including a few ''gagaku'' elements, the song got a lot tighter.
Although I didn't have a sample for a [[wikipedia:Shō (instrument)|shou]], let alone a biwa, ''shou'' that left me feeling a bit depressed. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll theme | title =海の千尋よさようなら　～ Shiokaze Dream | roma =Umi no senjin yo sayounara | titleEN =Farewell to the Sea's Fathoms ~ Shiokaze Dream | composer =Wanwan | comment =エンディングのテーマです。　
　
タイトル画面の曲の別バージョンになってます。
尋が水深などの長さの単位だってことを初めて知りました。
転じて千尋にはとても深いって意味があるみたいですね。 | translation =This is the ending theme. ''[sic]''

It's a different version of the title screen music.
I found out for the first time that a "fathom" is a unit of measurement in the ocean.
So a "thousand fathoms" must mean it's really, really deep, huh? | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage theme | title =深海星雲　～ Nebura Stream | roma =Shinkai seiun | titleEN =Deep-Sea Nebula ~ Nebula Stream | composer =Wanwan | comment =エクストラステージのテーマです。

今回はロマンチックな旅に合いそうな曲ができあがりました。
海っぽさも星っぽさも私の中では似たような音が思い浮かびます。
どっちつかずな曲になりやすい点は困ったものですが。 | translation = This is the Extra Stage theme.

This time, I created a song that would go well with a romantic trip.
While making this song, both oceanic and starry sounds came to mind.
The trouble is that the song can easily become a bit of a mixed bag.
| note = The title of this theme was originally misspelt as {{lang|ja|深海星'''空'''}}, which would mean "Deep-Sea Starry Sky". }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage boss - Yamata no Yato's theme | title =星の源流、草薙の剣竜 | roma =Hoshi no genryuu, kusanagi no kenryuuUsually, 草薙の剣 is pronounced "kusanagi no tsurugi". 剣 (sword), however, can also be pronounced as "ken", forming a rhyme with the first half of the song name. | titleEN =Source of the Starry River, Dragon of the Grass-Mowing Sword | composer =Wanwan | comment =八俣 やとのテーマです。

伝説の蛇に倣って酔ったような雰囲気を意識してます（？）
お酒が飲める歳になると色々と飲み比べるようになりました。
八塩折之酒……、いえ、私は遠慮しておきます。 | translation =This is Yamata no Yato's theme.

I tried to give this song a drunk-sounding vibe fitting for that legendary snake(?).
When I was old enough to drink alcohol, I started comparing all sorts of drinks.
Yashiori-no-Sake... no, better not try that one. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Phantasm Stage theme | title =生命無キ涜神ノ亡都 | roma =Seimei naki tokushin no nato | titleEN =Lost Capital of Lifeless Blasphemy | composer =Wanwan | comment =ファンタズムステージのテーマです。

伏線回収に向けてかっこよく作るつもりだったのですが、
人魂がふわふわしていそうなゴーストタウンになりました。
元気な式神が楽しそうに暴れているのでこれで良しとします。 | translation =This is the Phantasm Stage theme.

I intended to make this one really cool, since all the foreshadowing pays off here,
but in the end, it sounds like a ghost town with spirits floating around.
There's a cheery shikigami running amok in there, though, so it's fine this way. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Phantasm Stage boss - Abe no Kiyohime's theme | title =インヤンシーサーペント | roma =In-yan-shī sāpento | titleEN =Yin-Yang-Shi Serpent "Yin-yang-shi" is the Chinese pronunciation of "陰陽師" ('onmyou practitioner'). | composer =Wanwan | comment =安倍の清姫（土御門静）のテーマです。

胡散臭くて嫌らしいくらい強そうな感じにしてみました。
裏要素の攻略は難しくも楽しいのですが、ザコ戦でも結構強いので
途中で投げ出してしまうことが多々あります。笙（以下略） | translation =This is Abe no Kiyohime (Shizume Tsuchimikado)'s theme.

I made it with a suspicious and unpleasantly strong feeling.
Clearing this hidden stage is both difficult and fun, but even the small-fry enemies are pretty strong,
so I gave up partway through a whole lot of times. ''Shou'' that left *snip*. | note = }} ==Notes== {{smallrefs}} {{Navbox RSS}} [[Category:Riverbed Soul Saver | Music]] [[Category:Music by Game]]

revision.comment: Bonus track comments from Spectral Teasis
revision.text:
==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title Screen theme | title =セイリーンペトリコール | roma =Seirīn petorikōru | titleEN =Saline Petrichor | composer =Frogmask | comment =タイトル画面のテーマです。

いつもこういう感じですね。
今回は雨の匂いを表現して、音楽に入れようとしてみました。
豪雨が晴れた後の世界は爽やかですね……少なくとも湿っぽくない時は。 | translation =This is the title theme.

It's always like this, isn't it?
This time I tried to capture the smell of rain and put into music.
The world is refreshing after heavy showers, but only when it isn't humid. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 theme | title =空は近きに彷徨う | roma =Sora wa chikaki ni samayou | titleEN =The Sky Wanders Closer | composer =Frogmask | comment =１面のテーマです。

あーめあーめふーれふーれ。でも別に寂しい感じの雨じゃない。
幻想郷では少しでも頭の良い妖精なんて珍しいよね？
それでもいつもの妖精と大した差がない。 | translation =The Stage 1 theme.

It's raaaaining. But it's not really a bleak kind of rain.
It's weird to see fairies in Gensokyo with any half-decent intelligence.
But it doesn't make a difference. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Boss - Azure Swirl's theme | title =白波から上がるフェー達 | roma =Shiranami kara agaru fē-tachi | titleEN =Fae Rising from Seafoam | composer =Frogmask | comment =アジュアスワールのテーマです。

「Faerie」は「Fairy」より上品な響きがあるから、
曲名に入れるとカッコよくない？　……え、やっぱりよくない？
ちなみに本人が敬語を強調しているのもわざとです。(笑) | translation =Azure Swirl's theme.

Faerie sounds a lot classier than fairy, so doesn't it sound cool
when you throw it into a song name? What? No?
Her formal speech is on purpose, by the way. (lol) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 theme | title =蒼き天涯を染み通る | roma =Aoki tengai o shimi-tōru | titleEN =Seeping Through the Blue Canopy | composer =Frogmask | comment =２面のテーマです。

雨がまだ降り続けている。 雨期になると家に引きこもりがちになりますよね？
それもただの人間の本質でしょう。
私は子供の頃、台風のせいで丸一週間家で過ごしたことがありますが……
実は海外にいた頃ですが、それでもつまらなかった。 | translation =The Stage 2 theme.

It's still raining. When it's the rainy season somewhere, you tend
to stay inside a lot more. That's just human nature.
Once when I was a kid, I had to spend a whole week indoors because of a typhoon...
It was overseas, actually, but it still kinda sucked. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Boss - Sakkagumi Yamomo's theme | title =ピンクサイレンスの誓い | roma =Pinku sairensu no chikai | titleEN =Vow of Pink Silence | composer =Frogmask | comment =八百　目実（やもも　さっかぐみ）のテーマです。

いやー、読み上げると長い名前ですね。 その割に本人はあまり喋りません。
入道は大体そんなものです。 物静かなタイプ。
……まあ、大体は。 | translation =Sakkagumi Yamomo's theme.

Wow, gee, her name is a mouthful. But she doesn't speak much.
Nyuudou are quite like that. The quiet type, I mean. ...Usually. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 theme | title =巫女の尻尾を追うマーメイド | roma =Miko no shippo o ou māmeido | titleEN =A Mermaid Chasing a Shrine Maiden's Tail | composer =Frogmask | comment =３面のテーマです。

今度は海に来ました。 いや、某ゲームじゃありませんよ……
海は深度次第でおぞましく暗い場所、
あるいはかなり美しい場所だったりします。
リアルの海の話ですが、穹蒼洋もそうです。 | translation =The Stage 3 theme.

Now you're in an ocean. No, it's not [[Marine Benefit|that game]] or something...
The ocean is either horrifically murky or quite beautiful, depending on which level you're at.
I'm talking about the real ocean, but it applies to the Expanse, too. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss - Saga Kuramu's theme | title =雲に座っているキルケ― | roma =Kumo ni suwatteiru Kirukē | titleEN =Circe Sitting in the Clouds | composer =Frogmask | comment =眩　さが（くらむ　さが）のテーマです。

昔はイヤな女だった～♪
魔女と呼ばれて当然～♪
でもこの頃は　こういうネタも～　かなり古くなった♪
彼女って、実はなんかかっこいいキャラじゃない？ | translation =Saga Kuramu's theme.

She must admit that in the past she's been a nasty.
They weren't kidding when they called her, well, a witch.
But you'll find that nowadays, such references are dated.
She's actually kind of a cool character, isn't she? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 theme | title =中ノ鳥島ノ怠惰ナ砂 | roma =Nakanotorishima no taida na suna | titleEN =Lazy Sands of NakanotorishimaThe Japanese name of [[wikipedia:Ganges_Island|Ganges Island]], a nonexistent "phantom island" that appeared on maps during the 19th and 20th centuries. | composer =Spectral Nexus | comment =４面のテーマです。

のんびりした世界の為ののんびりした曲。
いつもの流れに乗って作曲していたので、割と単純な曲です。
あのハモン達って可愛すぎないですか？！ ふわふわしてて
座り心地がすごく良さそう～。 けど座ったままに弾幕を
撃ったり避けたりするのが難しいでしょうね…… | translation =The Stage 4 theme.

A lazy song for a lazy realm.
Sticking to the status quo, I simply cruised my way along with this theme,
so it's pretty simple.
But hey, sometimes less is more, and when it's not,
you're probably overthinking it anyway.
Aren't those Hammon just the cutest!? So fluffy...
I bet they're amazingly comfy to sit on,
though firing and dodging danmaku on them would be a very different story... }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 Boss - Umehime Kazarashi's theme | title =綿津見の和太鼓デリュージ | roma =Watatsumi no wadaiko deryūji | titleEN =Watatsumi's Wadaiko Deluge | composer =Spectral Nexus | comment =風嵐　梅姫（かざらし　うめひめ）のテーマです。

意地悪な公主様にぴったりな、暴風のような能楽囃子。
貴族の割にマナーの悪いキャラですよね？ 特に毒口なところとか。
でも、優れてるところもちゃんと認めるよ。
風と騒動を起こす腕前が素晴らしい！ | translation =Umehime Kazarashi's theme.

A tempestuous nohgaku performance, fit for a sovereign with a mean streak.
Definitely not the best behaved noble, huh? What a boorish mouth.
Still, I've got to give credit where it's due.
She can kick up one hell of a storm! }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 theme | title =恐怖の鎖への抗戦は空振り | roma =Kyōfu no kusari e no kōsen wa karaburi | titleEN =Futile Is the Fight Against the Fetters of Fear | composer =Spectral Nexus | comment =５面のテーマです。

向こう側の深淵に囚われている者の為の哀歌。
一方は悪魔めいた不吉さ、もう一方は不思議な魅力。
まるで城自体が貴方を奥まで誘っているような感じ。
……さあ、なぜ躊躇しているのでしょうか？
{{font color|red|パンドラの箱を開けた今、引き返せるわけにはいきませんよ。}} | translation =The Stage 5 theme.

An elegy for those captured by the chasm beyond.
Devilishly ominous, yet perplexingly enticing,
it's as if the castle itself is luring you into its depths.
...Well? Why do you hesitate?
{{font color|red|You can't turn back now that you've opened Pandora's box.}} }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 Boss - Padma Raksasa's theme | title =プリマドンナの焼け翼　～ Walpurgis Nightmare | roma =Purimadona no yake-tsubasa | titleEN =The Primadonna's Burnt Wings ~ Walpurgis Nightmare | composer =Spectral Nexus | comment =パドマ・ラクササのテーマです。

朦朧とした灯篭と慟哭の童謡が鳴る、蟲道と魑魅魍魎の凶騒ロンド。
……って、かなり言いづらいよね？ こちらにとっても意味不明です (笑)
とにかくできることを全部詰め込んだので、とても凄まじい曲になりました。
でも本人はそういうキャラだからね。何が来るか全然分からないって感じ。 | translation =Padma Raksasa's theme.

An amorphous amalgamated allegretto of animated anathema.
...Did I overdo it this time? I myself barely know what it means, haha!
Anyway, I really packed everything I could into this one,
so it ended up pretty intense.
Padma's like that though. You really never know what to expect with her. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 theme | title =カリスト・マトリックス | roma =Karisuto matorikkusu | titleEN =Callisto Matrix | composer =Frogmask | comment =６面のテーマです。

いよいよ終盤だ！！
(……まあ、ここまではおおよそ20分くらいしかかからないし、
そこまでドラマチックでもないでしょうけど。)
とても宇宙っぽい音を目指しました。ついでに宇宙っぽい曲名も。
カリスト…天にあげられた母熊、おおぐま座のこと。
マトリックス…胎蔵曼荼羅(いわばMatrix Mandala)のこと。
他に木星の衛星や某映画もありますが……(笑) | translation =The Stage 6 theme.

This is it! ...Well, it's only been 20 or so minutes, so I guess it's not too dramatic.
I hoped for a very space like sound. And a space-like name, too.
Callisto, like the mother bear, Ursa Major set into the sky.
And Matrix like the Matrix Mandala.
Then again, there's the moon of Jupiter, and then [[wikipedia:The_Matrix|that one movie]]... (lol) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Boss - Ummu Tzumazaru's theme | title =蒼玉母船　～ Thalassic Izanami | roma =Sōgyoku bōsen | titleEN =Sapphire Mothership ~ Thalassic Izanami | composer =Frogmask | comment =水混　祐毋（つまざる　うんむ）のテーマです。

Ah! Hello, starlight! You certainly gave everyone a scare.
すべての破片はここでパズルのピースのように当てはまる……。
……私はね、ラスボスの曲を作ることが大好きです。
貴方にとっても、この曲を聴くことが大好きであることを望みます。 | translation =Ummu Tzumazaru's theme.

Ah! Hello, starlight! You certainly gave everyone a scare.One of White Diamond's introductory lines towards Steven in Season 5, Episode 26 of ''Steven Universe''
All the pieces come together here, like a puzzle...
...Well, you see, I really love writing final boss themes.
I hope you really love listening to this. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Boss - Ummu Tzumazaru's Revival theme | title =アンテディルビアンマザーシップ | roma =Antedirubian mazāshippu | titleEN =Antediluvian Mothership | composer =Frogmask | comment =ウンム・フブルのテーマです。

Good morning, mom!
あ、いや……そっちの某ゲームじゃないよね？
うーん、じゃあ。 貴方ってもしかしてデビルサマナー？
え、ええ？ あっちのゲームでもない？？ | translation =Ummu-Hubur's theme.

Good morning, mom!
Uh-- It isn't that game, is it?
Ooooh, well. Are you a devil summoner, by the way?A reference to "Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner"
H-huh? It isn't that game either? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage theme | title =おぼれる者の心象風景　～ Sinking Star | roma =Oboreru mono no shinshō fūkei | titleEN =A Drowning Man's Dreamscape ~ Sinking Star | composer =Naudiz | comment =エキストラステージのテーマです。

死ぬ直前に現実があやふやになって夢のような世界になる、という考えが
個人的に好き。そして、フッ……と消えて逝くという。
それがこの曲のコンセプトだ。気楽なオアシスのイメージを
思い浮かばせる一方、少しずつ近づいていく窒息感も与える。
……それはさておき、またビーチに行きたいなぁ。行ったところで砂から
動こうとしないけどさ。最初から水に入らなきゃ溺れるわけないからね？ | translation =The Extra Stage theme.

I like to think that right before you die, you lose your grip on reality and
the world becomes like that of a dream. Then... poof. You're gone.
That's the idea behind this song; on one hand it evokes images of a blissful
oasis, while on the other it instills a sense of impending suffocation.

...Anyway, I miss going to the beach. Even if all I do is stay on the sand
whenever I go. Can't drown if you never get wet, after all. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage Boss - Nusakoro Pandora's theme | title =アーケインアウグル | roma =Ākein auguru | titleEN =Arcane Augur | composer =KUROHA (Composition), Frogmask (Arrangement) | comment =絆鑼　幣頃（ぱんどら　ぬさころ）のテーマです。

いや待って、幻想郷を煩わせいる塩水の海に潜む母神……
なんか怪しくない？(笑)
それはさておき、これが幣頃さんのテーマ曲です。
物事に名前を付けて、定義できる力。
それが彼女の神秘的(アーケイン)なところでしょう。 | translation =Nusakoro Pandora's theme.

Wait, a mother goddess in a saltwater sea that's troubling Gensokyo...
Isn't that kind of suspicious? (ha)
Anyways, here's Nusakoro's theme.
The power invested in naming something, in defining it.
That's what's so arcane about her, I'd say. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Carrefour Stage theme | title =世界の中心でアイを叫んだ神様 | roma =Sekai no chūshin de ai o sakenda kamisama | titleEN =A God That Shouted 'Love' At the Heart of the WorldA reference to ''[[wikipedia:The_Beast_that_Shouted_Love_at_the_Heart_of_the_World|The Beast that Shouted Love at the Heart of the World]]'', a short story collection by American author Harlan Ellison. | composer =Frogmask | comment =カルフールステージのテーマです。

さあさあ、お祭りの時間だよ～！ お酒にダンスに照明に……
って、東方風にしてはかなり異質な曲かもしれないね、これ。
終盤の道中曲の割には元気いっぱいというか。

まあ、お祭りだからね？ その雰囲気に合わせなきゃ。
……ねえ、モッシュピットとかがあると思う？ | translation =The Carrefour Stage theme.

Hey, hey, it's a party~! Drinking, raving, and lights, and...
Huh, I guess this kinda style is a little out of the ordinary for Touhou.
It's something pretty peppy for, y'know, a late stage theme.

It's a festival after all. Better fit the mood.
Think there's a mosh pit? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Carrefour Stage Boss - Yachimata no Akiwaza's theme | title =彼女の千歳飴 | roma =Kanojo no chitose-ame | titleEN =Her Millennium CandyChitose-Ame (千歳飴, lit. "Thousand-year Candy") is a type of red and white candy stick sold on "Shichi-Go-San" (七五三, lit. "Seven-Five-Three"), a traditional Japanese rite-of-passage holiday
for seven year old and three year old girls (and sometimes three year old boys) held annually on November 15th. The candies themselves symbolize longevity and healthy growth. | composer =Frogmask | comment =八衢　明伎（やちまた　の　あきわざ）のテーマです。

GPSのような神様、とか何か。
あ、あの信号機の曲も入ってるじゃん！
曲名の由来は、「千歳飴 → 七五三 → 通りゃんせ」……みたいな。

“通りゃんせ、通りゃんせ……”
“ここはどこの避け道じゃ？” (笑) | translation =Yachimata no Akiwaza's theme.

A GPS-like god, or something like that.
She even has [[wikipedia:Tōryanse|that stop-light song]], woah!
The name sort of goes; "Chitose Ame → Shichi-Go-San → Toryanse."

'You may go in, you may enter...
Which way is this narrow pathway?' (ha) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Bad Ending theme | title =天水オーバーフロー | roma =Tensui ōbāfurō | titleEN =Rainwater Overflow | composer =Frogmask | comment =バッドエンドのテーマです。

え、ええ～？ もうバッドエンド用の曲まで作る時代じゃないって？
まあバッドエンド自体はまだ時代遅れじゃないから……。

実はバッドエンドを書いた後からこの曲を作りました。
だってグッドエンドの方は寂しさが足りなかったよ！
(各バッドエンドでも希望がわずかに残ってますが……) | translation =The bad ending theme.

W-what? It's not normal to have these anymore?
Well, it's still normal to have bad endings, so...

The truth is that I wrote this song after writing the bad endings.
The good ending song wasn't bleak enough!
(Even though there's a glimmer of hope in each of the bad endings anyway...) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Good Ending theme | title =静寂なる天命 | roma =Seijaku-naru tenmei | titleEN =Quiet Destiny | composer =Frogmask | comment =グッドエンドのテーマです。

今度はただの穏やかな曲だよ！ いや、本当だって！ (笑)
つかの間の休み、みたいな感じを曲に染み込ませようとしました……
流れ雲の海に身をまかせるような。 | translation =The good ending theme.

Really, really, it's just something gentle this time! (ha)
I meant to imbue this with a transient sort of feeling...
Like a sea of clouds washing over you. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Carrefour Ending theme | title =アヤメの花束 | roma =Ayame no hanataba | titleEN =Bouquet of IrisesAn arrange of ''[[List_by_Song/Highly_Responsive_to_Prayers#Ending_theme|Iris]]'', the ending theme from ''[[Highly Responsive to Prayers]]''. | composer =Frogmask | comment =後日談エンディングのテーマです。

懐かしいエンディングに相応しい懐かしい曲。
結局のところ、幻想郷は幻想郷のままです。

それゆえに幻想郷はいつも変わり続けている。
息を吸って、息を吐いて……まさに今の貴方のように！
……はは、まあ、念のために“あの曲”の一部も少しだけ入れてみました。 | translation =The post-game ending theme.

A nostalgic song meant to compliment nostalgic endings.
At the end of the day, Gensokyo is still Gensokyo.

And by virtue of that, it's always changing.
Breathing in and breathing out, just like your body right now!
...Haha, well, I threw in a bit of [[Theme_of_Eastern_Story|*that* tune]]
into this arrange for good measure. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll theme | title =太陽ハ天上ノ海ニ沈ム | roma =Taiyō wa tenjō no umi ni shizumu | titleEN =The Sun Sets in the Sea Over the Sky | composer =Spectral Nexus | comment =スタッフロールのテーマです。

打ち寄せる波ほど身を癒す音、沈みゆく太陽ほど目を引く景色は
そうそういないと思います。 だからストレス満々な通しプレイの後に
「クリアおめでとう！ もう休んでいいよ～」みたいなシーンを
入れるとしたら、やっぱり日没ごろの浜辺が一番いいでしょうね。
もうーそろそろバカンス行きたいなぁ…… | translation =The staff roll theme.

There's no sound as relaxing as the crashing waves,
no sight as captivating as the setting sun.
So it's only natural that a sunset beach is the ideal setting for a
"congrats, take a breather!" moment, after such a tense playthrough.
I want to go on holiday already... }} {{MusicRoom | category =Carrefour Staff Roll theme | title =流れ星々のヒストリー | roma =Nagare-boshiboshi no hisutorī | titleEN =A History of Falling Stars | composer =Frogmask | comment =後日談スタッフロールのテーマです。

気をつけないと流れ星にぶつけられるよ？
まあ流れ星以外にもぶつけられるものが沢山あるんですが……

とりあえず、こっちのスタッフロールの為にどこか子供っぽいものを作りました。
大昔の神様に比べると、みんな子供みたいなものなんじゃない？
別に悪い意味で言っているわけじゃないよ。 時に童心に戻るのもとても良いこと。 | translation =The post-game staff roll theme.

If you're not careful, a falling star's gonna hit you.
I mean, I guess there's a lot of things other than falling stars...

Anyways, I wrote something sort of childish for this staff roll.
They're all children compared to the gods of old, aren't they?
Not that that's a bad thing. Sometimes it's good just being a kid. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Last Word theme | title =カーテンファイヤーガーラ | roma =Kāten faiyā gāra | titleEN =Curtain Fire Gala | composer =Frogmask | comment =ラストワードのテーマです。

じゃじゃーん！ 実はラストワードもあったよ！
と、永夜抄の「東方妖怪小町」は割と暗いように感じましたので
こっちを明るいものにしたかったです。

今度はお祭りで大団円ですからね。
さあ、キャラ達(と私達)のみんなから貴方への最後の言葉(ラストワード)ですよ。 | translation =The Last Word theme.

Surprise! We had a Last Word mode, all along!
Oh, since Eastern Youkai Beauty from IN is so melancholy,
I wanted something cheery...

It's a festival this time, after all.
One final word from all of them (and us) to you. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Score theme | title =スコアの休らむ所 | roma =Sukoa no yasuramu tokoro | titleEN =Score's Resting PlaceAn arrange of ''[[List_by_Song/Mountain_of_Faith#Score_theme|Player's Score]]'' from ''[[Mountain of Faith]]'' onwards, as well as ''[[List_by_Song/Mystic_Square#Name_registration_theme|Soul's Resting Place]]'' from ''[[Mystic Square]]''. | composer =Frogmask | comment =ゲームオーバーのテーマです。

君のスコアをここに眠らせたまえ。
同時に不気味さも安心感もある曲です。

……本当に曲が多いよね？ このゲーム。
これらの曲が、貴方の穹蒼洋へのダイビングに似合うことを望みます。 | translation =The game over theme.

Lay your score to rest.
This song is both haunting and relieving.

...There's really an awful lot of songs in this game, isn't there?
I hope they suit your dive into the Expanse well. }} {{MusicRoom | category =(Bonus) Jami Wang's theme | title =Pocket Monster | roma = | titleEN =Pocket Monster | composer =Spectral Nexus | comment =　 | translation =The first of the bonus themes.

This was actually the very first theme I made for SP, back when the game was still just a forum post.
I had thought the team were still looking for a composer, and made this theme for Jami (the original first stage boss) in one quick sitting, as a proof of concept.
Turns out — Jami's position as a boss had already been usurped by Azure, and my position as a lead composer had already been usurped by Frogmask! (Just kidding, haha!)

In any case, it's really nice to see this theme released along with the finished game after all of these years. Quite a sentimental "full-circle" moment for me. <3 }} {{MusicRoom | category =(Bonus) Jiriri Kim's theme | title =大空を汚すへージーオーメン | roma =Oozora o yogosu hējī ōmen | titleEN =A Hazy Omen, Staining the Open Sky | composer =Spectral Nexus | comment =　 | translation =The second of the bonus themes.

Of the three bonus themes, this was the only one I made with the intention of being a bonus theme,
and so I felt comfortable to take a more experimental approach with the structure, this time around.
It has an incredibly dark and heavy front, but if you listen more closely,
you might actually be able to find an air of cuteness behind the melodies.
In short, it's a very tsundere-sounding theme, haha.

........Wait, so does this mean the ever-prophesied "Jiriri Phantasm" was real all along~? }} {{MusicRoom | category =(Bonus) Iroha Tsubasa's theme | title =幻想激炎　〜 Set the Sea Ablaze!! | roma =Gensō gekien | titleEN =Phantasmal Furious Flame ~ Set the Sea Ablaze!! | composer =Spectral Nexus | comment =　 | translation =The third of the bonus themes.

Before any of you start thinking "woah, this is a little heavy for Iroha!", I promise there's a good reason.
You see, this theme wasn't originally made for Iroha Tsubasa... but rather Irohahime Kazarashi.
That's right — Umehime used to have a twin sister: A hotheaded younger twin with a fiery spirit and phantasmal fire dragons to match!
However, some internal discourse during development unfortunately led to her being scrapped.
Rest in peace...

On that note — I wonder, why *do* the Hammon enjoy the smell of fire...? }} {{MusicRoom | category =(Bonus) Nusakoro Pandora's theme (original) | title =アーケインアウグル (黒羽 Edition) | roma =Ākein auguru | titleEN =Arcane Augur (KUROHA Edition) | composer =KUROHA }} ==Notes== {{smallrefs}} {{Navbox SP}} [[Category:Music by Game]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title theme | title =萎れた豊富 | roma =Shioreta houfu | titleEN =Withered Bounty | composer =Abner | comment =タイトル画面テーマです。 タイトル画面は暖色が多いから、暖かくて 少し歓迎するような感じの曲にしました。 作品の古風な雰囲気を紹介する曲でもあります。 | translation =The title theme. The title menu has a lot of warm colours, so I made this song to be a bit warm as well to feel somewhat welcoming. It also introduces the more traditional atmosphere of the game. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 theme | title =金色の太陽と雲色の地平線 | roma =Kin'iro no taiyou to kumoiro no chiheisen | titleEN =The Golden Sun and the Cloud-Colored Horizon | composer =Abner | comment =１面テーマです。 ゲームの始まりを穏やかでありながら、 少し吹きさらした雰囲気にしたかった。 かなりピンポイントだけど、ステージ と上手く合うと思います^^'' | translation =The stage 1 theme. I wanted to start off the game with a peaceful feeling that's somewhat windy. It is pretty specific, but I think it fits the stage well.^^" }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 - [[Servants of Harvest Wish/Characters#Akami Kurotsuka|Akami Kurotsuka]]'s theme | title =キュムロニンバスグリマス | roma =Kyumuroninbasu gurimasu | titleEN =Cumulonimbus Grimace | composer =Abner | comment =黒塚　赤実（くろつか　あかみ）のテーマです。 赤実の再登場！でも今度は１面ボス。最初の ボスだとしても、余りのんびりした曲にしたく なかった。彼女自身は割と強いから、ちょっとの 緊張感を入れようとしました。 | translation =Akami Kurotsuka's theme. Akami's back! However, this time as a stage 1 boss. I didn't want to make the song too laid back even if she is a stage 1 boss in this game. I decided to go for a bit of tension since she is quite strong in her own right. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 theme | title =人獣夕行 | roma =Jinjuu sekikou | titleEN =Evening Parade of Humans and Beasts | composer =Abner | comment =２面テーマです。 行進かパレードのような曲を目指して作りました。 お祭りみたいな感じが出来上がって、かなり 満足しています～ | translation =The stage 2 theme. Made this song to feel like a march or a parade. I am pretty happy with the festive feel it has. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 - [[Servants of Harvest Wish/Characters#Kagemo|Kagemo]]'s theme | title =よさこいフォックストロット | roma =Yosakoi fokkusutorotto | titleEN =[[Wikipedia:Yosakoi|Yosakoi]] Foxtrot | composer =Abner | comment =影面（かげも）のテーマです。 影面ちゃん！彼女の性格もあって、作曲する のが楽しいボスでした。ハイテンションで元気な 曲として作りました。いつもだとあまり使わない エレキドラムまで入ってみた。 | translation =Kagemo's theme. Kagemo! She was a fun boss to compose for given her personality. I made this to feel lively and fun. I even added electric drums which I tend to stay away from. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 theme | title =森の花にご用心 | roma =Mori no hana ni goyoujin | titleEN =Beware the Forest's Flowers | composer =Abner | comment =３面テーマです。 主人公達の旅が続けると、かなり多忙な 夜になる。夜の雰囲気で、少し神秘とした 感じの曲にした。作って楽しかったよ。 | translation =The stage 3 theme. As our heroines continue on their adventure, the night becomes quite hectic. Made this song to sound night-like with a hint of a mystic feel. Pretty fun to make. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss - [[Servants of Harvest Wish/Characters#Yukiko Tsubaki|Yukiko Tsubaki]]'s theme | title =夜咲きツバキ　～ Heart of the Swarm | roma =Yozaki tsubaki | titleEN =Night-Blooming Camellia ~ Heart of the Swarm | composer =Abner | comment =鍔木　幸子（つばき　ゆきこ）のテーマです。 幸子のテーマも作るのが楽しかったです。 いくつかのシンセサイザー楽器で蜂っぽい音を 出しました。キャラの性格に相応しく、熱がある けど割と優雅な感じにしました。 | translation =Yukiko Tsubaki's theme. Yukiko's theme was pretty fun to make. I made some instruments sound somewhat like bees (i.e. synth). I made this song to feel a bit intense given her character but also somewhat elegant. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 theme | title =星海の風波 | roma =Seikai no fuuha | titleEN =Windy Waves of a Starry Sea | composer =Abner | comment =４面テーマです。 ジャズっぽくてクールな感じから始まる曲です。 イントロの落ち着いたところから少し感情的に、 そして不安的になるように作りたかった。 最後の部分は後の戦いへちょっとした伏線です＾＾ | translation =The stage 4 theme. This song starts off kind of jazzy and chill. I wanted to make the intro a bit relaxed, then a bit more emotional, then uneasy. The ending gives a small hint of the future battle. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 Boss - [[Servants of Harvest Wish/Characters#Meimei|Meimei]]'s theme | title =ネメシスの魔法人形 | roma =Nemeshisu no mahou ningyou | titleEN =Poppet of Nemesis | composer =Abner | comment =メイメイのテーマです。 メイメイのテーマは面白いでした。不気味な音を目指して、 実際不気味な声の音源を見つけてドはまりました。 あとメイメイちゃん自身も可愛いと不気味という属性を 両方持ってていいですね！可愛さの方は大きいけど。 | translation =Meimei's theme. Meimei's theme was an interesting challenge. I wanted to make this pretty creepy sounding and I found a pretty creepy voice sound and got obsessed with it. Oh, also just wanted to mention that Meimei is adorable and creepy at the same time! But mostly adorable. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5A Theme | title =聖な神社　俗な巫女 (Ruby Version) | roma =Sei na jinja　zoku na miko | titleEN =A Profane Shrine Maiden in a Sacred Shrine (Ruby Version) | composer =Abner | comment =５面テーマです（Ａタイプ）。 それぞれのルートに応じてちょっとだけ変わる曲にしてみたかった。 何故か地って言うとギターが思い浮かびます。もしかして…… 「ロック」ミュージックだから？えへへ……へ。……コホン | translation =The stage 5 theme (A type). Wanted to make this theme slightly different between the two possibilities. For some reason, I think of a guitar when I think of earth. Perhaps because of... ROCK music? Ehehe...eh.... }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5B Theme | title =聖な神社　俗な巫女 (Sapphire Version) | roma =Sei na jinja　zoku na miko | titleEN =A Profane Shrine Maiden in a Sacred Shrine (Sapphire Version) | composer =Abner | comment =５面テーマです（Ｂタイプ）。 中ボス登場の所以外はもう一方のルートと似ています。 ハープは優雅な感じに繋がるでしょう？ なので水に相応しいと思いました。 | translation =The stage 5 theme (B type). Similar to the other path, I made the song similar aside from the midboss appearance. A harp sounds pretty elegant, no? I thought it was a good fit to represent water. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 Boss - [[Servants of Harvest Wish/Characters#Saruta Mitama|Saruta Mitama]] and [[Servants of Harvest Wish/Characters#Uzume Mitama|Uzume Mitama]]'s theme | title =対決！如意宝珠の試練 | roma =Taiketsu! Nyoi houju no shiren | titleEN =Showdown! Trial of the Wish-Fulfilling Jewel | composer =Abner | comment =三珠 申田(みたま さるた) ＆ 鈿目 (うずめ) のテーマです。 作曲がすごく楽しかったテーマ！主役は間違いなく トランペットですね。他の曲と少し違う雰囲気を意識して 作りましたが、何というかアニメのＯＰっぽくなりました。 結果的にはかなり気に入っている曲です。 | translation =Saruta and Uzume Mitama's theme. This theme was a blast! The trumpets are really the centerpiece of this. This song was made with a somewhat different mentality. More like an anime theme opening or something. I really liked how it turned out in the end. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 theme | title =ヴルペクラ・エト・アンサー | roma =Vurupekura eto ansā | titleEN =Vulpecula et Anser | composer =Abner | comment =６面テーマです。 無から始まるステージですし、その序幕にオルゴールが ぴったり合うと思います。神主風というより少しオーケストラ のような感じですが、これもステージに相応しいかと。 | translation =The stage 6 theme. The stage starts off with nothingness and I think the music box really complements the beginning. This song has a small bit of an orchestral feel rather than a ZUN-like one, but I think it goes with the stage. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Boss - [[Servants of Harvest Wish/Characters#Touko Ugajin|Touko Ugajin]]'s theme | title =日出観月　～ Best Wishes | roma =Nisshutsu kangetsu | titleEN =Rising Sun Moon Viewing ~ Best Wishes | composer =Abner | comment =宇賀神 稲狐 (うがじん とうこ) のテーマです。 いつもより優雅な雰囲気を目指してみたテーマ。 他の後半曲に比べるとスローペースですが、やっぱり こうした方がキャラに合うだと感じました。柔らかな 性格で一緒にお茶を飲みたい人ですね、稲狐さんは。 | translation =Touko Ugajin's theme. This theme was meant to be made more elegant sounding than the rest. Compared to most late game songs, it is a bit slower, but I felt it was necessary to make it to fit her character. Touko seems like a chill person I would have a cup of tea with, to be honest. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Boss - [[Servants of Harvest Wish/Characters#Touko Ugajin|Touko Ugajin]]'s Last Spell theme | title =Master of Harvest Wish | titleEN =Master of Harvest Wish | composer =Abner | comment =ラストスペルのテーマです。 一段と激しくなった稲狐のテーマ！ シチュエーションに合わせて一気に盛り上がります。 もはやお茶を飲んでいる場合じゃあない！ | translation =The Last Spell theme. Now Touko's theme becomes a bit more intense! This song really builds up quickly to make the situation a lot more intense. No more tea here! }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra stage theme | title =曼珠と沙華の神隠し　～ by any other name | roma =Manju to shage no kamikakushi | titleEN =Spiriting Away of Manju and Saka{{nihongo|Manju|曼珠}} and {{nihongo|Saka|沙華}} are two halves of the Japanese term for {{nihongo|[[wikipedia:Lycoris radiata|Cluster Amaryllis]]|曼珠沙華|manjusaka}}. ~ by any other name | composer =Abner | comment =エキストラステージのテーマです。 本編と打って変わったような雰囲気のＥＸなので、ちょっと 実験的な方向性で行きました。シンセを多く使うにはあまり 慣れていないが、これで新しいスタイルを発見できたかも！ とにかく楽しかった。あと、この頭の中の声は誰だろう…… | translation =The Extra stage theme. Because the Extra stage is so different from the main game, I went a bit experimental on this. I am not used to using a lot of synths for music but I think I may have found a new style! A lot of fun making this one. Also makes me wonder whose voice is in my head... }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage Boss - [[Servants of Harvest Wish/Characters#Shirigai no Mamo|Shirigai no Mamo]]'s theme | title =藻女のマインドゲーム | roma =Mikuzume no maindogēmu | titleEN =Mikuzume's Mind Game"Mikuzume" is the name given to a disguised Tamamo-no-Mae by a married couple that adopted her while she was disguised as a human baby. | composer =Naudiz (arranged by Abner) | comment =紂 眞藻(しりがいの　まも) のテーマです。 最後の幕開きと共に、{{ruby-ja|黒幕様|マスターマインド}}が現れる！
さあ、自分の名前を忘れてしまいそうなほどに摩訶不思議な 弾幕の演劇を見てごらん！我の影響により、Abnerくんがこの曲を 素晴らしくアレンジしてくれた。マインドコントロールｉｓ楽しい | translation =Shirigai no Mamo's theme.

The final curtain has risen, and the mastermind has shown her face!
Now, behold a show of danmaku so spectacularly mind-boggling, you might even forget your own name! Under my influence, Abner brought this theme to life. Mind control sure is fun. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage Boss - [[Servants of Harvest Wish/Characters#Shirigai no Mamo|Shirigai no Mamo]]'s theme (Original version) | title =藻女のマインドゲーム (Mastermind Edition) | roma =Mikuzume no maindogēmu | titleEN =Mikuzume's Mind Game (Mastermind Edition) | composer =Naudiz | comment =紂 眞藻(しりがいの　まも) のテーマです（原曲）。 どじゃーん！元の作曲者は他ならぬ我であーる！ 言い換えてみれば、この曲のマスターマインドってことかな。 そして謎を解けて曲を解放したプレイヤーのキミも 立派なマスターマインドだろうね！はい、はなまる。 | translation =Shirigai no Mamo's theme (original). Surprise! 'Twas I who composed this theme! You could almost say I'm the mastermind behind it. And since you, the player, solved the riddle needed to unlock this theme, I'd say you qualify as a mastermind yourself! Five stars for you. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Overdrive theme | title =鉄扇術ダンス　～ Harvest Mix | roma =Tessenjutsu dansu | titleEN =[https://youtu.be/mLxEMk7udHw Tessenjutsu Dance] ~ Harvest Mix | composer =Abner | comment =オーバードライブのテーマです。 わー、これは懐かしいですね！当サークルに参加する きっかけとなった初心者だった頃の1曲ですよ。 当作品の雰囲気に合わせて再アレンジすることができて とても嬉しい。 | translation =The Overdrive theme. Ahhh, this song brings back memories! One of the first songs I ever composed that eventually led me to join Dreamcatcher! I was glad to be able to recreate this song to fit into this game. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending theme | title =三つの神社、三つの願い | roma =Mittsu no jinja, mittsu no negai | titleEN =Three Shrines, Three Wishes | composer =Abner | comment =エンディングのテーマです。 なんだかうまく言えないけど、神社っぽい感じにしたかった。 とても不思議で伝統的な音かと思います。そして落ち着いた 雰囲気の裏に重さもあるんです。 | translation =The ending theme. I wanted to bring a shrine-like feeling for this one. I don't know how to explain. Very mysterious and traditional sounding. I also feel like it is somewhat relaxing but has an intense undertone. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll theme | title =秋風得意　～ Wishful Dreaming | roma =Shuufuu tokui | titleEN =The Autumn Breeze Has Obtained Its Wish ~ Wishful Dreaming | composer =Abner | comment =スタッフロールのテーマです。 旅の始まりと終わりをもう一度訪れるスタッフロール曲。 一つの冒険が終わったけど、次のもこれから始まる！という 気持ちにさせたかった。あと押しキャラの竜子の隣に自分の 名前が書いてあって嬉しい！！ | translation =The staff roll theme. The staff roll theme revisits the beginning and the end of the adventure. I wanted the staff roll to feel like it was the end of a journey but also the start of a new one. It also lets my name be next to Ryouko (Best Girl)! }} {{MusicRoom | category =Game Over theme | title =プレイヤーズスコア　～ Reap and Sow | roma =Pureiyāzu sukoa | titleEN =Player's Score ~ Reap and Sow | composer =Abner | comment =ゲームオーバーテーマです。 琴と尺八を少し入った、いつものような プレイヤーズスコアのテーマ。より古風な 雰囲気で作ろうと決めました。 | translation =The game over theme. A typical Player's Score theme with a bit of koto and shakuhachi. Simple and pure. I decided to give a more traditional feel into it. }} {{clear}} {{Navbox SoHW}} [[Category: Music by Game]]

revision.comment: Changes to song titles. I think these are closer to the intended meaning. Still not sure how to translate Rakuki's theme though, since it's an idiom which roughly means "quick as a flash"

revision.text:
The game includes 20 [[wikipedia:MIDI|MIDI]] tracks composed by [[ZUN]] for the Roland SC-88Pro module. High quality recordings of these MIDI files made with this module can be found [https://www.shrinemaiden.org/forum/index.php/topic,18989.0.html here]. Three unused tracks from the prototype versions of Shuusou Gyoku were posted on ZUN's site, as part of [[ZUN's Strange Works]]. ==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title screen Theme | title =秋霜玉　～ Clockworks | roma = Shuusou gyoku | titleEN =Autumn Frost Orb ~ Clockworks | source1 =Music room | comment1 =タイトル曲です。 ど～も。ＺＵＮです。 秋霜玉は久しぶりのゲーム曲ということで楽しく作らせてもらいました。 でも、この曲は暗すぎるだよね（笑） それともいつも通り（＾＾； | translation1 =This is the title theme. Hey. I'm [[ZUN]]. In ''[[Shuusou Gyoku]]'' here, I've gotten to have fun making game music for the first time in a while. But, this song is too dark (lol) Or, maybe it's the same as always (^^; | source2 =創曲幻想.txt | comment2 =これは、タイトルです。 いやまんま。 Clockworks はアンドロイドというところからそんだけ。 | translation2 =This is the title theme. It's okay. The Clockworks comes from VIVIT being an [[android]]. | source3 = ssg_01.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/music_old.html 東方幻想的音楽] | comment3 = もともと短くて暗い曲だったので、暗くて短い曲になりました。 そもそも、こんなに暗い曲創るつもりなんて微塵もなかったのに。あ、嘘、微塵はあった、 いや、ちょっとあった... いや、結構...(^^; ものすごく迷ったんですけどね。この曲も作成コミケ一週間前位だったし、ね。 う～ん。でも、ネームレジストよりはましだよね(^^;; | translation3 = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Theme | title =フォルスストロベリー | roma = Forusu sutoroberii | titleEN =False Strawberry | source1 =Music room | comment1 =１面テーマです。 西洋をイメージして創るつもれでしたが、結果はそんなでも．．． とりあえず１面っぽさは出てると思う（＾＾； サビのピアノは東方の時ＦＭで表現出来なかった事をやってみました。 | translation1 =The first stage theme. I tried making it in the image of Western countries, but it ended up like this... Still, I think it feels very first stage-ish (^^; I tried to do things with the main section's piano that I couldn't really express well with [[Touhou Project|Touhou]]-era FM. | source2 =創曲幻想.txt | comment2 =False Strawberry ：偽苺 設定より、植物はほぼ全て偽物、と言うことと、草原ステージから。 ベリー系の植物は大好きです、響きが | translation2 =False Strawberry: a fake strawberry In this setting, almost all the plants are fake, and this is a grasslands stage, so... I really like the sounds of the names of berries. | source3 = ssg_02.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/music_old.html 東方幻想的音楽] | comment3 = 秋霜玉の中では一番最初に創った曲です。(2000/02) サビと同時に中ボス出してね、とか注文した記憶があります。 サビのピアノは陶酔しながら（酩酊しながら（^^;）弾いて創って いたりする（そんなんばっかだね、アルコオルプログラマ(ぉ） | translation3 =This was the very first song created for ''Shuusou Gyoku''. (2000/02) I remember I was told to put the peak of the song at the same time as the [[boss]] appearance. The peak was made by playing the piano whilst I was drunk (quality from my intoxicated state (^^;) I guess I'm nothing but a drunken programmer (lol) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Boss - [[Milia]]'s Theme | title =プリムローズシヴァ | roma = Purimurouzu shiva | titleEN =Primrose Shiver | source1 =Music room | comment1 =１面ボス、ミリアのテーマです。 いつも思う、１面ボスの曲って難しい（＾＾； 今回は暗くならないように注意して創りました。そのかいあってか、そんなに暗くないです。 サビのメロディは今までにないタイプだと思います。 | translation1 =The first stage boss, Milia's, theme. I've always thought the first stage boss theme is hard (^^; I paid close attention to not making this too dark during composition. Maybe because of that, this song isn't too dark. I think the main melody is a type I haven't made before. | source2 =創曲幻想.txt | comment2 =Primrose Shiver ：戦慄のプリムローズ（桜草） フォルス～に合わして植物系で。少女系の雰囲気と響きでこんな感じ。 いつもこんな感じ（笑） | translation2 =Primrose Shiver: a shivering primrose A plant name to go with False Strawberry. It has a girlish atmosphere and sound. I always make songs like that. (lol) | source3 = ssg_03.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/music_old.html 東方幻想的音楽] | comment3 = ちょっと昔の曲なので、今の自分風に手直ししてみました。 曲が短くていい感じです（なにが？(^^;） この曲のサビは出来た当時、メロディが頭から離れなくなってしまう病気に冒されて しまったのを覚えています。 今回の準オリジナルで、西洋＋少女面を強調したよん。 | translation3 = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Theme | title =幻想帝都 | roma = Gensou teito | titleEN =Fantastic Imperial Capital | source1 =Music room | comment1 =２面のテーマです。 ２面は都帝面ということで、いままであまりやったことのない、近未来的なイメージを重視してみました。いやするつもりでした（＾＾； この曲、珍しくデータ化する前に全て出来あがった曲です。　おかげでスピーディに仕上がりました（笑） | translation1 =This is the stage 2 theme. Since stage two is an urban stage, I decided to stress a near-future-style image, which is something I've never really done before. Well, at least I tried (^^; For the first time in a while, I was able to finish the song before entering it into the computer, so I was able to finish it very quickly (lol) | source2 =創曲幻想.txt | comment2 =都市面と聴いたので。作者は荒俣宏のファンでもあります（笑） 幻想皇帝＋帝都物語。でも帝都ってイメージに無理がある（汗） | translation2 =Well, I heard it was gonna be a city level. The creator's a fan of [[Wikipedia:Hiroshi Aramata|Hiroshi Aramata]]. (lol) ''Emperor's Fantasy'' + ''The Tale of the Imperial Capital''... Well, so much for the "Capital" image. *sweatdrop* | source3 = ssg_04.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/music_old.html 東方幻想的音楽] | comment3 = なかなか完成されてる曲みたいで、ぜんぜんいじれなかったです(ぉ この曲は、珍しくデータ化する前にメロディが出来上がっていたタイプで、 データにするのはあっという間だったことを覚えています。 メロディは会社にいるときに全て頭の中で・・・ （仕事しろよ（笑）） | translation3 = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Boss - [[Mei and Mai]]'s Theme | title =ディザストラスジェミニ | roma = Dizasutorasu jemini | titleEN =Disastrous Gemini | source1 =Music room | comment1 =２面ボス、めい＆まいのデーまです。 とにかく、子供っぽさが出ればいいなぁ的感覚で書きました。 制作前のイメージとかけ離れた曲になったけど、結果オーライですね。 思う存分少女っぽい曲ですが、結局今までの曲もみんなそうだったかも（笑） | translation1 =This is the theme of the second stage bosses, Mei and Mai. Anyway, I figured it would be nice to have this turn out with a really child-like feel to it as I wrote it. It didn't really turn out the way I thought it would, but I think the result is still all right. It's a song that I got to make as little-girl-ish as I wanted, but maybe all my songs have been like that (lol) | source2 =創曲幻想.txt | comment2 =Disastrous Gemini : 災悪の双子 ストレートな曲名。 ただ、最初の設定で双子かどうか分からなかったのではじめは、ディザストラスロリータという名前の予定でした(^^; | translation2 =Disastrous Gemini: twins of disaster A straightforward title. At first, I didn't know that you were going to face off against twins, so I'd originally planned for this song to be called Disastrous Lolita (^^; | source3 = ssg_05.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/music_old.html 東方幻想的音楽] | comment3 = じつは、大のお気に入り。 今回はボス面を強調して、かっこよく、かつ軽快に仕上げてみました。 この曲も短いね～(^^;; でも手は抜いてないなりよ。いやほんと。 で、いつも思う。こういう曲のジャンルって？ 私はジャズのつもりだったりするのだが（笑） | translation3 = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Theme | title =華の幻想　紅夢の宙 | roma = Hana no gensou Koumu no sora | titleEN =Illusion of Flowers, Sky of Scarlet Dreams | source1 =Music room | comment1 =３面テーマです。 なんていうか、自分的に珍しい曲かも。 はてしない雰囲気でも出ればいいかね、とか考えて創ったのですが。 珍しくポップな雰囲気が珍しくて、珍しいです。 ゲームとしてはアクセントとなっていいかと思ってますが。 でも、ポップか？（笑） | translation1 =This is the third stage theme. Personally, this feels like something I don't usually write. I thought it would be nice if it had a kind of endless atmosphere while I was writing it, but...
