気に入り。このステージは、弾が激しく
てそれどころじゃないかもしれないけど
・・・ | translation2 =Compared to the FM version, it feels like it's leveled up. The electric piano gives it a sort of radio feel that's nice. The main melody in the MIDI version is pretty nice. This stage has so many bullets that maybe it's not the right place for it, though... |source3=th2_12pmd.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/pmd.html here] |comment3=このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方封魔録より【 エキストララブ 】オリジナル版です。 エキストラステージとは、実は封魔録立ち上げ時にどうしても入れたい仕様だったので、
これを込みの計画でスケジュールを組んだ記憶があります。 この曲は、もっと元気いっぱいでも良かったなぁと思いますね。
でも、この頃から進歩が少ないなぁと(^^; ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ |translation3= }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Boss - [[Rika]]'s 2nd theme | title =戦車むすめのみるゆめThe internal title is spelled "戦車娘のみるゆめ"'. ZUN substituted 娘 with hiragana in the in-game title. Both names mean the exact same thing. | roma =Sensha musume no miru yume | titleEN =The Tank Girl's Dream | also ={{Akyu|3}} | source1 =FM Version | comment1 =ある天才少女のテーマ。わざと初めは
かわいげのある感じに仕上げてます。
曲の後半部分は、かっこいい風に仕上た
つもりです。エキストララブの先律を使
っています。でも、曲とは裏腹にこいつ
は・・・　つよすぎ～(^^; | translation1 =The theme for a certain girl genius. At the early part, it's deliberately meant to feel particularly cute. In later part, I intended to finish the song in a cool style. The song uses the same progression as Extra Love. Still, conversely, this song is... ... too strong (^^; | source2 =MIDI Version | comment2 =　なんかＦＭ版に比べ、悲しげにきこえ
るのは何故でしょう。同じフレーズを繰
り返してますが、ループまでかなり長い
です。長いからゲーム中は最後まできけ
ないかっていうと、このボス、かなり長
い（つまり強い）ので必ず最後まできけ
ます。 | translation2 =Somehow, compared to the FM version, it sounds more tragic; I wonder why? It repeats the same phrases over and over, but it takes a long time to loop. You may think it's too long to listen to all, but this boss costs you quite a long time (that is, she's strong）, so you can always listen to it till the last part. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending theme | title =遠野の森 | roma =Toono no mori | titleEN =Forest of Tono | also ={{Akyu|3}} | source1 =FM Version | comment1 =エンディングの曲。ちょっと暗め、エ
ンディングは暗くないんだけど。 | translation1 =The ending song. It's a little dark, but the ending isn't really dark at all. | source2 =MIDI Version | comment2 =もしかして、ゲーム中一番場面に合わ
ない曲かもしれない。そんなに悲しい曲
じゃないんだけど、エンディングは全然
暗くないので。 | translation2 =This might be the one song in the game that is the most out of place for its stage. It's not really that sad, but the ending isn't dark at all, so. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll theme | title =青空超えて | titletype =(Internal title) | roma =Aozora koete | title2 =昔話わんだらーんど | roma2 =Mukashibanashi wandarāndo | titleEN =Crossing the Blue Sky | titleEN2 =Legendary Wonderland | also ={{Akyu|3}} | source1 =FM Version | comment1 =スタッフロールの曲。やっぱ、スタッ
フロールはリズムのある元気な曲にしよ
う、と思ったのに・・・。
元気はあるけど、ちょっと暗めかな？ | translation1 =The staff roll song. I thought the staff roll song should be an upbeat song with strong rhythm, but ... It's energetic, but isn't it a little too dark? | source2 =MIDI Version | comment2 =この曲だけ倍近くのパートを使ってま
す。だから音が深い。完全に自分の得意
なパターンです。ＦＭ版と違って、さび
だけを繰り返さないでまた頭に戻ります。 | translation2 =This is the only song that uses twice as many parts as usual. So, the sounds are very thick. This is the sort of pattern I'm absolutely best at. Unlike the FM version, it doesn't repeat the main part, but goes right back to the beginning. | source3 =th12_15pmd.txt from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/pmd.html here] | comment3 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。 東方封魔録より【 昔話わんだーらんど 】オリジナル版です。 この曲は、オリジナルはMIDI版で、この曲はそれを元にアレンジした物です。
ちょっと変わってますが、いつもながらの激しさと可愛らしさを持った曲でいい感じ
です。 実はスタッフロールとは、どういう曲が良いのか、今でもわからないのが現状です。
私は、安易なメインテーマのスロー版とか創りたくなかったし、ミディアム（またはスロー）
テンポな、落ち着いた曲なんて...
と思ってますからねぇ、今でも(^^;; 幻の曲は、いつデータ化するのでしょうか（笑） それにしても、ラストっぽくなさがたまらんです（笑） ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか　ＺＵＮ | translation3 = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Unused | title =博麗神社境内 | roma =Hakurei jinja keidai | titleEN =Hakurei Shrine Grounds | also ={{Akyu|3}} | comment =１面に使用するつもりで作ったのですが・・・、 最初は霊異伝の曲が暗かったんで今度は明るくしようということでこんな感じになりました。 でも、結局ボツ(^^;;;; | translation =I made this, intending for it to be the first stage theme, but... Since the early songs in HRtP were so dark, so I thought I'd make this one brighter, and it ended up like this. But, I threw it out (^^;;;; }} {{MusicRoom | category =Unused | title =陽落ちて | roma =Hi ochite | titleEN =Sunfall | also ={{Akyu|3}} | comment =２面に使用するつもりでした。 悪くは無いんですが・・・ 中途半端なかんじでボツ。 | translation =I was going to use this for stage 2. It's not bad, but ... It felt half-hearted, so I threw it out. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Unused | title =封魔終演 | roma =Fuuma shuuen | titleEN =Demon-Sealing Finale | also ={{Akyu|3}} | comment =スタッフロールに使用する予定でしたが・・・ いまじゃ考えられないほど軽快なノリだな～(^^;;; わりと好きな系統だけど、ゲーム全体のバランスからみてボツ。 | translation =I had planned on using this for the staff roll, but... The rhythm is so light it's almost unthinkable now (^^;;; It has a rather fine pedigree, but it didn't balance well with the other songs in the game, so I threw it out. }} == Also See == *[[List_by_Song/Story_of_Eastern_Wonderland|Story of Eastern Wonderland arrangements listed by song]] == External links == *[https://www.shrinemaiden.org/forum/index.php/topic,18989.0.html ZUN's MIDI files played on a real SC-88Pro, including the MIDI version of the Story of Eastern Wonderland soundtrack and the arrangements from his site.] {{Project Translations Notice}} {{Navbox SoEW}} [[Category:Story of Eastern Wonderland]] [[Category:Music by Game]] [[Category:Documentation Translations]] [[ru:Story of Eastern Wonderland/Музыка]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title screen | title =地霊達の起床 | roma =Chireitachi no kishou | titleEN =Awakening of the Earth Spirits | comment =　タイトル画面のテーマです。

　まあいつもの感じで。
　洞窟って音が響くとそれっぽいのでそれっぽくなるように
　努力しました。
　洞窟いいね。 | translation =This is the title theme.

Well, it's [[Theme of Eastern Story|the same feeling as always]].
One thing that's very cave-like about caves is the sounds that echo around in them, so I did my best to make it cave-like.
Caves are great. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 theme | title =暗闇の風穴 | roma =Kurayami no fuuketsu | titleEN =The Dark Blowhole | comment =　１面のテーマです。
　折角の洞窟って事で、１面にしてはちょっとお暗い感じにしました。

　可愛い感じに少し不気味さを乗せて……ってノリがいいと不気味に
　聞こえない罠。
　スピード感のあるホラーゲームもしてみたい。 | translation =This is the first stage theme.
Since it's in a cave, I made it darker than my usual stage 1 themes.

It's cute, with a little uneasiness to it... well, the good rhythm hides the uneasiness and makes a trap out of it.
I think I'd like to try a horror game with a sense of speed to it, too. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 boss - [[Yamame Kurodani]]'s theme | title =封じられた妖怪　～ {{lang|en|Lost Place}} | roma =Fuujirareta youkai | titleEN =The Sealed-Away Youkai ~ Lost Place | comment =　黒谷ヤマメのテーマです。

　１面にしては格好良く創ってみようと書きました。
　昔ながらのゲームミュージックらしさ溢れるシンプルな曲です。
　つくづく判りやすいメロディの方がゲームが盛り上がっていいなと
　思うのです。 | translation =This is Yamame Kurodani's theme.

I thought I'd try making it cool for a stage one song.
It's a very simple song with that particular game music feel to it.
I think it's best if a simple melody helps bring the game action to a climax. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 theme | title =渡る者の途絶えた橋 | roma =Wataru mono no todaeta hashi | titleEN =The Bridge People No Longer Cross | comment =　２面のテーマです。

　深く深く降りていく。
　自己主張は少なめに雰囲気重視でと、まさに道中オブ道中曲。
　妙に和風になってしまったのは意図した訳ではなく、なっちゃった
　だけともいう。関係無いけど洞窟いいね。 | translation =This is the second stage theme.

We're going down deeper and deeper.
It's not too bold and very ambient, so it's the traveling song of traveling songs.
Somehow it feels kind of Japanese, but that wasn't on purpose, hence the "somehow". By the way, this has nothing to do with anything, but caves are great. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 boss - [[Parsee Mizuhashi]]'s theme | title =緑眼のジェラシー | roma =Ryokugan no jerashī"Midorime" is admittable. | titleEN =Green-Eyed Jealousy | comment =　水橋パルスィのテーマです。

　心の病んだ妖怪です。
　そんな訳でメロディアスな曲にしたいと思ってこんな感じに。
　シューティングとは思えないような曲だけどシューティングに合う曲
　を考えていたらこんな感じに落ち着きました。 | translation =This is Parsee Mizuhashi's theme.

She's a youkai with a wounded heart.
So, I thought I'd like to make her a melodious song, and this is how it ended up.
You wouldn't think it's a song for a shooting game, but when I tried to think of something good for a shooting game it settled down into something like this. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 theme | title =旧地獄街道を行く | roma =Kyuujigoku kaidou o yuku | titleEN =Walking the Streets of a Former Hell | comment =　３面のテーマです。

　平和で喧嘩が華の江戸の町っぽいイメージで書きました。
　やっぱり楽しげで軽快なのは良いですよね。
　何とも懐かしい雰囲気のする曲です。
　街を歩くときも、この曲位うきうき気分で闊歩したいものです。 | translation =This is the third stage theme.

It has that peaceful brawl feeling of a certain Edo street.
It's best to be light and cheerful, after all, isn't it?
This song also has a very nostalgic feel to it.
I'd love to swagger down the city streets with as much excitement as this song has sometime. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 boss - [[Yuugi Hoshiguma]]'s theme | title =華のさかづき大江山 | roma =Hana no sakazuki ooeyama | titleEN =A Flower-Studded Sake Dish on Mt. Ooe | comment =　星熊 勇儀のテーマです。

　強そうで遊び心溢れる感じを目指しました。
　実は勇儀、お酒を一滴も零さずに闘うというルールを自分に課して
　います。やっぱり退屈なんですね。
　何か、人間より地獄の鬼の方が面白みがある気がします。 | translation =This is Yuugi Hoshiguma's theme.

I was aiming for a strong, very playful image.
In fact, Yuugi is teaching herself how to fight without spilling a drop of the sake from her cup. She must be bored.
Somehow I think the oni of hell have more fun than humans. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 theme | title =ハートフェルトファンシー | roma =Hātoferuto fanshī | titleEN =Heartfelt Fancy |also= {{NtoJ}} | comment =　４面のテーマです。

　余り和風に偏りすぎないように創りました。
　地霊殿は思いの外西洋風の造りなんですね。住んでいる人達も
　どこかしらファンシー。
　でも猫屋敷。猫に飼われたいですね。 | translation =This is the fourth stage theme.

I tried not to make it too one-sidedly Japanese.
The Palace of the Earth Spirits is surprisingly Western. The people who live there are probably fancy, too.
But, it's a cat house. I want to be tamed by the cat. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 boss - [[Satori Komeiji]]'s theme | title =少女さとり　～ {{lang|en|3rd eye}} | roma =Shoujo satori | titleEN =Satori Maiden ~ 3rd eye | comment =　古明地さとりのテーマです。

　地霊殿の主です。ちょっとファンシーで動物好き。
　実は今回の地霊殿の中では一番の大物、の筈ですが、戦闘は余り
　得意ではない様子。
　曲も大物っぽさと不気味さを出してみました。 | translation =This is Satori Komeiji's theme.

She's the master of the Palace of the Earth Spirits. She's a little fancy and loves animals.
Actually, she should be the highest ranked enemy in Subterranean Animism, but it looks like fighting isn't her specialty.
I tried to make the song dramatic and otherworldly, too. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 theme | title =廃獄ララバイ | roma =Haigoku rarabai | titleEN =Lullaby of Deserted Hell | comment =　５面のテーマです。

　灼熱地獄も罪人が落とされなくなってから、鬼が訪れる事も無く
　怨霊と動物達の遊び場と化している様子。
　実は人の住まなくなった建物とか見るとゾクゾクします。
　旧地獄も廃墟特有の切なさに包まれて……と想像して創った曲です。 | translation =This is the fifth stage theme.

Since people stopped being condemned to the hellfires, the oni don't visit anymore either, so this place has become the playground to spirits and animals.
Actually, I'm thrilled whenever I see something like a building people have abandoned.
The grounds of former hell must be enveloped in the sort of loneliness that surrounds ruins... is what I thought of as I made this. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 boss - [[Rin Kaenbyou]]'s theme | title =死体旅行　～ {{lang|en|Be of good cheer!}} | roma =Shitai ryokou | titleEN =Corpse Voyage ~ Be of good cheer! | comment =　お燐のテーマです。

　元気さが不気味な猫のテーマです。
　４、５面と重い感じにしてきたので、一気に明るくしてみました。
　お燐が押している車は猫車です。何を運んでいるかって？
　聞かない方が良かったと思う筈ですよ。 | translation =This is Orin's theme.

This is the theme for a cheery, yet bizarre cat.
Since stages 4 and 5 were pretty heavy, I tried to clear it up in a flash.
The cart Orin is pushing is a wheelbarrow. What's it carrying, you say?
Best not to ask such questions, I think. | note = A literal translation for "wheelbarrow" would be "cat cart". }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 theme | title =業火マントル | roma =Gouka mantoru | titleEN =Hellfire Mantle | comment =　最終面のテーマです。

　いかにも終盤って感じを出してみました。
　溶岩の中を進むのはシューティングゲームでは定番ですね。
　何が言いたいかというと、巫女さんが溶岩の上を飛んでも特に
　不思議ではない、という事です。カラスもね。 | translation =This is the last stage's theme.

I tried to make it feel like an end-of-game song.
Flying through lava is standard fare for shooting games.
I guess if there's anything in particular I'm trying to say, it's that it's not unusual for shrine maidens to fly above lava like this. Crows, too. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 boss - [[Utsuho Reiuji]]'s theme | title =霊知の太陽信仰　～ {{lang|en|Nuclear Fusion}} | roma =Reichi no taiyou shinkou | titleEN =Solar Sect of Mystic Wisdom ~ Nuclear Fusion | comment =　霊烏路 空のテーマです。

　出来る限り軽く近代的で、単純にボスっぽい感じで攻めてみました。
　事実、ラスボスとしては相当軽い妖怪です。しょせん鳥だしね。
　ただ力は滅茶苦茶強いのです。強い力でも馬鹿に持たせれば悪用す
　らできないって事がよく判ります。ああ夢のエネルギーなのに。 | translation =This is Utsuho Reiuji's theme.

I tried to make it as modern, light, and simply boss-like as I could.
In fact, she's not that great a youkai, for a last boss. She was originally just a bird.
She's just really, really powerful. I understand very well that even a fool that possesses great power can't cause too much harm. Ah, even if it's the power of dreams. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra stage theme | title =ラストリモート | roma =Rasuto rimōto | titleEN =Last Remote | comment =　エキストラステージのテーマです。

　何故か急いでいる感じになっていますが、そこまで緊急な出来事が
　あった訳でもなくみんなは暢気です。
　特に守矢神社の奴らの暢気っぷりといったら、霊夢でも敵いそうに
　ありません。曲名は某ＳＴＧと関係ありません。 | translation =This is the extra stage theme.

It feels like it's rushing you along for some reason, but there's no real reason to hurry, and everyone's acting carefree.
Even Reimu can't compete with the Moriya Shrine crowd in terms of not having a care in the world. The song title has no relation to a certain shooting gameLast Resort, a 1992 STG by SNK. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra stage boss - [[Koishi Komeiji]]'s theme | title =ハルトマンの妖怪少女 | roma =Harutoman no youkai shoujo | titleEN =Hartmann's Youkai Girl |also= {{TGA}} | comment =　古明地こいしのテーマです。

　不気味で壊れた少女っぽさを出そうとしてみました。
　不気味さがおまけのボスっぽさを出しているかと思います。
　本当は薔薇を敷き詰めた庭とかで、茨が痛そうな場所で戦うのが
　似合う筈ですが、今回は何故か神社。 | translation =This is Koishi Komeiji's theme.

I tried to make it eerie and have the aura of a broken girl.
I think the eeriness is fitting for an extra boss.
Actually, I think a garden with roses strewn all about where thorns can prick you is really fitting for a battle, but for some reason it's the shrine this time. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending theme | title =地霊達の帰宅 | roma =Chireitachi no kitaku | titleEN =The Earth Spirits' Homecoming | comment =　エンディングのテーマです。

　朝まで呑んで寂しく帰る時のイメージで創りました。
　「祭りも終わりかのう」「ぼちぼち引き上げるか」と心の中で
　会話しながら怨霊達が土の下へ戻っていきます。
　なんというオヤジ怨霊。 | translation =This is the ending theme.

The theme here is staying up all night drinking and then making your lonely way home.
The vengeful spirits head back into the depths of the earth, saying to themselves, "Aw, the festival's over", and "I guess we'd better be getting back now".
Those vengeful spirits are such old fogeys. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff roll theme | title =エネルギー黎明　～ {{lang|en|Future Dream...}} | roma =Enerugī reimei | titleEN =Energy Daybreak ~ Future Dream... | comment =　スタッフロールのテーマです。

　いつもの感じで作りました。まんまいつもの感じ。
　これでお仕舞いですよーって感じ。
　お仕舞いでも曲名は黎明。たみあき、じゃ無いですよ。 | translation =This is the staff roll theme.

I made it the same as always. Well, for the most part.
It has that "This is the end~" feeling.
It's the ending, but the song title is Daybreak. It's not Tamiaki. }} == Also See == * [[List_by_Song/Subterranean Animism|Subterranean Animism arrangements listed by song]] {{Project Translations Notice}} {{Navbox SA}} [[ru:Subterranean Animism/Музыка]] [[zh:东方地灵殿/音乐]] [[Category:Subterranean Animism]] [[Category:Music by Game]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title theme | title =逆天の天岩戸の礎石 | roma =Gyakuten no Ama-no-iwato no soseki | titleEN =Cornerstone of the [https://buddyfight.fandom.com/wiki/Overturn Overturned] [[wikipedia:Amano-Iwato|Ama-no-Iwato]] | composer = | comment =タイトル画面のテーマです。
こういうのはいつもの感じにするのがセオリーですが、
どうやら今回の"いつもの感じ"は裏に隠れているみたい。
まぁ、別に問題ないでしょうねぇ？
大騒ぎすれば誘い出せるし。 | translation =The title screen theme.
I know that the typical goal with these things is to go with the standard,
but the usual seems to be hiding out in the back this time.
I guess that isn't too much of a problem, though, aye?
We can coax it out with a big ruckus, anyway. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 theme | title =幅優先世界樹探検 | roma =Habayuusen seikaiju tanken | titleEN =Breadth-First Yggdrasil Expedition | composer = | comment =１面のテーマです。
壁にダーツを100本投げれば少なくとも1本が突き刺さるだろう。大抵は。
大抵の人の高校生活はそんな感じだったと思います。
まぁ、先生がちゃんと仕事をしてダーツさえ与えてくれた場合は。
私ならダーツを妖精に投げた方はやり甲斐があると思います。
あと曲の方といえば、しっかりとしたピアノのメロディと構造がありますが．．．．． それがダーツなのかな？ | translation =The first stage theme.
If you throw a hundred darts at a wall, at least one of them is going to stick, usually.
That's the way high school went for most of us, I think - well, assuming
your teachers were good enough at their jobs to even give you the darts, that is.
Personally, I'd rather throw darts at fairies. I think that's more rewarding.
Also, the song has a nice and strong piano melody and structure. I guess that's the dart? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Boss - [[Terminus of Unreal Darkside/Characters#Irisu Kiryuu|Irisu Kiryuu]]'s theme | title =描線上の画竜点睛　～ Irisu Magicka | roma =Byousen-jou no garyou tensei | titleEN =[https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Dragon_Ascent_(move) Dragon's Ascent]The term {{nihongo|"dragon's ascent"|画竜点睛| lit. "painting a dragon and dotting its eyes"}} is an idiom meaning "to add the finishing touches onto something". It originates from a legend where the Chinese painter Zhang Sengyou completes the dragon murals on a temple wall by dotting their eyes. The dragons would then spring to life, flying off of the temple wall and ascending to Heaven. Above the Graphed Line　～ Irisu Magicka | composer = | comment =桐生 イリスのテーマです。
駆け出し魔法使いのための曲です。 本人は多分異変と関係ない。
耳がよければ、彼女がキミをどう思うか聞こえるかもしれません。
やはり一番頭がいい天才は先輩のモノを自分のモノにしますからね。 | translation =Irisu Kiryuu's theme.
A song for a fledgeling magician. She's probably not too important.
If you're clever, you might hear exactly what she thinks of you to the tune of the music.
What is their seniors', the brightest geniuses make their own after all. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 theme | title =日常生活が無意味となった人里 | roma =Nichijou seikatsu ga muimi to natta hitozato | titleEN =The Village Where Day to Day Has Become Meaningless | composer = | comment =２面のテーマです。
妖怪から見れば昼がいつもより少し明るい夜になったが、
人間から見れば単に冬が季節の列に割り込んだみたいなものです。
ベイクドポテトが食べたくなる頃ですが、
今年はポテトメーカーが壊れているようですね。 まぁねぇ。 | translation =The second stage theme.
For the youkai, day turned into slightly brighter night,
but for the humans, it just seems like winter decided to cut in line.
It'd be time to snack on some baked potatoes,
but the baked potato machine seems to be broken this year. Oh, well. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Boss - [[Terminus of Unreal Darkside/Characters#Noah Amenohara|Noah Amenohara]]'s theme | title =糖源郷の事実上の女王　～ Sweets & Buster! | roma =Tougenkyou no jijitsujou no jo'ou | titleEN =De Facto Queen of Sugari-la　～ Sweets & Buster! | composer = | comment =飴之原 望星のテーマです。
{{Ruby|飴浮橋|あめのうきはし}}では雀荘とメイドカフェを足して２で割ったような
大人のための遊び場もあるらしい。
どんなに冷たい心でもきっと温めちゃうでしょう！ | translation =Noah Amenohara's theme.
At the {{Ruby|Ame-no-Ukihashi|Floating Bridge of Candy}}, there's apparently a play area for the adults
that's half Mahjong parlor, half maid café.
It's sure to soften up even the most hardened of stone hearts! }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 theme | title =雪景球で捉えられし御伽噺 | roma =Sekkeikyuu de toraerareshi otogibanashi | titleEN =A Fairytale Caught in a Snowglobe | composer =Requiem † Dual (Jonathan Lundeen & ♪♪♪♪♪) | comment =３面のテーマです。
私次第だったら、雪が降った日は絶対に家を出ないだろう。
窓から見る方がよっぽど好きですが、犬には遊びが大事なんだからねー。
あいにくペットの飼い主にとって、どんな季節でも毎日が{{Ruby|真夏地獄|dog's day}}ですね。 | translation =The third stage theme.
If I had my way, I'd never go outside in the snow.
Much prettier to look at, but dogs need to be dogs, and such.
Unfortunately, every day is a dog's day for a pet owner, regardless of season. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss theme - [[Terminus of Unreal Darkside/Characters#Valentine|Valentine]]'s theme | title =神懸かってる{{Ruby|黄金の脚光|ディーヴァズ・ピナクル}}、此処に登場 | roma =Kami kakatteru dīvazu pinakuru, koko ni toujou | titleEN =The Deity's {{Ruby|Golden Spotlight|Diva's Pinnacle}} Enters Here | comment =よく聴くがよい！　ヴァレンタインのテーマです。
無常、それはあらゆる物が逃れられない呪縛なり。
この私がいつまでもこの大宇宙を彷徨う{{Ruby|運命|サダメ}}の大勢のただ一人。
沢山の進む道が交差し、連続体に絡み合います。
その連続体にはたった一人の物語が溶け込み、区別が付かぬ一粒の塵へとなるのです。 | translation =Hark, for Valentine's theme takes center stage!
Impermanence is a curse from which no being is exempt.
Yours truly is but one of the myriads fated to saunter through the starry skies indefinitely.
The intersection and interweaving of many individual paths creates a continuum into which
the story of an individual melts away and becomes but a indistinguishable speck of dust. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss theme Variation A - [[Terminus of Unreal Darkside/Characters#Valentine|Alexandria Valentina von Münchhausen]]'s theme | title =神懸かってる{{Ruby|白夜の騎士|シュヴァリエ・ダルジャン}}、此処に降臨 | roma =Kami kakatteru shuvarie darujan, koko ni kourin | titleEN =The Deity's {{Ruby|White Knight of the Midnight Sun|Chevalier d'Argent}} Descends Here | comment =アレクサンドリア・ファレンティーナ・フォン・ミュンヒハウゼンのテーマです。
確かに東方はそれなりに異世界ですが、異世界の種類が全然違いますよ。
多分幻想郷では剣で戦う世界線もあるでしょうけど、これはそうなんじゃない。
もしかしてその幻想郷にはこれより多くの転生者もいるのでは？
（それでも転生すれば行きたいのは魔法利きの幻想郷だけど） | translation =Alexandria Valentina von Münchhausen's theme.
While Touhou IS technically isekai, but it's not the right kind of isekai.
There's probably a worldline where people in Gensokyo fight with swords, but this isn't it.
Perhaps, that Gensokyo might be more saturated with reincarnators?
(I'd still rather reincarnate in the magic-using Gensokyo, though) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss theme Variation B - [[Terminus of Unreal Darkside/Characters#Valentine|Blood-Stained Tyrant Valentine]]'s theme | title =神懸かってる{{Ruby|玄想の火焔|ディクタトル・ステラルム・ダムナンダルム}}、此処に召喚 | roma =Kami kakatteru dikutatoru suterarumu damunandarumu, koko ni shoukan | titleEN =The Deity's {{Ruby|Illusionary Black Flame|Dictator Stellarum Damnandarum}} is Summoned Here | comment ={{Ruby|血染狂覇|ヴァレンタイン}}のテーマです。
この子は自分が素直だと思いますが、素直ではいられないように見えます。
だって、言葉にされる際、頭の中のことがなんか歪んでしまいますから。
実はロビンさんも私もそうですのでヴァレンタインちゃんのことがよくわかります。
まあ、{{Ruby|それでコミュニケーションがなんか取りにくくなりますが、なんとかなってきたし別にどうでもいいかなーと|もし私達二人の考え方がもっと普通だったら、このゲームそのものすら想像できなくなるかもしれないので、この「欠点」とかいうのをむしろありがたく思いますよ}}。 | translation =Blood-Stained Tyrant Valentine's theme.
She may strike you as someone who can't be honest, even though she thinks she's being straightforward.
After all, what she's thinking gets somewhat distorted when being translated into speech.
That's just how it happens to be with Robin and myself too, so I totally understand her.
Well, {{Ruby|it does make communication between us a little more difficult, but we've managed to get by, so...|this entire game wouldn't have been conceived if we were a little more normal, so I'm actually thankful for what others would consider to be our "flaws".}} }} {{clear}} ==Notes== {{Navbox ToUD}} [[Category:Music by Game]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title Screen | title =星の夢見　～ Eastern Celesphere | roma =Hoshi no yumemi | titleEN =Dreaming of Stars ~ Eastern Celesphere | composer =Wanwan | comment =タイトル画面のテーマです。 とりあえず夜空で星がキラキラしてるイメージを出してみました。
昔から星座がどうのこうのという話を間きますが
実際に私が判別出来る星座はオリオン座しかありません、困った。 | translation =This is the title screen theme. For the time being, I tried to give it an feeling of stars shining in the night sky.
I've been talking about the constellations since long ago,
but the only one I can actually identify is Orion. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Theme | title =厄星の揺籠 | roma =Yakuhoshi no yurikago | titleEN =Cradle of Misfortunate Stars | composer =Wanwan | comment =１面のテーマです。 始まりを意識しつつもデンジャラスな背景ということで結構苦戦しました。
割と明るい曲になってしまったのでなんとか誤魔化そうと
裏に半鐘をイメージした音を入れてみましたが誤魔化せてないです。 | translation =This is stage 1 theme. Although I was conscious of what to compose for the beginning, I struggled quite a bit with the "danger" vibe.
I tried to add the bells in there too, but it sounds sort of deceiving because
the song itself turned out rather bright-sounding. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Boss - [[The Last Comer/Characters#Marry Shepherd|Marry Shepherd]]'s Theme | title =妖星に踊る羊精 | roma =Yousei ni odoru yousei | titleEN =Sheep Spirits Dancing Under Strange Stars | composer =Wanwan | comment =メリーシェパードのテーマです。 背景に似合わず結構明るくハツラツとした娘ですね。
そんな使女に合わせて軽いノリで作ってみました。
今思えば「メ〇ーさんのひつじ」を混ぜてみても面白かったかもしれない。 | translation =Marry Shepherd's theme. She's a lively and cheerful girl, despite her background.
I made the song in a light-hearted way that was suitable for a maidservant like her.
Now that I think about it, I think it would've been fun to include some parts of "M--y Had a Little Lamb". | note = *''妖星 (strange stars), 羊精 (sheep spirits) and 妖精 (fairies) can all be pronounced 'yousei' }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Theme | title =色褪せぬ紅の記憶 | roma =Iroasenu kurenai no kioku | titleEN =Memories of an Unfading Crimson | composer =Wanwan | comment =２面のテーマです。 最初に方向性は紅魔郷の曲風をイメージしようと思いました。
色褪せぬという意味を込めることも乗ね、同じ2面ということで
「ルーネイトエルフ」のモチーフをパk・・・・引用させて頂いてます。 | translation =This is stage 2 theme. At first, I wanted to imagine the style of [[Embodiment of Scarlet Devil|Koumakyou]].
In addition to the meaning of "unfading",
I have quoted the motif of "[[Lunate Elf]]" there too. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Boss - [[The Last Comer/Characters#Corin Charite|Corin Charite]]'s Theme | title =フィリニオンの復活 | roma =Firinion no fukkatsu | titleEN =Philinnion's Resurrection | composer =Wanwan | comment =コリン・シャーリットのテーマです。 前曲と同様に紅魔郷のイメージを少し込めてみました。
虚弱体質の彼女の割に大分強そうな印家の曲になっています。
どうでもいい話ですが私はコリンが一番のお気に入りです。 | translation =This is Corin Charite's theme. As with the previous song, I tried to convey an image of Koumakyou.
It is a song of a vampire girl who seems to be very strong for her weak constitution.
No matter what they say, I love Corin. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Theme | title =賢人のプラネタリズム | roma =Kenjin no puranetarizumu | titleEN =The Wise Men's Planetarium | composer =Wanwan | comment =3面のテーマです。 今回の作品の中で真っ先にイメージできた楽曲でした。
タイトル画面のテーマと方向的には近いものかと思します。
星々が瞬く使空を風を感じながら涙走してる雰囲気が味わえれば。 | translation =This is stage 3 theme. It was the first song I came up with for this game.
I think it is close to the title screen theme.
It really captures the atmosphere of your tears running while feeling the wind in the sky where the stars glimmer. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss - [[The Last Comer/Characters#Phiased Pescar|Phiased Pescar]]'s Theme | title =エンシェントスターゲイザー | roma =Enshento sutāgeizā | titleEN =Ancient Stargazer | composer =Wanwan | comment =ピアシテ・パスカルのテーマです。
沢山の星々が突如攻撃的になったような曲です。
昔、何かの行事で夜中に山を登って夜空を見たことがあります。
普段では考えられないような綺麗な星空を最近やっと思い出しました。 | translation = This is Phiased Pescar's theme. This song is like if lots of stars suddenly became agressive.
Long ago, I went up a mountain in the middle of the night to look at the night sky for an event of some sort.
This made me finally remember how beautiful the starry sky is, which is something I wouldn't normally think of. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 Theme | title =邪星の宴　～ Celestial Burst | roma =Jasei no utage | titleEN =Feast of Wicked Stars ~ Celestial Burst | composer =Wanwan | comment =４面のテーマです。 こちらは夜桜と火の粉がテーマになっています。
宴と聞くと私の印家は花見なんですが、一度もしたことがありません。
火の粉が散ってくる場所での花見は危険ですのでやめましょう。 | translation =The stage 4 theme. The theme this time was of nighttime cherry blossoms and fireworks.
Whenever I hear the word "feast", I think of cherry blossom viewing, but I've never done it before.
It's dangerous to view cherry blossoms in a place where sparks are scattering, so don't do that. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 Boss - [[The Last Comer/Characters#Mumumu Mikaboshi|Mumumu Mikaboshi]]'s Theme | title =明朝を覆う明星 | roma =Myouchou o oou myoujou | titleEN =The Morning Star that Hides Tomorrow's Morning | composer =Wanwan | comment =甕星無々夢のテーマです。 力を振りかざすかと思いきや割と冷静で知性的な魔王様ですね。
そんな彼女のように力強いがどこか適当なこの曲。
謀略系の魔王と聞くと最近読んでるラノベが浮かんできます。 | translation =Mumumu Mikaboshi's theme. A calm and intelligent demon king who thinks she'll get to brandish her sword.
This song is powerful, yet tenuous, just like she is.
When I hear the name "Divisional Demon King", I think of a novel I've been reading lately. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 Theme | title =印のある者は山へ | roma =Shirushi no aru mono wa yama e | titleEN =Those With the Seals, Go to the Mountain | composer =Wanwan | comment =５面のテーマです。 砦が急ピッチで建造されたりとかなり物騒な雰囲気がします。
最終面をイメージさせるかのような疾走感と焦燥感があります。
私は多分ここまで辿りつけないだろうと思ってたりします。 | translation =The stage 5 theme. The atmosphere is quite rowdy, with forts being built at quick speeds.
There is a sense of speed and urgency that makes you think of a final stage.
I sometimes feel like I won't be able to get to this point. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 Boss - [[The Last Comer/Characters#Michel Sant'Angelo|Michel Sant'Angelo]]'s Theme | title =燦々サン・ミシェル | roma =Sansan san misheru | titleEN =Brilliant Saint Michael | composer =Wanwan | comment =ミシェル・サンタンジェのテーマです。 天使である彼女を敬して教会旋法を取り入れてみました。
不慣れなもので良さがちゃんと出し切れてるか微妙な所です。
彼女のうっかりさんと相まって面白い曲かもしれません。 | translation =Michel Sant'Angelo's theme. To honor her image as an angel, I borrowed some church modes.
I'm not used to these sort of things, so I'm not sure if I'm getting the most out of them.
When combined with her carelessness, I feel like it could make for an amusing song. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Theme | title =幻想ヴィア・ドロローサ | roma =Gensou via dororōsa | titleEN =Illusionary Via Dolorosa | composer =Wanwan | comment =６面のテーマです。 荘厳に落ち着かせようと思ったら意外とノリノリでした。
ところで朝焼けといえばよく見るのは初日の出ですね。
他の朝焼けを見ないだけです、もっと早く起きましょう。 | translation =The stage 6 theme. I tried to make something calm, but it ended up surprisingly lively.
Also, speaking of morning glows, I often get to see the first sunrise of the year. I just simply don't see any other sunrises; Let's try getting up earlier, shall we? | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Boss - [[The Last Comer/Characters#Iesua Nazarenus|Iesua Nazarenus]]'s Theme | title =人類救済計画　～ The Greatest Salvation | roma =Jinrui kyuusai keikaku | titleEN =Mankind Salvation Plan ~ The Greatest Salvation | composer =Wanwan | comment =イシュア・ナザレヌスのテーマです。 タイトル画面じモチーフのイントロです、正確には逆ですが。
神というのを楽器的に表そうとオルガンやトロンボーンを使ってます。
あ、トロンボーンって神の楽器って言うらしいてすよ、初めて知りました。 | translation =This is Iesua Nazarenus's theme. This is an intro of the title screen motif, but to be exact, it's quite the opposite.
I used organs and trombones to represent God as an instrument.
Oh, trombone '''is''' God's instrument. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage Theme | title =ご近所がロストワールド | roma =Go kinjo ga rosuto wārudo | titleEN =Neighborhood Lost World | composer =Wanwan | comment =エクストラステージのテーマです。
本編とは打って変わり近所をふらふら散歩する感じの曲にしました。
若干の雲行きの怪しさを込めてみましたが如何でしょうか。
因みに実家は高速があるものの田舎ですので近所は田んぼだらけです。 | translation =The extra stage theme. As a departure from the main story, I decided to base a song around strolling through a neighborhood.
I tried to put a bit of suspicion into it as well. What do you think?
By the way, my parents' house is in a rural area, so although there is an expressway, my neighborhood has lots of rice paddies. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage Boss - [[The Last Comer/Characters#Elfin Mint|Elfin Mint]]'s Theme | title =神話世界の生き証人　～ The Lost Comer | roma =Shinwa sekai no iki shounin | titleEN =Living Witness of the World of Mythology ~ The Lost Comer | composer =Wanwan | comment =エルフィンミントのテーマです。 妖精の軽いノリと彼女のシリアスさを混ぜ込んだような曲です。
ミントといえばミントティーとかをよく飲む人いますよね。
私も嫌いではないですけどあれどうあがいても歯磨き粉ですよね。 | translation =This is Elfin Mint's theme. It's a song that combines her light, fairy-like vibe and seriousness.
Speaking of mint, there are people who often drink mint tea.
I don't hate it, but to me it just tastes like toothpaste. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending Theme | title =異教の神々 | roma =Ikyou no kamigami | titleEN =Heretical Gods | composer =Wanwan | comment =エンディングのテーマです。 異教、主にキリストを意識したんですが少し荘厳すぎたかもしれません。
オルガンだけで精成させるのも考えてたんですが
どうにもしっくり来なかったので色々加えてたらこんなことに。 | translation =This is the ending theme.
I made this with a sense of Paganism, mainly Christianity, but I feel like I made it a bit too solemn.
I was thinking of just using an organ here, but it didn't feel right, so I added a few things and here we are. | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll | title =明朝を照らす明星 | roma =Myouchou o terasu myoujou | titleEN =The Morning Star that Illuminates Tomorrow's Morning | composer =Wanwan | comment =スタッフロールのテーマです。 覆ったかと思ったら今度は照らしてくれましたね。
作ってる時に随分と懐かしさとかそんなものを感じてました。
初めて作ったと思うんですが実はどっかで聴いたことでもあるんでしょうかね。 | translation =The staff roll theme. I thought it'd been hidden, but now it's being illuminated.
I felt a lot of nostalgia and such while making this song.
I think this might be the first time making this song, though I can't help but feel like I've actually
heard it before... | note = }} {{Navbox TLC}} [[category:The Last Comer]] [[Category:Music by Game]] [[ru:The Last Comer/Музыка]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title Screen theme | title = | titleEN =Gale of the Storm ~ Thunder Roars | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Title Screen Theme

I made this song in hopes to capture the mystery of the new incident!
Our heroines notice something is off, but what can it be?
I had a lot of fun making this song. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 theme | title = | titleEN =Fairy Swarm ~ Endless Parade | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 1 Theme

I really love that bells sound in the beginning.
Makes it feel like Reimu is leaving the shrine to start a new adventure.
I wanted the song to sound like an introduction to the game but also hold a little bit of wild part in the background representing the fairies. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Boss - [[The Shattered Sky/Characters#Reisen Udongein Inaba|Reisen Udongein Inaba]]'s theme | title = | titleEN =Lunatic Rabbit ~ Red Alert | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 1 Boss Theme

This song was a bit challenging.
Since Reisen is a strong character I wanted to keep that intensity.
But since she was not trying to harm the heroine, it needed to sound somewhat carefree and friendly. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 theme | title = | titleEN =Flight over the Forest ~ Condensed Wilderness | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 2 Theme

The bamboo forest is now teeming with enemies.
I wanted this song to feel frantic but at the same time the density of the bamboo forest.
The music changes when the midboss comes to introduce her character and strong demeanor. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Boss - [[The Shattered Sky/Characters#Sayuri Katsuki|Sayuri Katsuki]]'s theme | title = | titleEN =Fire Spirit of the Forest ~ First Ignition | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 2 Boss Theme

I wanted to introduce this character with a bang to introduce her fire abilities and hostility towards the heroine.
The song ended up sounding a bit Russian like for some reason, but I like it that way. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 theme | title = | titleEN =Peaceful Tribulation ~ Over the Garden | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 3 Theme

The Heroine takes a detour to a beautiful garden nearby Eientei.
I really liked the idea of just a peaceful melody to represent the stage itself...
Even if the heroine is being bombarded with danmaku. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss - [[The Shattered Sky/Characters#An Yaezaki|An Yaezaki]]'s theme | title = | titleEN =Sakura Radiance ~ Blooming Elegance | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 3 Boss Theme

I wanted to represent her character with elegance and power.
[[Mystical Power Plant/Characters#An Yaezaki|After all she was a stage 5 boss]].
It was a lot of fun making this track overall and is quite catchy to me. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 theme | title = | titleEN =Melancholy of the Cloud-Painted Sky | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 4 Theme

In my head, triplets and swing drums are somewhat rainy sounding.
Which is why there are a lot of those in this song.
Maybe I am wrong about that but I think this song is pretty. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 Boss - [[The Shattered Sky/Characters#Akami Kurotsuka|Akami Kurotsuka]]'s theme | title = | titleEN =Arcing Fault ~ Reaching the Flash Boundary | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 4 Boss Theme

When making this song I wanted to make it have a bit more of a kick into it than the other songs.
I like how it turned out.
I am an power system engineer, so naming this song was fun too haha. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 theme | title = | titleEN =Where the Stars Fall | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 5 Theme

Our heroine is flying in space!
This song was made to display the hectic part of the game.
I had a bit of inspiration from listening to the [[IN]] ost.
I really like this one turned out. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 Boss - [[The Shattered Sky/Characters#Ryouko|Ryouko]]'s theme | title = | titleEN =Jewel of the Flashing Scales | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 5 Boss Theme

This song started off powerful but towards the middle became more emotional.
I was trying to create a sort of noble sounding theme, but I think emotional sounds just as well too. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 theme | title = | titleEN =Cyclone of the Space Sky | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 6 Theme

Our heroines are making the final push through to the boss! I created this song with a sense of urgency.
I also introduced the boss's theme to this as sort of an introduction to the fight that is to come. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Boss - [[The Shattered Sky/Characters#Soujouko|Soujouko]]'s first theme | title = | titleEN =Tengu's Cyclone of the Sky | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 6 Boss Theme 1

This song gives the player a bit of an introduction to the boss fight.
Made this as sort of an introductory song to the boss fight that is to come. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Boss - [[The Shattered Sky/Characters#Soujouko|Soujouko]]'s second theme | title = | titleEN =Power of the Shattering Sky | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 6 Boss Theme 2

I suppose this is the "true" boss theme of stage 6 as this is also the "true" fight as well.
I really like the sound and melody of this theme. }} {{MusicRoom | category =(URA) Stage 6 Boss - [[The Shattered Sky/Characters#Soujouko|Soujouko]]'s Last Spell theme | title = | titleEN =Pieces of the Sky | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Stage 6 Boss Last Spell Theme

This can be treated almost like the last word theme of our final boss.
For this one, I thought it would be appropriate to mix the two themes into one grand finale theme. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending theme | title = | titleEN =Tranquility of the Storm's Eye | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Ending Theme

The after ward is always a calm theme, so i feel this fits quite nicely.
Our heroines have solved the incident and indeed need a bit of a break too! }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll theme | title = | titleEN =Last Tears of the Cloud-Painted Sky | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Staff Roll Theme

The end credits theme needed to provide a softer and quieter feel to it.
I created this song to give such a calm, rainy day feel.
Such as if you were to look outside on a rainy day. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage theme | title = | titleEN =Down the Familiar Path of Dusk | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Extra Stage Theme

Our heroines are back to explore the extra stage!
This stage is somewhat calm but with a bit of aggression to signify the boss battle to come. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage Boss - [[The Shattered Sky/Characters#Tsukiko Seida|Tsukiko Seida]]'s theme | title = | titleEN =Lingering Light ~ Magician's Conviction | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Extra Stage Boss Theme

This song was a lot of fun to make.
It took a long time as well since I ended up starting over again.
I like the first fourth part the most because of the funky chord progression. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Phantasm Stage theme | title = | titleEN =Along the Path of Darkness | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Phantasm Stage Theme

Like ZUN's phantasm stage in [[PCB]], the stage is very similar to the extra stage but on steroids.
So is the music!
More hectic sounding and with more intensity/urgency. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Phantasm Stage Boss - [[The Shattered Sky/Characters#Mima|Mima]]'s theme | title = | titleEN =Void of Light ~ Magician's Requiem | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Phantasm Stage Boss Theme

Mima's theme!
I have to say, making this theme was nerve-wracking since she already has such a nice theme.
Adding my own taste to her existing theme was a lot of fun and took a lot of thought to do so. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Heaven Stage theme | title = | titleEN =From Earth to Heaven | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Heaven Stage Theme

The final stage theme.
In this our heroines are traversing to more of a celestial plane.
Having background choirs to the song helped bring that feeling.
I feel like this song sounds a bit... sunny, I suppose. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Heaven Stage Boss - [[The Shattered Sky/Characters#Suzuka Mikami|Suzuka Mikami]]'s theme | title = | titleEN =Tenacity of the Youthful Divinity | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Heaven Stage Boss Theme

I think I had the most fun making this song out of all the other ones.
I tried to capture the strength, playfulness, and emotion all in one.
In the end, I think it is a nice boss theme to end the game. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Heaven Staff Roll theme | title = | titleEN =Innocent Treasures (SR Ver.) | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Heaven Stage Staff Roll Theme

A rendition of ZUN's theme but a bit slower/more timid.
I like how this one turned out since I always felt his theme was very emotional. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Alt. Heaven Staff Roll theme | title = | titleEN =Innocent Treasures (Abner's Piano Ver.) | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Heaven Stage Staff Roll Theme (Piano Ver.)

A rendition of ZUN's theme but a bit slower/more timid.
I like how this one turned out since I always felt his theme was very emotional. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Last Word theme | title = | titleEN =Maidens' Danmaku Festival | composer =Abner | comment =. | translation =Last Word Theme

For some reason, whenever I think of last word spells I think of the phrase "danmaku festival" or "barrage of danmaku" or something like that.
Overall, I like this theme.
I find it quite catchy.
Has a sort of "Do your best to dodge as much as you can!" feel to it. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Score theme | title = | titleEN =Player's Score | composer =Abner | comment = | translation = }} {{clear}} {{Navbox TSS}} [[Category:Music by Game]]

The game includes three [[wikipedia:MIDI|MIDI]] tracks composed by [[ZUN]] for the Roland SC-88Pro. High quality recordings of these MIDI files made with this module can be found [https://www.shrinemaiden.org/forum/index.php/topic,18989.0.html here]. ==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Stage theme | titleEN =Witch of Love Potion |also ={{DiPP}} | source1 =trt_00.TXT from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/music_old.html 東方幻想的音楽] | comment1 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。
トルテルマジックより【 Witch of Love Potion 】です。
今回、トルテが主人公のＳＴＧの曲を書く事になりました。すごく嬉しかったんですが、 いままで、短調系の暗～い曲ばっかりの私だったので、かなりの不安が...(^^;
で、どうしたもんか色々と研究してみました。 楽器をクラシカルなものからシンセ系に変えて、長調を増やしてみたり、コード進行を 色々実験してみました。（って、実験台(^^;;）
結果、でも明るくない。 これって、やっぱメロディのせい？（そのとおり） 趣味で作曲して、はや８年ほど。こればっかしは、今更変えられないなぁ～(^^;;
まぁ、結構派手に創ったつもりで、なかなかお気に入り(^^)
ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか ＺＵＮ | translation1 =Thank you for downloading this song.
This is "Witch of Love Potion" from Torte Le Magic.
This time, I was going to write a song of STG with Torte as a hero. Although I was very happy, until now, because I only wrote songs of dark, minor tone, I was under considerable anxiety ... (^^;
So I tried to research variously on what to do. Changing from classical instruments to the synth instruments, or try increasing the major, and I tried to experiment with various chord progression. (guinea pig (^ ^;;)
But the result is still not bright. What is this, it must be because of the melody right? For having been composing songs for eight years as a hobby, it seems like such minuscule effort cannot change how I work (^ ^;
Well, I'm going to take pride that I have made it very fancily (^ ^)
Well then, let us meet again in the next song, shall we? ZUN }} {{MusicRoom | category =Boss - [[#Chou|Chou]]'s theme | titleEN =Magical and Hopeless | source1 =trt_01.TXT from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/music_old.html 東方幻想的音楽] | comment1 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。
トルテルマジックより【 Magical and Hopeless 】です。
88Pro 以外で聴くとギターがちゃちくなったりして、がっかりかもしんないので、 是非88Proでご拝聴願いたい。
これは、月＋魔法＋美形の男というキーワードからイメージして創られた曲です。 前半の不思議な感じのするメロディは、テクノにロック風味を加えてみました。
お気に入りは、最後のピアノアドリブ部分。 当然、ジャズのノリで弾きならしてみました。この辺がお洒落で美形の男です(^^;;
やっぱ、ジャズ好き。
ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか ＺＵＮ | translation1 =Thank you for downloading this song.
This is "Magical and Hopeless" from Torte Le Magic.
Guitar becomes rather pointless unless it is heard in 88Pro. I strongly recommend to hear it from 88Pro to get the best of it.
This is a song that was created in the image of the keyword good looking guy + magic + moon. Melody of the first half with a strange feeling, I flavored with techno rock.
My favorite is the last part of piano improvisation. Naturally, I tried playing with the jazz feel. Here is such a good looking guy with a style (^ ^;
Yup, I like jazz.
Well then, let us meet again in the next song, shall we? ZUN }} {{MusicRoom | category =True last boss - [[#Cointreau|Cointreau]]'s theme | titleEN =Sacred Battle | source1 =trt_02.TXT from [http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/html/music_old.html 東方幻想的音楽] | comment1 =このたびは、ダウンロードしていただきありがとうございます。
トルテルマジックより【 Sacred Battle 】です。
一面だけなんで、あんま重いテーマにすると滅茶苦茶浮くので、軽快で格好いいものを 目指しました。
さわやかさが皆無なのは、とりあえず置いていて(^^;; 曲名の通り、神聖でパワフルな曲になったような気もしてます。
短そうでループまで約２分半。最後まで聴くにはかなりの腕を要するってところも、 エキストラステージっぽい。 ループ前（2:10 ～ 2:40 あたり)のメロディを、かなりトリッキーに仕上げたで、 そこら辺で攻撃が激しくなると弾よけが気持ちいいかもしれない。
で、トルテ。最初の４～５巻までしか持ってないから、このキャラしらんのよー(^^;
ではまた次の曲で逢いましょうか ＺＵＮ | translation1 =Thank you for downloading this song.
This is "Sacred Battle" from Torte Le Magic.
Because it has only one stage, lest the heavy feel of a theme will ruin it, I was aiming for something light and cool.
Despite little freshness there is (^^;; I feel that the title of the song combined with holy feel made this a powerful piece.
About two and a half minutes to loop is very short, and takes a considerable amount of patience. It's like an extra stage as you listen through the end. It was quite tricky to finish, the melody (per 2:10 to 2:40) before the loop, it may be feel like the bullet attack becomes severe during that time frame.
As for Torte's storyline, because I have only the first 4-5 volume, I'm not familiar with this character (^ ^;
Well then, let us meet again in the next song, shall we? ZUN }}
== External links == *[https://www.shrinemaiden.org/forum/index.php/topic,18989.0.html ZUN's MIDI files played on a real SC-88Pro, including the Torte Le Magic soundtrack.]

{{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll | title =東方剛欲異聞 | roma =Touhou Gouyoku Ibun | titleEN =Eastern Strange Tale of Avarice | composer =ziki_7 | comment = | translation = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending | title =天理人欲<ref>Based on the motto of Chinese philosopher Zhu Xi, which is 存天理 滅人欲 (Preserve the laws of nature, reduce the desires of man)</ref> | roma =Tenri jinyoku | titleEN =Laws of Heaven, Desires of Man | composer =ziki_7 | comment = | translation = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Forest of Magic theme | title =魔法使いの憂鬱 | roma =Mahoutsukai no yuu'utsu | titleEN =Magician's Melancholy | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "Magician's Melancholy" from ''[[The Grimoire of Marisa (CD)|The Grimoire of Marisa]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =Rainbow Cavern of Earth Spirits theme | title =暗闇の風穴 | roma =Kurayami no fuuketsu | titleEN =The Dark Blowhole | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "The Dark Blowhole" from ''[[Subterranean Animism]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =Former Hell theme | title =旧地獄街道を行く | roma =Kyuujigoku kaidou o yuku | titleEN =Walking the Streets of a Former Hell | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "Walking the Streets of a Former Hell" from ''[[Subterranean Animism]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =Hell of Blazing Fires theme | title =業火マントル | roma =Gouka mantoru | titleEN =Hellfire Mantle | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "Hellfire Mantle" from ''[[Subterranean Animism]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =Underground Fusion Reactor theme | title =御柱の墓場 | roma =Onbashira no hakaba | titleEN =Cemetery of Onbashira | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "Cemetery of Onbashira ~ Grave of Being" from ''[[Mountain of Faith]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =Sea of Petroleum theme | title =大地の底、剛欲の海 | roma =Daichi no soko, gouyoku no umi | titleEN =Depths of the Earth, Ocean of Avarice | composer =ziki_7 | note = }} {{MusicRoom | category =Hell of Blazing Fires (Flooded) theme | title =不朽の曼珠沙華 | roma =Fukyuu no manjushage | titleEN =Everlasting Red Spider Lily | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "Everlasting Red Spider Lily" from ''[[Wily Beast and Weakest Creature]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =Scarlet Devil Mansion theme | title =魔法少女達の百年祭 | roma =Mahou shoujotachi no hyakunensai | titleEN =The Centennial Festival for Magical Girls | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "The Centennial Festival for Magical Girls" and "U.N. Owen Was Her?" from ''[[Embodiment of Scarlet Devil]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Reimu Hakurei]]'s theme | title =少女綺想曲 | roma =Shoujo kisoukyoku | titleEN =Maiden's Capriccio | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "Maiden's Capriccio ~ Dream Battle" from ''[[Imperishable Night]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Marisa Kirisame]]'s theme | title =恋色マスタースパーク | roma =Koiiro masutā supāku | titleEN =Love-Colored Master Spark | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "Love-Coloured Master Spark" from ''[[Imperishable Night]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Yamame Kurodani]]'s theme | title =封じられた妖怪 | roma =Fuujirareta youkai | titleEN =The Sealed-Away Youkai | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "The Sealed-Away Youkai ~ Lost Place" from ''[[Subterranean Animism]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Kogasa Tatara]]'s theme | title =万年置き傘にご注意を | roma =Mannen okigasa ni gochuui o | titleEN =Beware the Umbrella Left There Forever | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "Beware the Umbrella Left There Forever" from ''[[Undefined Fantastic Object]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Minamitsu Murasa]]'s theme | title =キャプテンムラサ | roma =Kyaputen Murasa | titleEN =Captain Murasa | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "Captain Murasa" from ''[[Undefined Fantastic Object]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Kanako Yasaka]]'s theme | title =神さびた古戦場 | roma =Kamisabita kosenjou | =[[Joon Yorigami]] and [[Shion Yorigami]]'s theme | title =今宵は飄逸なエゴイスト ～ Egoistic Flowers | roma =Koyoi wa hyouitsu na egoisuto | titleEN =Tonight Stars an Easygoing Egoist ~ Egoistic Flowers | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "Tonight Stars an Easygoing Egoist (Live ver.) ~ Egoistic Flowers." from ''[[Antinomy of Common Flowers]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Yuugi Hoshiguma]]'s Ooe | composer =ziki_7 | note =Arrangement of "A Flower-Studded Sake Dish on Mt. Owen Was Her?" from ''[[Embodiment of Scarlet Devil]]'' }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Yuuma Toutetsu]]'s first theme | title =強欲な獣のメメント | roma =Gouyoku na kemono no memento | titleEN =Memento of the Avaricious Beast | composer =ZUN }} {{MusicRoom | category =[[Yuuma Toutetsu]]'s second theme | title =有機体全てのメメント ～ Memory of Fossil Energy. | roma =Yuukitai subete no memento | titleEN =Memento of All Organisms ~ Memory of Fossil Energy. | composer =ZUN }}
