revision.text:
==Music List== {{MusicRoom |category =Title Screen |title =超古代の生き血 |roma =Chō kodai no ikichi |titleEN =Super-Ancient Lifeblood |composer =Pesot.jp/ |comment =タイトル画面のテーマです。
メロディーはいつものテーマの変奏です。
低音と反響で、宝天京の舞台である遺跡らしさを出しました。
２０１４年バージョンからは音源も制作環境も変え、この曲を含め　
全ての曲を最近らしい曲調にアレンジしています。 |translation=The title screen theme.
The main melody is a variant on [[Theme of Eastern Story|the usual Touhou theme]].
I used low tones and reverb to emphasize the feeling of the ancient ruins TCL takes place in.
I've got new hardware instruments and a new work environment since making the 2014 version,
so I've remixed all the songs in a more recent Touhou style, including this one. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 1 theme |title =天星の河渉り |roma =Tensei no kawa watari |titleEN =River Crossing of Heavenly Stars |composer =KUROHA, Pesot.jp/ |comment =１面のテーマです。
この曲は作曲は黒羽氏、編曲は私Pesot.jp/となります。
落ち着いた雰囲気はそのままに、煌びやかな編曲を目指しました。
天の河綺麗ですよね。
夏の夜空には冬のと違った独特の開放感があるような気がします。 |translation=The stage 1 theme.
This track was originally composed by KUROHA, and remixed by me, Pesot.jp/.
I kept the subdued atmosphere the same, and set out to arrange it with a more gorgeous feel.
The Milky Way certainly is pretty.
I feel like the night sky in summer has its own unique sense of spaciousness, different from winter. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 1 Boss - [[Treasure Castle Labyrinth/Characters#Tsumugi Enishi|Tsumugi Enishi]]'s theme |title =螺旋の縁　～ Red Marriage. |roma =Rasen no enishi |titleEN =Helical Bond ~ Red Marriage |composer =Pesot.jp/ |comment =江西　紬（えにし　つむぎ）のテーマです。
縁結びもできる弁財天の神様です。
人々の喜ぶことを進んでする性格に因んで明るい感じにしました。
どんどん上に転調していく元気溢れる曲調となっています。 |translation=Tsumugi Enishi's theme.
She's the goddess Benzaiten, and she can tie bonds together to boot.
I gave it a bright feeling, in keeping with how she goes out of her way to make others happy.
It's got a melody that's full of good cheer, changing key upward and upward. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 2 theme |title =幻想ライトタウン |roma =Gensō raitotaun |titleEN =Fantasy Light Town |composer =Pesot.jp/ |comment =２面のテーマです。
宵闇の中で蛍や妖精が飛び交っているような、
柔らかな光と妖しさに満ちた幻想郷の森を想像して作りました。
ちなみに旧版はかなり短時間で制作した記憶があるのですが、
そうした曲に限って意外と思い入れがあるものです。 |translation=The stage 2 theme.
I composed it while picturing a forest in Gensokyo, filled with soft light
and eerie air, where one might see fireflies and fairies flitting about in the darkness.
Incidentally, I remember composing the previous edition of this song in quite a short amount
of time, but those quick songs are the ones I tend to feel surprisingly fond of. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 2 Boss - [[Treasure Castle Labyrinth/Characters#San Alkaloid|San Alkaloid]]'s theme |title =霊蝶は宙を舞う |roma =Rei chō wa sora o mau |titleEN =The Spirit Butterfly Dances Through the Air |composer =Pesot.jp/ |comment =サン・アルカロイドのテーマです。
ふわふわした浮遊感というより活発な飛び方をイメージしました。
妖しげな道中から少し変わって軽快な曲です。
紬のテーマもそうですが、序盤のボスは曲が流れる尺が短めなので
短い二部形式を繰り返し使って印象付ける形式にしてあります。 |translation=San Alkaloid's theme.
Rather than a floaty, drifting feeling, I pictured a more active style of
flight for this one. It's a light track, in slight contrast to the eerie stage theme.
This goes for Tsumugi's theme too, but since the early boss themes are fairly short,
I used a short, repeating binary form so as to make more of an impression. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 3 theme |title =ディープ·アクアマリン |roma =Dīpu akuamarin |titleEN =Deep Aquamarine |composer =Pesot.jp/ |comment =３面のテーマです。
　月や太陽の光が水面で乱反射している様をイメージした曲です。
底まで透き通って見える海や湖は一度は見てみたいものですね。
アレンジにあたって以前より宝石っぽさが増しているかと思います。 |translation=The stage 3 theme.
For this song, I pictured the scattered reflection of moonlight or sunlight off the water's surface.
I'd love to see an ocean or lake that's so clear you can see through to the bottom, even just once.
I think this remix has an even stronger 'gemstone' vibe compared to before. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Stage 3 Boss - [[Treasure Castle Labyrinth/Characters#Umishige no Seki|Umeshige no Seki]]'s theme |title =爆裂氷界石　～ Oxygen Conversion. |roma =Bakuretsu hyōkaiseki |titleEN =Explosive Ice-Border Stone ~ Oxygen Conversion |composer =Pesot.jp/ |comment =海重乃　汐(うみしげの　せき)のテーマです。
宝天京中でも一二を争うほど燃えるような熱い曲調にしました。
元の熱さを残しつつ、心持ちさっぱりと歯切れよいアレンジに。
３面ボスは体験版の範囲ではラスボスなので、
思いっきり熱く強そうな感じがいいですよね。 |translation=Umishige no Seki's theme.
The melody that I composed for it is in the running for one of TCL's hottest.
For this remix, I kept the original's heat while giving it a slightly crisp and refreshing vibe.
The stage 3 boss is basically the final boss of the trial version,
so it feels great to give her a theme that's as hot and strong as it can be. }} {{MusicRoom |category =Score theme |title =プレイヤーズスコア |roma =Pureiyāzu sukoa |titleEN =Player's Score |composer =Pesot.jp/ |comment =ゲームオーバーのテーマです。
本家に倣ってラスボスの曲をベースにしています。
東方星蓮船以前よりも妖精大戦争以降のアレンジを参考にしました。
ドラムも幾分か加わってノリが良くはなりましたが、
やはり物悲しいものは物悲しいです。 |translation=The game over theme.
Just like in the official series, it's based on the final boss theme.
I took cues from the post-Fairy Wars arrangement this time, as opposed to pre-UFO.
It's gotten a bit groovier thanks to adding a few more drums,
but all things considered, it's still pretty melancholy. }} {{MusicRoom |category =PV theme (Bonus track) |title =宵宮の宝石箱 |roma =Yoimiya no hōsekibako |titleEN =Jewel Box of a Festival's EveThis track is unlocked after clearing the trial version with all three teams without continuing. |composer =Pesot.jp/ |comment =ＰＶのテーマです。
旧版ではオープニングムービーのテーマとして書いたものです。
新約化にあたってこちらも再アレンジしました。
本家にはこうしたポジションのＢＧＭがないので難しいですが、
それでも東方っぽさが出ていればいいな、と思います。 |translation=The promotional video theme.
The original version was composed for [https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm22949367 the OST videos' opening movie.]
Since everything is getting a revamp, I remixed this one as well.
None of the official games have had a track for this unique purpose,
so it was tough to get right, but I hope it still feels adequately Touhou-esque. }} ==Notes== {{Navbox TCL}} [[Category: Music by Game]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title and Menu Theme | title =ニュースレイヴン出撃！ | roma =Nyūsu reivun shutsugeki! | titleEN =News Raven Sortie! | composer =Wanwan | comment =タイトル画面のテーマです。

勢いよく空回りしそうな曲にしました。雨が降ってますね。
友人にとんでもなく雨男で凶しか引かない不幸な人がいます。
一緒にいると私の運勢が上昇するのでとてもお得です。 | translation = This is the Title Screen Theme.

I made a song that can spin its wheels with a lot of force. Lots of rain lately, huh?
One of my friends is a super-downcast kind of guy. He only ever draws the short straw.
My luck shoots way up when we're together, which is really convenient! }} {{MusicRoom | category =Photo Theme 1 (Tutorial, Level 1~2) | title =コティングリー天狗事件 | roma =Kotingurī tengu jiken | titleEN =The Case of the [[wikipedia:Cottingley_Fairies|Cottingley]] Tengu | composer =Wanwan | comment =撮影テーマ1です。

天狗の鼻って長いイメージですが、森の中を動き回って
木に引っ掛かって折れちゃったりしないんですかね？
曲の方ですが、序盤らしく爽やかな感じにしてみました。 | translation =This is Photo Theme #1.

Most people picture tengu with long noses, but wouldn't those noses
get stuck on trees and break when they're flying around forests?
As for the song itself, I tried giving it a refreshing feeling for the early stages. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Photo Theme 2 (Level 3~4) | title =アステリズムダンジョン | roma =Asuterizumu danjon | titleEN =Asterism Dungeon | composer =Wanwan | comment =撮影テーマ2です。

昔、駅から徒歩0分の場所に行くのに1時間かかりました。
今にして思えば何で迷ったのか謎ですが、もしかすると
あの場所は一種のダンジョンだったのかもしれません（？）。 | translation =This is Photo Theme #2.

One time, I took a whole hour to walk to a station that was 0
minutes away by foot. Thinking about it now, I have no idea why
I got lost, but maybe that place was actually a kind of dungeon(?). }} {{MusicRoom | category =Photo Theme 3 (Level 5~6) | title =桃源航路 ～ Avalon Gate | roma =Tougen kouro | titleEN =Shangri-La Sailing Route ~ Avalon Gate | composer =Wanwan | comment =撮影テーマ3です。

旅っぽい感じで今回はシタールを使ってみまシタール。
旅行先で景色を楽しむのはわりと好きな方なのですが、
安いからと鈍行列車で日帰りツアーはもうやりたくないです。 | translation =This is Photo Theme #3.

To add a travel-esque feeling to the song, I gave sitars a si-try.
I'm pretty fond of enjoying the scenery at a travel destination, but I'm
fed up with taking slow, day-trip train rides just because they're cheap. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Photo Theme 4 (Level 7~8) | title =天地結ぶビーンストーク | roma =Tenchi musubu bīnsutōku | titleEN =The Beanstalk Linking Heaven and Earth | composer =Wanwan | comment =撮影テーマ4です。

豆類は食べられない事はないですがあまり好きではないです。
食べるにしても小粒の方が食べやすくて好きですね。
納豆の中粒を間違って買った時は泣きながら食べました。 | translation =This is Photo Theme #4.

I can stomach beans, but I don't like them that much.
Even when I do eat them, I prefer small ones that are easier to eat.
Once, I bought medium-size natto beans by mistake, and ate them while crying. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Photo Theme 5 (Level 9) | title =終焉と創造の天頂 | roma =Shuuen to souzou no tenchou | titleEN =Zenith of Destruction and Creation | composer =Wanwan | comment =撮影テーマ5です。

終盤らしく賑やかでクールに激しい曲です。
頂というと、とある緑色のドラゴンを思い出すのですが、
速い自転車で塔を登るのに休日が丸々犠牲になりました。 | translation =This is Photo Theme #5.

A lively, cool and intense song, perfect for the late game.
"Zenith" reminds me of [https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Rayquaza_(Pok%C3%A9mon) a certain green dragon], in this case.
Climbing that tower with the fast bike took up my entire holiday. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Photo Theme 6 - [[Mystical Power Plant/Characters#Saraka Sant'Angelo|Saraka Sant'Angelo]]'s theme | title =デスサイズパラダイス | roma =Desusaizu paradaisu | titleEN =Deathscythe Paradise | composer =Wanwan | comment =サラカ・サンタンジェのテーマです。

以前のテーマはオマージュだったので新規書き下ろしです。
魂を刈り取ってくれそうなカッコよさに全振りしました。
死神の鎌って凄くサイズ大きいデスよね。なんでデスかね。 | translation =Saraka Sant'Angelo's theme.

Her previous theme was a tribute, so now she gets something original.
I put every bit of effort into giving it a cool, soul-reaping vibe.
Shinigami's ''scythes'' are really over-''sized'', aren't they? Why in Death's name is that? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Photo Theme 7 - [[Tri Focuser/Characters#Tamako Sant'Angelo|Tamako Sant'Angelo]]'s theme | title =純真なる徒花 ～ Absolute Lily | roma =Junshin'naru adabana | titleEN =A Pure and Innocent Fleeting Flower ~ Absolute Lily | composer =Wanwan | comment =タマコ・サンタンジェのテーマです。

久しぶりの天使達ですので教会で三味線を掻き鳴らしました。
一般に美しい花とされていますが、個人的にはどこか不気味な
感じがします。お見舞いでおみまいするのはやめましょう。 | translation =Tamako Sant'Angelo's theme.

It's been a long time since we saw the angel crew, so I strummed a shamisen in a church.
Lilies are generally viewed as a beautiful flower, but personally, I find them a bit creepy.
If you're visiting someone in the hospital, try giving them something else. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending Theme | title =ニュースレイヴン反省会場 | roma =Nyūsu reivun hanseikaijou | titleEN =News Raven Postmortem Review "反省会" simply means "evaluation meeting," "review session," etc., but in some Japanese internet contexts, "反省会会場" is specifically used for a tongue-in-cheek "review session" after an event that was unsatisfying or went horribly awry. | composer =Wanwan | comment =エンディングのテーマです。

哀愁漂う曲に仕上がりました。雨は止んだようです。
邪に始まり魔まで揃った記念的な作品となりましたので、
これを期に、創作活動の半生を反省してみようと思います。 | translation =This is the ending theme.

I finished this one off as a melancholy, drifting song. The rain seems to have stopped.
Since this is a sort of memorial game spanning "[[The Last Comer|Comer]]" to "[[Book of Star Mythology|Book]]", I'd like to take this
opportunity to look back on the half or so of my life I've spent on creative activity. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll Theme | title =天狗が帰ってバイバイバイ | roma =Tengu ga kaette bai bai bai | titleEN =The Tengu All Go Home, Bye-Bye-Bye "Tengu ga kaette, bai bai bai": a play on "denguri kaette, bai bai bai" ("let's do a somersault, bye-bye-bye"), part of the lyrics of Japanese children's song ''Ningen tte ii na''. | composer =Wanwan | comment =スタッフロールのテーマです。

どっかででんぐり返りたくなるような雰囲気にしました。
今ではお風呂はシャワーで済まし、ふとんで眠れないので、
もしかしたら社会人は人間ではないのかもしれません。 | translation =This is the Staff Roll theme.

I gave it an atmosphere that makes you want to do a somersault somewhere.
Nowadays, I have a shower instead of a bath and can't sleep in my futonAlso a reference to the lyrics of ''Ningen tte ii na''.,
so perhaps working-class adults don't actually count as human? }} ==Notes== {{smallrefs}} {{Navbox TF}} [[Category:Tri Focuser]] [[Category:Music by Game]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title Screen | title =虹の架かる幻想郷 | roma =Niji no Kakaru Gensoukyou | titleEN =A Rainbow Spanning Gensokyo | comment =タイトル画面のテーマです。
爽やかだけど少し気怠さの残る感じの曲です。雨が上がったからと言って、すぐには活動的になれないもんですよね。 | translation =This is the title screen theme.
A track that's refreshing, but still leaves a slightly lazy feeling. The rain may have lifted, but that doesn't make it any easier to get up and start being active, does it? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Theme | title =妖異達の通り雨 | roma =Youi-tachi no Toori Ame | titleEN =A Shower of Strange Occurrences | comment =１面のテーマです。
大雨降る森の上の曲です。雨の曲って、しっとりにさせるか疾走感を持たせるかで１８０度イメージが変わりますよね。この曲は１面らしく後者です。 | translation =This is the Stage 1 theme.
A track for flying over a forest in a downpour. When it comes to rainy music, the impression it gives flips by 180 degrees based on whether you make it feel damp, or give it a sense of speed. This track is in the latter category, befitting of Stage 1. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Boss - [[Mike Goutokuji]]'s Theme | title =大吉キトゥン | roma =Daikichi Kitun | titleEN =Kitten of Great Fortune | comment =豪徳寺 ミケ（ごうとくじ みけ）のテーマです。
千客万来、商売繁盛と言えば招き猫ですね。和風というか中華風というか、何処かしら東洋の感じがするメロディになっていると思います。猫っぽい跳ねる感じの曲で、かわいらしいと思いません？ | translation =This is Mike Goutokuji's theme.
When you think of floods of customers and prosperous business, you think of the maneki-neko. I think this track's melody feels sort of Japanese, or sort of Chinese-- it's got an Oriental vibe of sorts. A bouncing, cat-like track. Cute, don't you think? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Theme | title =深緑に隠された断崖 | roma =Shinryoku ni Kakusareta Dangai | titleEN =The Cliff Hidden in Deep Green | comment =２面のテーマです。
はなっから異界っぽさが強い曲です。深い山の中って人間にとっては異界なんですよね。それは衛星写真で世界中見られる今になっても深い森に包まれた山の中は異界のままなのです。 | translation =This is the Stage 2 theme.
A track with a strong otherworldly feel to it right off the bat. The far reaches of a mountain are an Otherworld from a human's perspective, you know? Even with satellite photography showing us the whole world nowadays, mountain crags covered in deep forest are as alien as ever. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Boss - [[Takane Yamashiro]]'s Theme | title =バンデットリィテクノロジー | roma =Bandettorī Tekunorojī | titleEN =Banditry Technology | comment =山城 たかね（やましろ たかね)のテーマです。
河童と対を成す山の妖怪、山童です。頭脳派妖怪（？）らしく、遊び感覚で戦闘している感じの曲になりました。何処か懐かしさもあって面白い曲です。 | translation =This is Takane Yamashiro's theme.
She's one of the yamawaro, the mountain youkai that serve as counterparts to the kappa. As befits an intellectually-leaning youkai(?), this track came out with the feeling that she's fighting you as if playing a game. It's an interesting track, with a nostalgic mood to it somewhere. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Theme | title =駒草咲くパーペチュアルスノー | roma =Komakusa Saku Pāpechuaru Sunō | titleEN =The Perpetual Snow of Komakusa Blossoms | comment =３面のテーマです。
山の上の少しだけ開けた高地をイメージしました。辿り着くのが難しいこういう高地の平原は、昔は平家や忍者などの隠れ里と呼ばれる事がよくあったようですね。流石に事実ではないと思いますが、ロマンがあります。 | translation =This is the Stage 3 theme.
I pictured a high, just slightly broad plateau atop a mountain. Since these kinds of flat plateaus are hard to reach, people long ago often called them hidden villages for the Taira or ninjas, didn't they? I don't think there's any truth to it, of course, but it's certainly romantic. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss - [[Sannyo Komakusa]]'s Theme | title =スモーキングドラゴン | roma =Sumōkingu Doragon | titleEN =Smoking Dragon | comment =駒草 山如（こまくさ さんにょ）のテーマです。
煙管片手のその出で立ちから駒草太夫と呼ばれている彼女です。ストレートに癖の強い曲を作りました。もっとヤクザっぽいのを目指したんですけどね、なんだろうこの中ボス感……。まあやってることは門番だし、紛うこと無き中ボスなんですが。 | translation =This is Sannyo Komakusa's theme.
She's called Komakusa-dayuu thanks to how she dresses, and the pipe she holds in one hand. I composed a track with a strong, straightforward sense of individuality to it. I did try to make something more yakuza-ish, though. What's up with this "midboss" feeling...? Well, she ''is'' just serving as the gatekeeper; she's a midboss through and through. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 Theme | title =廃れゆく産業遺構 | roma =Sutareyuku Sangyou Ikou | titleEN =The Obsolescent Industrial Remains | comment =４面のテーマです。
かつては鉱山というと周辺に街が出来るくらいの一大産業でした。運搬のために道や鉄道も発達し、日本の産業を支えていました。しかし、現在は殆ど閉山しています。 この曲は鉱山跡にノスタルジアを感じてこんな感じになりました。 | translation =This is the Stage 4 theme.
In the past, mining was such a big industry that towns were built around it. Roads and railroads were developed to transport ores, and they supported Japanese industries. However, most of the mines have now been closed. This theme was inspired by nostalgia for the mine ruins. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 Boss - [[Misumaru Tamatsukuri]]'s Theme | title =神代鉱石 | roma =Jindai Kouseki | titleEN =Ore from the Age of the Gods | comment =玉造 魅須丸（たまつくり みすまる）のテーマです。
ダンジョンの奥で敵か味方か判らない謎の人物と対峙するイメージで作曲しました。そのまんまですね（笑） さて、突如現れた伊弉諾物質ですが、僕が作った同名の音楽CDに出てきますのでそちらも是非。結局、謎の物質です。 | translation =This is Misumaru Tamatsukuri's theme.
I composed this theme with the image of confronting a mysterious person deep in a dungeon, who you can't identify as an enemy or ally. And that's exactly what happens (haha). Now, the Izanagi Objects that suddenly appeared also appear in the [[Neo-traditionalism of Japan|music CD of the same name]] that I made, so be sure to check that out as well. At the end of the day, they're still mysterious objects. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 Theme | title =待ちわびた逢魔が時 | roma =Machiwabita Oumagatoki | titleEN =The Long-Awaited Oumagatoki | comment =５面のテーマです。
幻想的な山からの展望のイメージから、天狗が出て世界が急に身近になり、世界が狭くなると心が軽くなる……そんな感じの曲です。４面の虹龍洞が息苦しい感じだったのに対し、軽快で楽しい、そしてボスが判りやすい奴、というのが気持ちいいです。 | translation =This is the Stage 5 theme.
The initial image is that of a fantastic view from the mountains, followed by the world suddenly becoming more familiar once a tengu appears. As the world becomes narrower, your heart becomes lighter... that's the sort of feeling this track has. As a nice contrast to the suffocating feeling of Stage 4's Rainbow Dragon Cave, this stage is lighthearted and fun, with a boss who's easy to understand. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 Boss - [[Megumu Iizunamaru]]'s Theme | title =星降る天魔の山 | roma =Hoshifuru Tenma no Yama | titleEN =Starry Mountain of Tenma | comment =飯綱丸 龍（いいずなまる めぐむ）のテーマです。
大物の天狗らしく、おどけた感じを残しつつも哀愁のある曲になりました。メインフレーズは個人的に懐かしい感じがして、何故か目頭が熱くなります。なんかこういうゲームらしいフレーズの曲って殆ど見かけなくなったからですかねぇ。 | translation =This is Megumu Iizunamaru's theme.
As befits an important tengu, this theme is melancholic while still retaining a jokey feel. The main phrase of the theme is nostalgic for me personally, and for some reason it makes my eyes tear up. I wonder if it's because we rarely see themes with game-like phrases like this anymore. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Theme | title =ルナレインボー | roma =Runa Reinbō | titleEN =Lunar Rainbow | comment =最終面のテーマです。
幻想的な夜空に軽快なリズムを合わせました。そういえば子供の頃って、月明りで自分の影がくっきりと地面に落ちていた気がします。今は周りが明るくなったから見えなくなったのか、それともあれは妖怪の仕業だったのか。 | translation =This is the Final Stage theme.
I set a light rhythm to the fantastical night sky. Come to think of it, when I was a child, I used to see my shadow cast clearly onto the ground by moonlight. Have I stopped seeing it because everything around you is so bright nowadays? Or had it been a youkai's doing? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Boss - [[Chimata Tenkyuu]]'s Theme | title =あの賑やかな市場は今どこに ～ Immemorial Marketeers | roma =Ano Nigiyaka na Shijou wa Ima Doko ni ~ Immemorial Marketeers | titleEN =Where Is That Bustling Marketplace Now ~ Immemorial Marketeers |also= {{RCS}} | comment =天弓 千亦（てんきゅう ちまた）のテーマです。
市場の神です。虹というのは異界と交錯する場所です。異なる物が交わる場所こそ、彼女のテリトリーなのです。曲の方も軽いリズムで楽しく賑やかなパートと、パワフルでどこか悲鳴のようにも聞こえるパートが交錯する曲になりました。 | translation =This is Chimata Tenkyuu's theme.
She's a market god. A rainbow is a place where Otherworlds intersect with ours. Those very places where different things cross paths are her territory. Her theme likewise became one where two sections intersect: a fun and lively section with a light rhythm to it, and a powerful section that might somehow sound like wailing. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage Theme | title =幻想の地下大線路網 | roma =Gensou no Chika Daisenromou | titleEN =The Great Fantastic Underground Railway Network | comment =エキストラステージのテーマです。
勾玉（酸素ボンベ）を手に入れて心置きなく、坑道探検に行く霊夢達をイメージしました。振り回されっぱなしだった彼女達の逆襲が始まる……筈だったのに。まさかさらに振り回される事になるとは | translation =This is the Extra Stage theme.
I envisioned Reimu and co. heading out on their mine-exploring journey with no reservations, thanks to the magatama (oxygen tank) they've obtained. They've been yanked back and forth all over the place up until now, but now their counterattack begins... or at least, it was supposed to. Who would've thought that they'd get yanked around even more? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Boss - [[Momoyo Himemushi]]'s Theme | title =龍王殺しのプリンセス | roma =Ryuuou-goroshi no Purinsesu | titleEN =The Princess Who Slays Dragon Kings | comment =姫虫 百々世（ひめむし ももよ）のテーマです。
ムカデの姫です。いやー、いくら昆虫好きでもムカデはちょっとねぇ……。醜悪、毒がある、割と身近でレア度も低い、と嫌われる要素しかないムカデですが、やっぱり嫌いです。でも曲は最高に楽しくムカデみたいに格好いい物になりました。やっぱり好きかも。 | translation =This is Momoyo Himemushi's theme.
She's a centipede princess. Y'know, no matter how much I like insects, centipedes are... yikes. They're hideous, poisonous, fairly familiar, and low-rarity. They're packed with nothing but detestable qualities, and yet, I still hate them. Her theme, however, turned out to be supremely fun, and just as cool as centipedes are. Maybe I do like them after all. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending Theme | title =嵐の後の日曜日 | roma =Arashi no Ato no Nichiyoubi | titleEN =The Sunday After the Storm | comment =エンディングのテーマです。
お酒を手に、のんびりと何にもしない日曜日に憧れます。 | translation =This is the ending theme.
I long for Sundays where I can relax and do nothing with a beer in my hand. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll Theme | title =虹色の世界 | roma =Niji-iro no Sekai | titleEN =A Rainbow-Colored World | comment =スタッフロールのテーマです。
世界の市場に笑顔と賑やかさが戻る日を夢見て。 | translation =This is the staff roll theme.
I dream of the day when the world's markets will be smiling and bustling again. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Score Theme | title =プレイヤーズスコア | roma =Pureiyāzu sukoa | titleEN =Player's Score }}
{{Project Translations Notice}}
{{Navbox UM}}
[[Category:Unconnected Marketeers]] [[Category:Music by Game]] [[Category:Translations]] [[es:Unconnected Marketeers/Música]] [[ru:Unconnected Marketeers/Музыка]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title screen | title =青空の影 | roma =Aozora no kage | titleEN =A Shadow in the Blue Sky | comment =　タイトル画面のテーマです。

　まあいつもの感じで。
　ちょっとすかした感じにしてみました。
　上を向いて歩きたいけど、変な人に見られるのが怖いので
　前を向いて歩きます。 | translation =This is the title screen theme.

Well, it's [[Theme of Eastern Story|the same feeling as always]].
I tried to give it a particularly affected air.
I want to look up at the sky while I'm walking, but I'm afraid people will think I'm weird, so I look straight ahead when I walk. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 theme | title =春の湊に | roma =Haru no minato ni | titleEN =At the End of Spring | comment =　１面のテーマです。

　軽快で気持ちの良い曲で始めたかったのでこんな感じに。
　やっぱさ、シューティングって明るい方がよくない？
　と、その時の気分で趣味嗜好が変わる人間が言ってもねぇ。
　曲は爽やかです。窓から飛び出したくなるくらい。 | translation =The stage 1 theme.

I wanted to start with something nice and casual, so this is how it came out.
I guess bright songs just aren't that great for shooting games?
Or so say people whose likes and tastes change at the time with their moods.
It's so invigorating that it makes me want to fly out the window. | note ={{lang|ja|春の湊}} - Literally "harbor of spring" or "harbor where spring is going to sail" (a poetic phrase for the end of spring) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Boss - [[Nazrin]]'s theme | title =小さな小さな賢将 | roma =Chiisana chiisana kenshou | titleEN =A Tiny, Tiny, Clever Commander | comment =　ナズーリンのテーマです。

　ボスっぽい曲でしょ？　見た目はともかく。
　昔自分が入っているこたつの中に、ネズミが入ってきた事がある。
　噛まれた事もある。血が止まらなくなって小学校休んだなぁ。
　ネズミは実際強いし、危ないよ。見た目はともかく。 | translation =This is Nazrin's theme.

Isn't the song boss-like? Never mind how she looks.
Once, a long time ago, a mouse climbed into the kotatsu with me.
It even bit me. The bleeding wouldn't stop, so I had to stay home from school.
Mice are actually pretty strong, so they're dangerous. Never mind how they look. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 theme | title =閉ざせし雲の通い路 | roma =Tozaseshi kumo no kayoiji | titleEN =The Sealed Cloud Route | comment =　２面のテーマです。

　１面とは異なった浮遊感を出してみました。
　妖怪がいるであろう雲の中を泳いでいます。
　想像すると気持ちよさそうだけど、実際は寒いだろうね。
　服が凍ったりするんじゃないかな。ガッツ足りるかなぁ。 | translation =This is the stage 2 theme.

I tried to bring out a floating feeling the stage 1 theme didn't have.
You're swimming through the clouds, where surely there are youkai.
One imagines it must feel good, but it's probably really cold.
Your clothes would probably freeze. I wonder if I'd have the guts to do it. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Boss - [[Kogasa Tatara]]'s theme | title =万年置き傘にご注意を | roma =Mannen okigasa ni gochuui o | titleEN =Beware the Umbrella Left There Forever | comment =　多々良 小傘のテーマです。

　傘って、一生のうちに何本買っちゃうんだろうか。
　電車に置き忘れたり、出先での突然の雨にビニール傘を買ったり。
　それはともかく、楽しげなのに急に気分が落ち込んだりするという
　勝手な唐傘お化けのイメージで作りました。 | translation =This is Kogasa Tatara's theme.

Most people probably buy quite a few umbrellas over their lives.
You forget them on trains, and you buy vinyl umbrellas when you're caught in sudden rain.
Anyway, I wrote this song based on the image of a self-centered karakasa youkai who gets depressed easily despite her cheery nature. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 theme | title =スカイルーイン | roma =Sukai rūin | titleEN =Sky Ruin | comment =　３面のテーマです。

　軽快さを失わずに、ちょっと謎めいた雰囲気を出してみました。
　空中に浮かぶと言えばやはりラピュタですが――のくだりは、もう
　やりましたね。
　では廃墟と言えば……やはりラピュ | translation =This is the stage 3 theme.

I tried to evoke a cryptic atmosphere without losing the airiness.
When it comes to floating in the sky, you really do think of Laputa - but I've already made that descent.
So, when it comes to ruins...you still think of Laputa. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss - [[Ichirin Kumoi]] and [[Unzan]]'s theme | title =時代親父とハイカラ少女 | roma =Jidai oyaji to haikara shoujo | titleEN =The Traditional Old Man and the Stylish Girl | comment =　雲居 一輪＆雲山のテーマです。

　楽しいキャラだったので、曲も楽しげで古くさい感じにしました。
　馬鹿っぽかったり、時折センチになったり素敵です。
　雲山は雲で出来ていますので、同時に二人以上出てきても同時に
　腕が四本出てきても気にする必要はありません。眼力フラッシュ！ | translation =This is Ichirin Kumoi and Unzan's theme.

Since they're pretty fun characters, I tried to make it fun and old-fashioned.
It's really nice, sometimes silly and sometimes sentimental.
Unzan is made out of clouds, so don't worry about it if more than two of him or four of his arms show up at once. Flash of insight! }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 theme | title =幽霊客船の時空を越えた旅 | roma =Yuurei kyakusen no jikuu o koeta tabi | titleEN =Interdimensional Voyage of a Ghostly Passenger Ship | comment =　４面のテーマです。

　旅って良いですよね。乗り物に乗っている時が一番ワクワクする。
　例えそれが、よく沈没する事で有名な幽霊船長の船だとしても。
　この曲は出来るだけ期待と不安が入り交じった、ワクワク感を出し
　て見ました。 | translation =This is the stage 4 theme.

Aren't journeys great? I feel the most excited when I'm riding on a vessel.
Even if it's the ship of the infamous ghost captain who sinks lots of other ships.
I mixed anticipation and anxiety together as much as I could when making this song, trying to give it a sense of excitement. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 Boss - [[Minamitsu Murasa]]'s theme | title =キャプテン・ムラサ | roma =Kyaputen murasa | titleEN =Captain Murasa | comment =　村紗 水蜜のテーマです。

　よく沈没する事で有名な舟幽霊の船長です。
　曲はキャプテンってイメージで作ったので、無駄に格好良いです。
　しかしみんなムラサって呼ぶけど、ムラサのは妖怪の名前なので
　実は名前で呼ばれていないというオチが。 | translation =This is Minamitsu Murasa's theme.

Since she sinks lots of ships, she's a well-known ghost captain.
I tried to give it a "captain" atmosphere, so it's a little too cool.
Everyone calls her Murasa, but murasa is the name of a youkai, so they're not really calling her by name - surprise! }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 theme | title =魔界地方都市エソテリア | roma =Makai chihoutoshi esoteria | titleEN =Rural Makai City Esoteria |also= {{DBOA}} | comment =　５面のテーマです。

　変則的なリズムの曲ですが意外とノリノリです。魔界っぽい感じ。
　プレイ中の効果音と共に聞くと、途中からの盛り上がりが激しい
　ので、是非遊びながら聞いて貰いたいです。
　曲名は、田舎的な感じと都会的な感じを併せ持ったところから。 | translation =This is the stage 5 theme.

This is a song with irregular rhythms, but it's upbeat. Pretty Makai-ish.
It gets pretty intense when you're listening to it with the sound effects from gameplay, so I hope you'll listen closely while playing.
The name comes from the song having both a rural and an urban feel. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 Boss - [[Shou Toramaru]]'s theme | title =虎柄の毘沙門天 | roma =Toragara no bishamonten | titleEN =The Tiger-Patterned Bishamonten | comment =　虎丸 星のテーマです。

　静かに強い感じを出しました。後半のボスっぽい感じ。
　恐怖というより、威厳があるという感じです。
　しかし、くるんくるんレーザー怖い。
　アレは高い反射神経を要する老体キラーだ。 | translation =This is Shou Toramaru's theme.

I gave this song a quiet, but strong feel. The second half is awfully boss-ish.
It's a feeling of dignity rather than terror.
Still, those lasers coming one after the other are pretty scary.
They're old-man killers so you need really good reflexes to dodge. | note =Shou's name is misspelled as "{{lang|ja|虎丸 星}}" in the comment, where it should be "{{lang|ja|寅丸 星}}". }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 theme | title =法界の火 | roma =Hokkai no hi | titleEN =Fires of Hokkai | comment =　６面のテーマです。

　無駄に緊張感のある曲です。
　短いステージで難易度も高くない処が、逆に緊張する。

　心音は焦るよね。 | translation =This is the stage 6 theme.

A song with too much tension.
The stage is short and not too hard, so I had to add to the tension.

The heartbeats make you want to hurry, don't they? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 Boss - [[Byakuren Hijiri]]'s theme | title =感情の摩天楼　～ {{lang|en|Cosmic Mind}} | roma =Kanjou no matenrou | titleEN =Emotional Skyscraper ~ Cosmic Mind |also= {{TGA}} | comment =　聖 白蓮のテーマです。

　静かな心音からいきなり世界は開ける感じにしました。
　疲れにくいラスボスの曲です、多分。
　全体的に和風でメロディアスに、サビはまるでみんなで歌っている
　かのようなメロディにしました。人間、感情むき出しでＧＯ！ | translation =This is Byakuren Hijiri's theme.

From the quiet heartbeat, suddenly it feels like the world is opening up.
This is the theme of a last boss who is hard to tire out, probably.
It's overall fairly melodiously Japanese, and I tried to make the melody of the main part like one of those songs where everyone's singing. Human, bare your feelings and GO! | note =While "skyscraper" is used in everyday meaning as "a very tall building of many floors or stories" nowadays, it used to indicate a nautical object, "a triangular skysail". Remember that the sail is the first sign one can realize a ship's approach from under the horizon. In other words, a sail appears to be a ship having it.
Another point: the main part of story mode is sandwiched between the theme of stage 1 with "harbor of spring" and that of stage 6 boss with "sky-scraping must" — the first and the last track. The trigger of the story is the treasure ship protagonists find, the theme of stage 1 including a keyword "harbor of spring", and that of stage 6 boss "skyscraper" as a must. These are the motif around ship. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra stage theme | title =夜空のユーフォーロマンス | roma =Yozora no yūfō romansu | titleEN =UFO Romance in the Night Sky |also= {{TGA}} | comment =　エキストラステージのテーマです。

　ＵＦＯ可愛いよね。
　ここからは本編とは打って変わって可愛いノリでお送りします。
　ポップな感じを目指して作りました。
　やっぱＵＦＯはポップですよ。 | translation =This is the extra stage theme.

Aren't UFOs cute?
The extra is much different than the main stages, and this song is a cute send-off.
I went for a pop feel for this song.
UFOs are kind of pop-ish, after all. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage Boss - [[Nue Houjuu]]'s theme | title =平安のエイリアン | roma =Heian no eirian | titleEN =Heian AlienThe title of this song is a parody of the video game [[Wikipedia:Heiankyo Alien|"Heiankyo Alien"]] created by the Theoretical Science Group (TSG), a student club at the University of Tokyo, in 1979. | comment =　封獣 ぬえのテーマです。

　激しく妖怪妖怪した曲です。
　古風で和風な恐怖と哀愁を漂わせた曲にしました。
　いかにもエキストラボスって感じになってるかな。
　割と一発録音でアドリブだらけだったりするのもエキストラっぽい。 | translation =This is Nue Houjuu's theme.

A vigorously youkai youkai song.
It's a song with an old-fashioned, Japanese sense of terror and sorrow floating about.
Isn't it really fitting for an EX boss?
The mostly one-shot recording full of ad-libbing is also pretty EX-ish. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending theme | title =妖怪寺 | roma =Youkaidera | titleEN =Youkai Temple | comment =　エンディングのテーマです。

　いつも神社のテーマばっかなので、珍しくお寺。

　神社よりお寺の方が暗いイメージがある。
　いや暗いと言ったら失礼だ。退屈なイメージで （冗談です） | translation =This is the ending theme.

Usually the ending is for a Shinto shrine, but this time it's for a Buddhist temple.

Temples have a much darker image than shrines.
Well, calling it "dark" is kind of rude. I meant "boring" (just kidding) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff roll theme | title =空の帰り道　～ {{lang|en|Sky Dream}} | roma =Sora no kaerimichi | titleEN =Returning Home from the Sky ~ Sky Dream | comment =　スタッフロールのテーマです。

　感情の摩天楼の編曲になってます。

　旅の終わりの静かな帰り道って感じです。
　見上げてごらん～、夜空にＵＦＯが。 | translation =This is the staff roll theme.

It ended up being an arrangement of Emotional Skyscraper.

This song has the feel of the quiet trip home after a journey.
Oh, look up there~, there's a UFO in the night sky. }} == Also See == * [[List_by_Song/Undefined Fantastic Object|Undefined Fantastic Object arrangements listed by song]] {{Project Translations Notice}} {{Navbox UFO}} [[ru:Undefined Fantastic Object/Музыка]] [[zh:东方星莲船/音乐]] [[Category:Undefined Fantastic Object]] [[Category:Music by Game]] [[Category:Translations]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title Theme | title =幻想郷学界 | titleEN =Gensokyo's Scientific World | comment =N/A | composer =Roka Enzaki (original: ElianTempest) | translation =This is the title theme.

This piece is... weird. It feels like out of the place with the Touhou universe,
but yet it has the classic melody.

I wonder if that cave is actually an interesting place? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Theme | title =夜の湖上の不穏な飛行 | titleEN =Unpeaceful Flight Over the Night Lake | comment =N/A | composer =Roka Enzaki | translation =This is the Stage 1 theme.

I wanted to portray a very calm night on this song, but honestly,
it's anything but that. The pianos start slowly, but the rest of the song goes
fast. I just love pianos.
... It's hard to make songs in a very short period of time,
so it may not be my best. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Boss - [[Unstable and Unimaginable Power/Characters#Umibiyo Wanitori|Umibiyo Wanitori]]'s theme | title =湖を渡るワニ | titleEN =Wani Crossing the Lake | comment =N/A | composer =ElianTempest | translation =This is Umibiyo Wanitori's theme.

I wanted to make a nice yet powerful theme, though, like most of my music,
sounds kinda weird (lol), it could be one of my best or not, either way,
it's a theme. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 theme | title =どこかに続く洞窟 | titleEN =Cave Leading to Somewhere | comment =N/A | composer =ElianTempest | translation =This is the Stage 2 theme.

Ah, what a scary cave, wouldn't you say?
I tried getting the feeling of a dark empty cave while composing,
I think I did a good job. I do wonder... who's inside this cave? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Boss - [[Unstable and Unimaginable Power/Characters#Jun Rhodes-Rose|Jun Rhodes-Rose]]'s theme | title =深空のシーフ | titleEN =Deep Sky Thief | comment =N/A | composer =Roka Enzaki | translation =This is Jun Rhodes-Rose's theme.

I like how I did this, it starts very simple and then BOOM you start to
believe you heard this before.

Many people think they heard similar things when, in reality, the song
doesn't have any. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 theme | title =イントゥ・クレイジーアンステーブルパワー | titleEN =Into Crazy Unstable Power | comment =N/A | composer =Roka Enzaki | translation =This is the Stage 3 theme.

This lab is such a strange place, so I brought some chromaticism to it.
Then, it goes dramatic with the piano and saw leads.

It is time to reach the culprit of this incident, I guess. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss - [[Unstable and Unimaginable Power/Characters#Rachel Michelangelo|Rachel Michelangelo]]'s theme | title =アニマジナブルパワー　～ 迷い科学者の憂鬱 | titleEN =Unimaginable Power ~ Melancholy of the Lost ScientistMisspelled as "Scientifist" in-game. | comment =N/A | composer =Roka Enzaki & Melody Harmonia | translation =This is Rachel Michelangelo's theme.

Built using an old snippet of a friend, I made this song a bit experimental
to my tastes, it feels "unstable" due to the key changes. The stage 3 motif
was hard to add into this.
But well, I think it fits totally the character, she has a "sad" story and
only wants to go home. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss - [[Unstable and Unimaginable Power/Characters#Rachel Michelangelo|Rachel Michelangelo]]'s second theme | title = | titleEN =In the Doldrums of Blue Irreconcilability | comment =N/A | composer =??? | translation =This is Rachel Michelangelo's last spell theme.
In true last spell fashion, it's an arrangement of the final boss' theme.
Or maybe it's the stage 3 theme?
Either way, I tried to make this a powerful, climactic track to end the game on.
The idea to add a guitar solo may or may not have come from a certain ghostly princess. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage theme | title = | titleEN =The Amaryllis Flower Field that Holds Chaos | comment =N/A | composer =Spooderboi | translation =This is the extra stage theme.
I made the song to be soft and relaxing while being a bit tense as if to
foreshadow what’s to come. I was supposed to make it a peaceful song but as
always I get cared away ^^;
I made it up by having the ending be a repeat of the motif but in Major.
Major scale in Touhou?! Lol }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage Boss - [[Unstable and Unimaginable Power/Characters#Housui Henkawa|Housui Henkawa]]'s theme | title = | titleEN =Reaper of the Arcane River | comment =N/A | composer =Spooderboi | translation =This is the extra boss theme.
I use alot of metal as reference for this theme since I wanted
Something that is frightening and tense. Perhaps I made it too
tense but I do like it too much to change my mind :p }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending Theme | title =科学的な和平 | titleEN =Scientific Peace | comment =N/A | composer =Roka Enzaki | translation =This is the ending theme.

It's an arrangement of the final boss theme.
I guess Rachel just wanted to leave Gensokyo but wasn't brave enough
to just ask someone to help her exit without creating a mess. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Spell Practice Theme | title =レイトナイトスペルバトル | titleEN =Late Night Spell Battle | comment =N/A | composer =ElianTempest | translation =This is the spell practice theme.

I wanted to capture a fast paced spell battle, and I guess I succeded, but, I don't know, I just hope you like it ^^. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Gallery Theme | title =シーンリコーダー | titleEN =Scene Recorder | comment =N/A | composer =Roka Enzaki | translation =This is the Gallery theme.

It's an arrangement of the final boss theme, nothing special,
except I like how the piano sounds with it. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Pre-launcher Theme | title =死学の夜桜 | titleEN =Night Sakura of Dead Science | comment =N/A | composer =ElianTempest (original: ZUN) | translation =This is the launcher theme.Only used in the initial version, its role repurposed as the Gallery theme in the update.

It's TD stage 1 theme, beautiful. This theme really sounds great with
most things. If you're ever on a long drive, play
Night Sakura of Dead Spirits, I heard it makes you feel relaxed while you
drive. Just make sure to pay attention, OK? }} {{Navbox UaUP}} [[Category:Music by Game]]

revision.comment: This new music template scheme is really unnecessary.
revision.text:
==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title screen | title =step u/b (lazy style) | titleEN =step u/b (lazy style) | composer =[http://www.fmp.jp/~kossetsu/ 骨折飲料] (''kossetsu inryou'', bone fracture drink) | source1 =おまけ_骨折飲料.txt | comment1 =マスターアップ寸前、タイトル画面にＢＧＭがないのは寂しいなあ…と いうことで、何か短時間でデッチあげられるものは無いかと思っていろ いろやってみたんですが、step u/b のベースとパーカッションだけ 鳴らしてみたら割りと良い感じになったので、リズムを 6/8 に変更し、 メロディを一部引っ張ってきて完成。
ちょっとダルな感じが強すぎたか…と思いつつも、これはこれで。 | translation1 =Just before we were ready to cut the master copy, I thought it felt kind of lonely to have a title screen with no music ... so we were wondering if there was something we could throw in to finish it very quickly and I tried a few things, but I stumbled across something nice by using step u/b as a base and leaving mostly percussion in, so I changed the rhythm to 6/8, tweaked the melody a little, and it was done.
Maybe it feels a little too lazy ... oh well, no matter. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 theme | title =step u/b | titleEN =step u/b | composer =骨折飲料 | source1 =おまけ_骨折飲料.txt | comment1 =当初のお誘いは「１曲書けます？」だったんですが、chase～ が意外と 好評だったので、調子に乗ってもう１曲…と思いつつ、ルミの立ち絵を 見ながら思いつくままに打ち込んだらこんな曲に。
どう見ても着物姿なのに、なぜダンスミュージックになりますか。 自分を小一時間問い詰めたい。 | translation1 =The original invitation was, "Won't you do music for one stage?", but since I ended up really liking chase~, I figured I'd just do one more ... and this is what I ended up thinking of once I saw Rumi's cut-in.
She's obviously wearing a kimono, so why is this dance music? I'd like to cross-examine myself for an hour. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1/2 Boss - [[Tatsumi Hakkaisan]] and [[Rumi Arie]]'s theme | title =Festiv-al-coholically | titleEN =Festiv-al-coholically | composer =骨折飲料 | source1 =おまけ_骨折飲料.txt | comment1 =制作も大詰めの段階で、「実は１面ボスと２面ボスの曲が無い訳さ」と いう素敵発言を受け、頑張ってもう１曲用意しました。
ボス曲だから、テンション高めの曲だよね…と思いつつ「『ざぱにーず』 な感じの曲があれば」という意見もあったので、要求は「和風でテンショ ン高め」となったわけですが、その要求を満たす曲がまるで思いつかず しばらく頭を抱えてました。
その後、YouTubeで津軽三味線の動画を見まくっているうち、どうにか 思いついて書き上げたのがこの曲です。後半のメロディラインに、津軽 三味線動画の影響が見え隠れ…というかモロ見えしてますね！ | translation1 =In the final stages of production, someone uttered the beautiful line, "Actually, we don't have stage 1 or 2 boss themes", so I did my best to prepare another song.
Since it's a boss theme, we thought it should be pretty tense ... And someone also thought "We should have a Zapanese-style song", so the request ended up being for "A high-tension Eastern-sounding theme", but I racked my brains trying to think up something that fit for a while with no luck.
Later I was watching some videos of tsugaru shamisen players on Youtube, and I ended up finishing something like this song. The influence of that tsugaru shamisen fades in and out of the melody in the second half ... oh, man, I'm really laying it all bare, here! }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 theme | title =Valse Alcoholique | titleEN =Valse Alcoholique | composer =[http://wamojsbhhtr.sakura.ne.jp/ 羽鳥風画] (Hatori Fuuga) | note = Hatori did not leave a comment for this theme. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 theme | title =chase the twilight | titleEN =chase the twilight | composer =骨折飲料 | source1 =おまけ_骨折飲料.txt | comment1 =今回ＢＧＭの担当に誘われて最初に出来たのがこの曲です。
実は、最初はもっと80年代ゲームミュージックっぽい感じのものを途中 まで作っていたんですが、天治の立ち絵を見た瞬間にティン☆と来て、 メロディだけ残して他はまったく別の曲になってしまいましたとさ。
最初のバージョンは、それはそれで、いずれ完成させてどこかで公開し たいですね。 | translation1 =This is the first piece I finished after being invited to do some BGM for this project.
Honestly, I originally wanted something with more of an 80's game music sound to it, but the instant I saw Tenji's cut-in everything changed, and I was left with a totally different song with only the melody remaining.
I think it would be nice to finish the original version and release it sometime, though. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Final Boss - [[Amakasu Barley Tenji]]'s theme | title =呑んべぇのレムリア | titleEN =A Drunkard's Lemuria | composer =[[ZUN]] | note = ZUN did not leave a comment for this theme. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending music | title =絶対大丈夫だよ！！いくら飲んでも朝が来るよ！！。 | titleEN =It's definitely okay!! No matter how much you drink, tomorrow will come!!. | composer =[http://www.gcfactory.sakura.ne.jp/ Kiyoma] | source1 =きよまー曲名＆コメント.txt | comment1 =みなさま、こんにちはGolden City Factory Kiyomaでございますっ。 この度は「黄昏酒場 Uwabami breakers」にお誘い頂き、エンディングテーマを制作させて頂きました。 久しぶりにシューティングゲームのBGMに関われて嬉しく思っております。 熱き酔っ払いの生き様を楽しんで頂き、クリアして楽しんた後、僕のBGMをお聞きいただきながら 弾幕の余韻に浸って頂ければ幸いで御座います。 | translation1 =Hello everyone, this is Kiyoma from [[Golden City Factory]]. I was invited to participate in "Twilight Barroom ~Uwabami Breakers~", and did the ending theme. It's nice to do music for shooting games again after so long. It will make me happy for you to be able to hear my music along with the lingering memories of danmaku after enjoying a hot-blooded drunkard's life and clearing the game. }}
{{Navbox UB}}
[[ru:Uwabami Breakers/Музыка]] [[Category:Music by Game]] [[Category:Uwabami Breakers]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title and Menu Theme | title =悪夢日記 | roma =Akumu nikki | titleEN =Nightmare Journal | comment =　タイトル画面のテーマです。

　夢がテーマになると大体ホラー展開になりがちな気がします。
　行きすぎない程度にホラー風味を入れてみました。 | translation =This is the Title theme.

I feel like most stories about dreams end up going in a horror-esque direction.
I tried putting in just enough horror flavor as to not take it too far. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage Theme 1 - First Week theme | title =ルーシッドドリーマー | roma =Rūshiddo dorīmā | titleEN =Lucid Dreamer | comment =　一週目のテーマです。

空を飛ぶ夢を見る事ってあります？
僕は定期的に急斜面を飛ぶようにスキーで滑る夢を見ます。
それを見たときは、大体調子の良いときですね。 | translation =This is the First Week theme.

Have you ever dreamed about flying?
I regularly have dreams where I'm skiing down a steep slope as if I'm flying.
Whenever I have that dream, it's usually when I'm feeling in pretty good shape. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage Theme 2 - Wrong Week theme | title =ルナティックドリーマー | roma =Runatikku dorīmā | titleEN =Lunatic Dreamer | comment =　二週目のテーマです。

夢の内容が現実味が無くなって、ただ単に疲労感だけが残る
そういった焦るような夢をイメージしました。
たまに見ますよね。何があったか忘れたけど疲れる夢。 | translation =This is the Second Week theme.

Sometimes you have dreams where the events have no sense of reality, and you're left with nothing
but a feeling of fatigue afterward. That irritating sort of dream is what I envisioned here.
You have those sometimes, right? Dreams that exhaust you even though you forget what happened. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage Theme 3 - Nightmare Week theme | title =ナイトメアダイアリー | roma =Naitomea daiarī | titleEN =Nightmare Diary | comment =　三週目のテーマです。

いつもの東方っぽい感じで曲を作りました。
放って置けば延々と続きそうな終盤ってイメージです。
ホラーな夢って、最高に気持ちいいのは自分だけ？
いつもホラーな妄想をしながら寝ますが、たまにしか見られません。 | translation =This is the Third Week theme.

A song with the usual Touhou-ness to it.
I made it with the image of a finale that could stretch on forever if you left it alone.
Am I the only one who thinks that horror dreams feel extremely nice?
I'm always fantasizing about horror stuff as I fall asleep, but I only get those dreams sometimes. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Story Theme 1 | title =バー・オールドアダム | roma =Bā Ōrudo Adamu | titleEN ="Old Adam" Bar | comment =　ストーリーのテーマ１です。

　＊旧約酒場　～ Dateless Bar "Old Adam" より | translation =This is Story Theme 1.

*From ''[[Dateless Bar "Old Adam"|Old Testament Tavern ~ Dateless Bar "Old Adam"]]''. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Story Theme 2 | title =燕石博物誌が連れてきた闇 | roma =Enseki hakubutsushi ga tsuretekita yami | titleEN =The Darkness Brought In by Swallowstone Naturalis Historia | comment =　ストーリーのテーマ２です。

　＊旧約酒場　～ Dateless Bar "Old Adam" より | translation =This is Story Theme 2.

*From ''[[Dateless Bar "Old Adam"|Old Testament Tavern ~ Dateless Bar "Old Adam"]]''. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Story Theme 3 | title =永遠の春夢 | roma =Eien no shunmu"Eien no haruyume" is also admittable. | titleEN =Eternal Spring Dream | comment =　ストーリーのテーマ３です。

　東方紺珠伝より | translation =This is Story Theme 3.

From ''[[Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom]]''. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Story Theme 4 | title =秘匿されたフォーシーズンズ | roma =Hitokusareta fōshīzunzu | titleEN =The Concealed Four Seasons | comment =　ストーリーのテーマ４です。

　東方天空璋より | translation =This is Story Theme 4.

From ''[[Hidden Star in Four Seasons]]''. }} {{Project Translations Notice}} {{Navbox VD}} [[Category:Violet Detector]] [[Category:Music by Game]] [[Category:Translations]] [[ru:Violet Detector/Музыка]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title screen | title =記憶の断片 | roma =Kioku no danpen | titleEN =Fragments of Memory | composer =Misora | comment =タイトル画面のテーマです。　
　
ちょっとミステリーっぽい雰囲気を出してみました。
何かを推理しながら聞くのに合ってるでしょうかね？ | translation =The title screen theme.

I gave [[Theme of Eastern Story|it]] a somewhat mystery-ish atmosphere.
It could be pretty fitting to listen to while you're deducing something, you know? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Prologue | title =神々の見解 | roma =Kamigami no kenkai | titleEN =The Gods' Opinions | composer =Misora | comment =Prologueのテーマです。　
　
タイトルに引き続き推理物意識です。
本編だと少ししか流れませんが、ロジカルプラクティス
では嫌と言う程聞くことになるでしょう。 | translation =The prologue theme.

Made with deductions in mind, continuing from the title screen.
It only plays for a little while in the main game, but during Logical Practice
you'll hear it so many times you might get sick of it. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 | title =少女秘封ブラフ | roma =Shoujo hifuu burafu | titleEN =Girls' Secret Sealing Bluff | composer =Misora | comment =1面のテーマです。　
　
原曲は非常に元気のいい曲なんで、元気にブラフに
かけられちゃって下さい＾＾ | translation =The Stage 1 theme.

The [[List_by_Song/Ghostly_Field_Club#Track_2|original track]] is an unusually cheery theme,
so cheerily bluff to your heart's content. (^^) }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Boss - [[White Names Spoiled Past/Characters#Okami Sisters|Okami Sisters]]' Theme | title =波数高低　～Kayser Kaiser | roma =Hasuu koutei | titleEN =[[wikipedia:Wavenumber|Wavenumber]] Fluctuation ~ Kayser Kaiser The ''kayser'', named after [[wikipedia:Heinrich Kayser|Heinrich Kayser]], is a unit used to measure wavenumber.This song title (and the Okami sisters' "kaiser" motif in general) is a pun on "高低" ('fluctuation') and "皇帝" ('emperor'), as both are pronounced ''koutei''. | composer =Misora | comment =雨品龍姉妹のテーマです。　
　
恒例の１ボス曲じゃない１ボス曲です。
曲名の元ネタが解る人は相当な物理マニアですね。 | translation =The Okami sisters' theme.

A Stage 1 boss theme that's nothing like your usual Stage 1 boss fare.
Anyone who can guess the reference in the title on sight must be a real physics nut. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 | title =朝霧のスクリーン | roma =Asagiri no sukurīn | titleEN =Screen of Morning Mist | composer =Misora | comment =2面のテーマです。　
　
夜明けに戯れる影の妖怪。
そんなイメージの曲です。ほぼこの作品における則紗の
テーマと言っていいですね。 | translation =The stage 2 theme.

A shadowy youkai playing around at dawn.
That's the image I had in mind. You can pretty much call this one
Sasha's theme song, as far as this game goes. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Boss - [[White Names Spoiled Past/Characters#Uka Kadofuyu|Uka Kadofuyu]]'s Theme | title =大尉の愛した数式 | roma =Taii no ai shita suushiki | titleEN =The Equations that the General Loved A reference to the novel ''[[wikipedia:The Housekeeper and the Professor|The Housekeeper and the Professor]]'' (original Japanese title: 博士の愛した数式 / "the equations that the professor loved"). | composer =Misora | comment =門冬 羽日のテーマです。　
　
生物学を崇拝する軍の大尉なのに、何故か数学の研究
ばかりやってる羽日。
むしろ物理の方が学問としては近いんじゃ…… | translation =Uka Kadofuyu's theme.

She's a general of an army that worships biology,
but for whatever reason she only researches mathematics.
Really, isn't her area of study more closely linked to physics...? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 | title =日本中の不思記を集めて | roma =Nihonjuu no fushigi o atsumete | titleEN =Gathering the Memorious from All Around Japan A pun on "Gathering the Mysterious from All Around Japan" (日本中の不思議を集めて), a track from [[Neo-traditionalism of Japan]]. The last kanji in "不思議" (mysterious) is replaced with the similarly-pronounced kanji 記, from "記憶" (memory). | composer =Misora | comment =3面のテーマです。　
　
どう聞いてもエンディング曲である原曲を道中テーマに
してみました的なアレンジです。
ミステリー作品にぴったりの曲名だと思いました。 | translation =The Stage 3 theme.

Whatever way you listen to it, it definitely sounds like it got remixed
into a stage theme despite originally being an ending theme.
I thought this song title would be perfect for a mystery game. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 Boss | title =礫塵の追憶　～Vanishing memories | roma =Rekijin no tsuioku | titleEN =Recollection of Gravel and Dust ~ Vanishing memories | composer =Misora | comment =3面ボスのテーマです。　
　
３面ボス３人のテーマです。
穏やかな曲調ですが、静かなるラストを迎えるこの作品の
ラスボス戦には相応しい曲だと思います。 | translation =The Stage 3 boss theme.

A theme for all three Stage 3 bosses.
The melody is pretty subdued, but I think it's fitting for the
game's final boss, since it leads into a pretty tranquil ending. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending | title =私達の見解 | roma =Watashitachi no kenkai | titleEN =Our Opinions | composer =Misora | comment =エンディングのテーマです。　
　
プロローグのアレンジです。
全部が終わってもすっきりしないストーリー。まだまだ
謎は残されています。 | translation =The ending theme.

A remix of the prologue theme.
Everything's over, but the story's still not wrapped up.
There's still plenty of mysteries left. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll | title =世界中の不思議を集めて | roma =Sekaijuu no fushigi o atsumete | titleEN =Gathering the Mysterious from All Around the World | composer =Misora | comment =スタッフロールのテーマです。　
　
神様は墓場になんて居ない。
人々が何かに感謝を続ける限り、色々な不思議を起こして
くれるのかもしれません。 | translation =The Staff Roll theme.

The gods aren't resting in some graveyard.
As long as people continue to express thanks for something,
various mysterious wonders may continue to occur. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage theme | title =雨の鳥船神社 | roma =Ame no torifune jinja | titleEN =Rainy Torifune Shrine A pun on "Ame-no-Torifune Shrine", a track from [[Trojan Green Asteroid]]. The kanji "天" (heaven) is replaced with "雨" (rain), both pronounced "ame". | composer =Misora | comment =エクストラステージ道中テーマです。　
　
鳥船遺跡より、大きな船の神様のテーマを引用しました。
最近は神様にもソーラーパネルが付く時代。ハイテクに
なったもんです。 | translation =The Extra Stage theme.

I borrowed the theme of a great god of ships from [[Trojan Green Asteroid]].
In recent times, it's even had some solar panels attached by the gods.
It's gotten really high-tech. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage boss - Azuma Himefuji's theme | title =前線の風を追い越して　～Flow Scale | roma =Zensen no kaze o oikoshite | titleEN =Pass Through the Front Line's Wind ~ Flow Scale | composer =Misora | comment =比売藤 雷のテーマです。　
　
エクストラボステーマ２。比売藤雷のテーマです。
美華と対照的に、力強い曲となっています。キャラの
読み方が難しいって？そうぞうりょくがたりないよ！ | translation =Azuma Himefuji's theme.

Extra Stage boss theme #2, for Azuma Himefuji.
It's a strong and forceful piece, completely opposite from Mihana.
What? The kanji in her name are hard to read? You lack imagination! }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage boss - Mihana Kayano's theme | title =緑の空のお姫様　～Sky Garden | roma =Midori no sora no ohimesama | titleEN =Princess of the Green Skies ~ Sky Garden | composer =Misora | comment =萱野 美華のテーマです。　
　
エクストラボステーマ１。萱野美華のテーマです。
容姿、曲ともに可愛らしいかと思いきや、戦い自体は
物量作戦という怖いお姫様なのでした。 | translation =Mihana Kayano's theme.

Extra Stage boss theme #1, for Mihana Kayano.
You might think her appearance and theme song are cute, but in battle
she's really a scary princess who fights with sheer overwhelming numbers. }} ==Notes== {{Navbox WNSP}} [[Category:White Names Spoiled Past]] [[Category:Music by Game]]

==Music List== {{MusicRoom | category =Title Screen | title =物言わぬ獣の霊 | roma =Mono-iwanu kemono no rei | titleEN =Silent Beast Spirits | comment =タイトル画面のテーマです。 ダークさとミステリアスさを入れたタイトル画面です。
行き先が地獄だと言われているので、先が思いやられる感じです。 | translation =This is the title screen theme. A title theme to which I gave some dark and mysterious vibes.
Since our destination is ostensibly Hell, it feels like you've got a tough road ahead of you. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 theme | title =地蔵だけが知る哀嘆 | roma =Jizou dake ga shiru aitan | titleEN =The Lamentations Known Only by Jizo | comment =１面のテーマです。 子供の霊イジメで有名な賽の河原の曲です。
今まで１面というと明るめの曲が多かったのですが、今回は
どちらかというと哀愁を感じるようなメロディにしてみました。
東方らしい死生観が出ているかと思います。 | translation =This is the Stage 1 theme. A theme for the Sai-no-Kawara, famous for children's ghosts getting bullied.
Stage 1 has featured a lot of bright, cheery songs up until now, but if I had to say
one way or another, the melody I composed this time has a feeling of melancholy.
I think it displays a rather Touhou-esque perspective on life and death.
}} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 1 Boss - [[Eika Ebisu]]'s theme | title =ジェリーストーン | roma =Jerī sutōn | titleEN =Jelly Stone | comment =戎 瓔花 （えびす えいか） のテーマです。 石を積むのがとても得意な水子の曲です。
ダークなイントロから、子供らしい軽快なメロディへと続ける
かわいらしい曲です。
クラゲらしいホワホワ感も入れてみています。 | translation =This is Eika Ebisu's theme. A theme for a stillborn child with a talent for stacking stones.
It's a pretty cute song, starting with a dark intro but continuing
into a jaunty, childlike melody.
I also tried giving it a floaty, jellyfish-like feeling. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 theme | title =ロストリバー | roma =Rosuto ribā | titleEN =Lost River | comment =２面のテーマです。 みんな大好き三途の河のテーマです。
河と言うよりは海での戦闘をイメージして作りました。
住んでいる魚も、絶滅した古代魚や、首長竜なんかもいるかも
しれません。夢が膨らみます。 | translation =This is the Stage 2 theme. The theme of everyone's favorite place: the Sanzu River.
Rather than a river, I envisioned more of an ocean battle while composing this.
The fish living in it are extinct prehistoric fish, and there might even be things
like plesiosaurs in there too. It really gets your imagination running. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 2 Boss - [[Urumi Ushizaki]]'s theme | title =石の赤子と水中の牛 | roma =Ishi no akago to suichuu no ushi | titleEN =The Stone Baby and the Submerged Bovine | comment =牛崎 潤美 （うしざき　うるみ） のテーマです。 ホラーにならないダークさを目指した曲です。
彼女は見た感じお姉さんキャラなので、ほんの少しだけ落ち着いた
感じを入れてみました。
このゲームらしい曲になったと思います。 | translation =This is Urumi Ushizaki's theme. I aimed for a song that's dark, but not horrifically dark.
As you can see, she's a "big sister" sort of character,
so I added just a touch of laid-back atmosphere too.
I think it turned out to be very appropriate for this game's atmosphere. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 theme | title =不朽の曼珠沙華 | roma =Fukyuu no manjushage | titleEN =Everlasting Red Spider Lily | comment =３面のテーマです。 三途の川を渡ったら、その先は死者の世界です。
東方らしいあの世を表現しました。和風とも中華風とも付かない
東アジア風のノスタルジーに満ちた幻想的な死後の世界に、
弾幕戦闘を持ち込むとこういう感じなのかなぁ。 | translation =This is the Stage 3 theme. Once you cross the Sanzu River, the world of the dead lies beyond.
I tried to portray a Touhou-esque view of the next world. A fantastical afterlife
world, not quite Japanese nor Chinese, filled with East Asian nostalgia...
Perhaps this is what you'd get if you brought danmaku battles into a place like that? }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 3 boss - [[Kutaka Niwatari]]'s theme | title =セラフィックチキン | roma =Serafikku chikin | titleEN =Seraphic Chicken | comment =庭渡 久侘歌 （にわたり　くたか） のテーマです。 鶏の神様です。現実でもフィクションでも、食材か悪口にしかなら
ない事が多い鶏ですが、この世界ではかなり高貴な神様のようです。
鶏の歩き方っぽい突っかかり感と、急に強くなる中盤の大ボス感を
混ぜて、このゲームっぽく仕上げをしました。どうぞ召し上がれ。 | translation =This is Kutaka Niwatari's theme. A chicken god. Chickens tend to either be food or the targets of insult in both reality and fiction, but in this world, she seems to be a considerably honored god.
I took a "rushing forth" feeling reminiscent of a chicken's walk, mixed it with the feeling of a formidable mid-game boss that brings a sudden difficulty spike, and whipped them together in a style fitting for this game. Bon appetit. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 theme | title =アンロケイテッドヘル | roma =Anrokeiteddo heru | titleEN =Unlocated Hell | comment =４面のテーマです。 音楽的に地獄と言えばヘビーメタル！というステレオタイプな
発想で曲を作り始めましたが、そもそもメタルに造詣が深くないので
いつも通りの曲にちょい金属分が多い程度になりました。
敵の余裕さと手強さを感じる曲になっていて気持ちいいです。 | translation =This is the Stage 4 theme. I started composing this with the stereotypical idea of "Hell means heavy metal,
musically speaking!", but I'm not well-versed in metal in the first place, so it
ended up being a business-as-usual song with just a bit of a metallic component.
It really gives a sense of how effortlessly strong the enemies are, which feels great. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 4 boss - [[Yachie Kicchou]]'s theme | title =トータスドラゴン　～　幸運と不運 | roma =Tōtasu doragon ~ Kou'un to fuun | titleEN =Tortoise Dragon ~ Fortune and Misfortune | comment =吉弔 八千慧のテーマです。 龍と亀の中間みたいな伝説的な生物です。
格好良さと可愛らしさ、軽快さと重厚さのどっちも
感じられるような不思議な曲になりました。
このゲームのキーマンの一人ですので中盤だけどちょい盛りました。 | translation =This is Yachie Kicchou's theme. She's a legendary creature that's like a cross between a dragon and a tortoise.
This one turned out as a mysterious song that can give you both a cool impression
or a cute impression, a lighthearted one or a heavy one. Since she's one of the game's
key characters, I added a bit of flair to it despite her midgame position. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 theme | title =ビーストメトロポリス | roma =Bīsuto metoroporisu | titleEN =Beast Metropolis | comment =５面のテーマです。 弱肉強食こそが唯一の理の畜生界です。
経済的成功こそ至上であり、そこでは個人の思考は尊重されません。
個人の感情など、合理化された社会では邪魔でしかないのです。
畜生界は自己責任論渦巻く都市社会の、悪夢の一つです。 | translation =This is the Stage 5 theme. The Animal Realm, where survival of the fittest is the one and only law.
Economic success reigns supreme, and individual thought isn't valued one bit.
Personal feelings are nothing but an obstruction in such a streamlined society.
It's one nightmare vision of urban society, where talk of "self-responsiblity" runs rampant. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 5 boss - [[Mayumi Joutouguu]]'s theme | title =セラミックスの杖刀人 | roma =Seramikkusu no joutoujin | titleEN =Joutoujin of Ceramics | comment =杖刀偶 磨弓のテーマです。 埴輪兵士です。昔、ＮＨＫで放送されていた埴輪の着ぐるみ番組が
好きでよく覚えています。今回は格好良い埴輪を作りたかったのに
頭の中ではずっと「おーい、はにまる♪はにまるおうじー」が流れ
ていました。曲はいつもの中ボスっぽいけど割と攻めてます。 | translation =This is Mayumi Joutouguu's theme. She's a haniwa soldier. I loved that NHK program with the haniwa costume
back in the day; I can remember it so clearly. I wanted to make a cool haniwa
this time, but "oi, Hanimaru! ♪ Prince Hanimaru" kept playing in my head the
whole time. The song is the usual midboss-ey fare, but it goes pretty hard. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 theme | title =エレクトリックヘリテージ | roma =Erekutorikku heritēji | titleEN =Electric Heritage | comment =最終面のテーマです。 霊長園内部です。
仁徳天皇陵古墳が世界遺産になりましたね。でも、内部の調査は
宮内庁の許可が無いと出来ないので、実際には誰の墳墓かすら
判っていないんですよねぇ。ロマン有ります。 | translation =This is the final stage theme. Now we're inside the [[Primate Spirit Garden]].
[[wikipedia:Emperor_Nintoku#Nintoku's_tomb|Emperor Nintoku's kofun]] became a World Heritage Site, yeah? But they can't
investigate inside of it without the Imperial Household Agency's permission, so technically
we don't actually know whose grave it is. What a sense of adventure that gives. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Stage 6 boss - [[Keiki Haniyasushin]]'s theme | title =偶像に世界を委ねて　～ Idoratrize World | roma =Guuzou ni sekai wo yudanete | titleEN =Entrust this World to Idols ~ Idolatrize World | comment =埴安神 袿姫のテーマです。 天才造形師です。彫刻刀片手に作業着エプロンで戦うボスを、
如何にして格好良く見せるのかだけが今回のテーマでした（笑）
本当の敵が誰なのか主人公にもプレイヤーにも不確定なまま戦う
為、悪意の感じない少し切なさもある爽やかな曲になりました。 | translation =This is Keiki Haniyasushin's theme. She's a genius sculptor. My only theme for this one was "how cool can I make this boss
even though she's fighting in a work apron while holding sculpting tools?" (Lol)
Since you end up fighting her without either the player or protagonist knowing who the
real bad guy is, it's a refreshing and somewhat-somber song with no feeling of hostility. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage theme | title =輝かしき弱肉強食の掟 | roma =Kagayakashiki jakunikukyoushoku no okite | titleEN =The Shining Law of the Strong Eating the Weak | comment =エキストラステージのテーマです。 四十ニの男が中二病全開を目指して作った曲です。
何を作っても懐かしさを感じてしまうのは、年のせいなんだろ
うなぁ。これから子供と一緒に感性を磨いていこうと思います。
でも、この曲、全体的にイケメンなメロディだと思います。 | translation =This is the Extra Stage theme. The product of a 42-year-old man trying his hardest to unleash his inner ''chuunibyou''.
Everything I make feels somehow nostalgic, which is probably a side effect of my age...
I'd like to refine my sensitivity together with my children from here on out.
I think this whole song has a really handsome-sounding melody throughout, though. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Extra Stage boss - [[Saki Kurokoma]]'s theme | title =聖徳太子のペガサス　～ Dark Pegasus | roma =Shoutoku Taishi no Pegasasu | titleEN =Prince Shoutoku's Pegasus ~ Dark Pegasus | comment =驪駒 早鬼のテーマです。 驪駒（くろこま）です。筋肉馬鹿らしいので、性格は悪くなさ
そうです。畜生界では一番安心感があります。
馬という事でカウガール風の服装にしたんですが、よく考えたら
それは乗る側の服装ですよね。よく考えなくても。 | translation =This is Saki Kurokoma's theme. She's Kurokoma. Since she's apparently a total meathead, her personality doesn't
seem all that bad. She exudes the most sense of security in the whole Animal Realm.
I tried to give her a cowgirl-esque outfit since she's a horse, but when you give it a
good, long think (or even just a short one), that's what her ''rider'' should be wearing. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Ending theme | title =畜生達の休息 | roma =Chikushou-tachi no kyuusoku | titleEN =The Animals' Rest | comment =エンディングのテーマです。 何故かスイングしてます。
特に意味はありません。 | translation =This is the ending theme. It's got a swingin' vibe for some reason.
No real meaning behind it, though. }} {{MusicRoom | category =Staff Roll theme | title =地下からの帰還 | roma =Chika kara no kikan | titleEN =Returning Home from the Underground | comment =スタッフロールのテーマです。 ４面の曲の編曲です。 | translation =This is the Staff Roll theme. It's an arrangement of the Stage 4 theme. }} {{Project Translations Notice}} {{Navbox WBaWC}} [[Category:Wily Beast and Weakest Creature]] [[Category:Music by Game]] [[Category:Translations]] [[fr:Wily Beast and Weakest Creature/Musique]] [[ru:Wily Beast and Weakest Creature/Музыка]]
